Summary: Very nice hotel. Staff is very helpful and kind. They made many visits to our room to give us extra towels and blankets and had no issue with helping us out. and the pool is also a very nice area! I would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Linalinaalinaaa,  Thank you for the kind review. I hope we get a chance to welcome you back to Anaheim the next time your visit the area.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: We stay at Marriott properties exclusively, both for the points and the renowned Marriott quality. This was our first time at a Courtyard property, and we were not disappointed. The downside to Courtyard is no free breakfast, unlike Springhill Suites and Residence Inn. However, I booked a AAA rate with breakfast included for two adults -- which was $10 more per night than without breakfast, so an excellent deal on the whole. Adding on a kid's breakfast for our child was $4.86. The AAA rate wasn't available for the family suite or kids' suite (both of which include bunk beds) when I made our reservation, but after our first night there, Tiffany at the front desk arranged for us to move to a king suite with bunk beds in the living area (a separate room with its own sleeper sofa,
Manager Response: Dear kbiallas,  WOW! I have to offer an extra big THANK YOU for taking the time and thought to write such a kind and detailed review. I'm very happy to read that you enjoyed your first experience at a Courtyard property. As you mentioned, we do not offer complimentary breakfast like many of the other Marriott brands, but as you experienced- the quality of our breakfast is high and above what one would expect at one of our sister brands. I want to end by thanking you for sharing about our amenities, location and guest service. I will make sure to share your very kind review with our entire team. We hope to welcome you back to Anaheim for future travel.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: We recently stayed during a surprise trip to Disneyland. The facility was well maintained and the staff are amazing. We had a family suite complete with two queen beds, a separate kids space that included a bunk bed and couch, two televisions, mini fridge, microwave, and spacious bathroom. The room was spacious and very clean. Our kids loved the bunk bed so much that they have requested one for home. We were helped by an amazing staff member Josh, he went above and beyond to make sure that we had the most enjoyable vacation possible and that our daughters had the perfect ending to their first Disneyland trip. We will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear maria h,  Thank you so much for your kind words. Our family suites are a great option for families travelling to Disneyland or Disney's California Adventure. The space allows for families up to eight people to share one room, which is a great value for anyone looking to save money on vacation. I also want to thank you for taking the time to talk about Josh. He is one of the many members on our team who is regularly mentioned by guests on reviews for his above and beyond service.  Thank you again!  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay for business and pleasure!
Summary: I was attending a conference and had a room booked here. My wife and son decided last minute to join me and check out some of the Anaheim/SoCal sites. The last minute change was not a problem, and the room suited us very nicely. Comfortable queen beds, and quiet location. Located very near the Convention Center and a roughly 25 minute walk to Disneyland. Also only a 5-10 minute walk to the Enterprise car rental location. I wanted to send a particular shout out to the staff at The Bistro, especially Marlee, Adriana and Alex, whose service was outstanding.  My son particularly enjoyed the fresh-made pasta for dinner one evening. The staff were all very friendly and helpful,  both at The Bistro and the front desk area. When I reported the fridge had a bad smell, they were on it
Manager Response: Dear Dan M,  Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel. Our proximity to Disneyland and the Convention Center makes our hotel a great option for guests who are looking to have fun at the parks and get some work done at a Convention. Thank you for taking the time to mention Marlee, Adriana and Alex! Our team works very hard to make a positive impact on our guests, so I'm very proud that they were able to do so for you. I'm also glad to read that you really enjoyed our Bistro offerings. We just updated our menu and have received a lot of positive feedback from our guests. Although I would love to earn a "5" in every category on your next review I'm glad our service hit a high score with you this time around.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: First of all I would like to personally thank a special Employee, her name is Tiffany Baker. Not only did she made sure all of our travel plans were met she also went above and beyond for us. We love this Marriott and their wonderful employees that work there. This place makes a trip to Disneyland truely memorable. It's well kept offers great amenities and the distance to Disneyland was a breeze. We will definitely be back and we hope to have Ms. Baker assist us again.
Manager Response: Dear woomby116,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your stay at our hotel. I especially want to thank you for sharing your kind comments about Tiffany. Our team works very hard to share kindness and value to every one of our guests, so I always feel proud when a particular employee is able to make a lasting impact.I have shared your comments with Tiffany and the rest of our team, so we all look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim on your next visit.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing stay ... great staff highly recomend
Summary: Stayed here during Wondercon. Hotel was in a great location, super easy to walk to and from the Convention Center. Oh and when we decided to go to Disney we juat crossed harbor and jumped on the Disney shuttles. Super easy.  Due to time limits we only got to enjoy breakfast one day but it was good. Never got to try out anything at night.  Pool was welcoming after walking all day. Rooms were very nice ,clean well appointed and had room when a third needed to crash one night   Kudos to the team here. Its going to be my go to hotel in Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear wanderluststitch,  Thank you for your very kind review. I'm very glad to read you had such a great stay at our hotel. It's not always possible to make it to the Convention Center and Disneyland, but our proximity to both locations really makes it easy for guests looking to enjoy both attractions. Thank you again and I hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Best stay at a Disneyland hotel!
Summary: I got married in October and for our first Valentine’s Day as a married couple I asked my wife where she wanted the go, without hesitation my beautiful wife said “Disneyland. Make it happen.” This gave me great inspiration and I began my search. I looked up pretty much every hotel around the Disneyland area and when I saw there was a Courtyard by Marriott I had to investigate it up. They had great reviews, were reasonably priced and I’ve stayed at a few Courtyards before so I booked it. Best decision I made! The staff was great! We checked in super quick and asked for a dinner recommendation and they directed us to a great little Italian place! It was so good! When we went to our room we were both amazed at the cleanliness and comfort that was there. The room was impeccable and
Manager Response: Dear jayhanhook,  Congratulations again to you and your lovely bride! Thank you for letting my team and I share in this special moment in your life. I look forward to welcoming you both back to Anaheim on your next visit to Disneyland.  All the best, Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: Wow!! We were so happy with our stay! The hotel was in short walking distance to the conference center and to the toy story parking lot for Disneyland.  We had a family suite which was awesome as my daughter and her family joined us for a few days. When I told Roger it was our anniversary he made it extra special for us!! Rooms were clean, beds and pillows comfy. Staff were all very pleasant and helpful. I highly recommend this! Pool wasn't very crowded for our 4 year old grandaughter.
Manager Response: Dear Serena S,  Thank you for your very kind review. I also want to thank you for your name mention! My team and I love it when we make a lasting impression on our guests, so we celebrate every time we see a name mention on any of our online review platforms. Getting the chance to celebrate special moments and helping to create lasting memories are the best parts of our job. Thank you again and I hope we get to welcome you and your family back to Anaheim on your next visit.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: The room was great. The bed was comfortable and the area was quiet.  It was nice they had breakfast on site.  It was a perfect place to stay and bring the family to Disneyland.  The staff was nice and the housekeeping was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear 438eligio,  Thank you for your kind review. We work very hard to make your stay easy. Offering comfortable accommodations and a delicious made-to-order breakfast are just two ways we make that happen. I hope we have the chance to welcome you back to Anaheim on you next trip to Disneyland.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: We stayed for a weekend and had a great time! The property is nice and it is noticeable they have renovated/updated!  Staff was very friendly and helpful; Gina at the front desk was wonderful!  The restaurant surpassed my expectations; they had great breakfast options and the Starbucks was so convenient!  The room was spacious, clean, and updated. The bed was perfect!  Walking distance to Disneyland and lots of restaurants.  I have recommended this property to several friends and they have enjoyed their stay!
Manager Response: Dear amandaD2809LR,  Thank you for taking the time and attention to share your feedback about your stay. Team members like Gina work extremely hard to represent Marriott and our hotel well. I am glad you experienced that spirit to serve firsthand.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this property a few times and every stay is perfect. Great location for the convention center as well as Disney parks. The staff was always friendly whether it was the front desk, the bistro or even the housekeeping staff in the hallways everyone said hello and had a smile on. The room was clean and comfortable with plenty of space.
Manager Response: Dear gepoeschl,  Thank you for your very kind words. I love it when we check all the boxes: great service, great location, great rooms! I hope to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: Visited Disneyland.  Hotel was very nice, clean and quiet.  It's about a 25 minute walk to the park. Parking at the hotel was $17 a day.  It was problem to find parking.  We did not eat breakfast there.  I liked the top floor much quieter than middle floors.
Manager Response: Dear travelisfun2011,  Thank you for your review. I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. I hope you have an easier time with finding parking on your next visit and get a chance to enjoy our Bistro. We have just updated our menu and people really seem to love our new offerings.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: My wife and I love going to Disneyland and not better place to stay then here. We enjoy the staff, it’s always clean and so close to Disneyland! We’ve had a great experience every time and can’t wait to visit again
Manager Response: Dear Aaron M,  Thank you for the kind words. I can't wait to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit to Disneyland!  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: I've stayed here a couple of times.  The location is great relative to Disneyland, but the property and level of service does not hold a flame to the Anaheim Marriott behind it.  Starting with check-in, I was told right off the bat they would not honor my request for a 4pm check-out.  As a Gold Elite member it is supposed to be guaranteed.  However, this property uses a little exception for resort and convention properties.  Realistically, this property is neither.  It is somewhat close in proximity to the convention center, but there are many hotel properties that are directly adjacent to the convention center.  This is not one.  On the plus side, I was told I could cancel my reservation without any penalty since they did not inform me of the non-accommodation until check-in.
Manager Response: Dear howardhsu,  I want to start by thanking you for being a loyal Marriott Rewards Elite Member. I know it takes a lot of work and time away from home to achieve Elite status, so I want to make sure we extend our gratitude for your loyalty. With that said, I am sorry we failed to exceed your expectations. Being average is far from where we want to be in our guest's eyes. I apologize for the missed opportunities on our part to help make your stay exceptional. Please know that if you plan on visiting Anaheim again in the future I would love the opportunity to personally ensure your stay is far better than average.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Very kind and sweet staff when we needed it!
Summary: We have stayed here in the past and always found it very pleasant. There are only two elevators and the one that is mainly used is super slow and small. However, the beds are comfy and the hotel is in a good location.   We are annual pass holders at Disneyland and stay in the area quite often. This trip was a little different for us. Our 8 year old son came down with a raging fever of 103.9 at about 11:00 p.m. on our second night. His fever was so high that we had to take him to the emergency room that night. Tiffany was extremely helpful in guiding me to the nearest ER. Upon our return from the hospital at 4:30 a.m. she immediately asked about my son and if there was anything she could do to provide further assistance. She was so sincere and sweet. I told her that my boy tested
Manager Response: Dear MElena2,  Thank you so much for your kind review. As a fellow parent, I know how hard it is when your plans get derailed by your child getting sick. I'm just glad our team was able to come alongside you and help make the best of it. Our team sincerely cares about our guests and I'm always grateful when guests share stories like your own.   All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: This Courtyard hotel is very close to Disney land and the convention center. Nice property and well managed. Very close to so many restaurants and shops. The only downside is you need to pay 17 dollars for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Anuj S,  Thank you for your review. Many guests visiting the Anaheim do not anticipate having to pay for parking, but like other high-demand markets such as downtown Los Angeles and downtown San Diego paid parking is the norm in the Disneyland Resort Area. I also want to note that the average parking fee in our area is $17-$19 per night, so we work to keep the price fair for our guests. I hope this information helps explain the parking fee and I look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim in the future.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Haven't arrived yet, and I'm already so impressed with the service!
Summary: I have booked a several night stay at this property for my family's upcoming trip to Disneyland (two kids 4 and 5). I was so impressed with the personal email I got from Ms. T Baker, a Guest Service Agent at the property. She reached out weeks before our stay extending a warm welcome and asking if there was anything I needed. I asked Ms. Baker to extend our stay one night, and she did! It was so painless! It makes packing for our trip this weekend a little less stressful knowing we will be staying at a property with such great service....Thinking of you before you even arrive :)
Manager Response: Dear GB W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review BEFORE YOU'VE EVEN ARRIVED! I want you to know that when we discussed sending out pre-arrival emails to our guests, Tiffany was all over it. She loves connecting with our guests, and as a Disney-lover she is a great reference for anyone travelling to the parks. I will make sure she reads your review and receives the praise she deserves.  Thank you,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night in December and loved it! Clean rooms, super comfy beds, and front desk associates were very friendly and helpful. It was close to the shuttle that takes you to/from Disneyland as well, so that's definitely another perk ;)
Manager Response: Thank you, thriftywifey, for your kind words. I am very happy to read that you loved your stay with us. I hope we get to welcome you back the next time you travel to Disneyland.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Destination for Disneyland or Anaheim Convention Center.
Summary: We recently traveled as a family of 4 to Anaheim to attend a convention and spend a couple of days in Disneyland.  We were greeted by a welcoming front desk staff that efficiently got us checked and on our way to our room in minutes while also informing us of the full service breakfast available in the morning.  We had a family suite with 2 queen beds and a set of bunk beds providing more than we needed for 4, but the extra space was great.  There is a back walkway to the convention center Making a short 10 minute walk to the convention. Disneyland was also an easy 15 minute walk. We found that you can also walk right across the street  (Harbor), to the Disney parking lot and take the Disney shuttle to the park to save a walk.  The hotel was a great destination for eithe the
Manager Response: Dear Mpoeschl,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay. We always love welcoming you and your family to Anaheim and hope we continue to be your home away from home.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: This is a really nice place to stay in the Anaheim convention center. Clean, organized, away from the bustle of the convention yet still close enough. I found the front desk staff very helpful and pleasant. The housekeeping staff was excellent and responsive, even though the house was completely booked (a very nice housekeeper staff member with king blonde hair was kind and helpful). Also the women at the bistro were so nice and helpful every time and courteous and attentive even during the busy times. Comfortable environment. Smaller hotel but with all the amenities you need. Great people.
Manager Response: Dear Edward N,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us during your visit to Anaheim. Our team works members work very hard to ensure our guests feel valued. We take time daily in every department to discuss ways we can exceed our guests expectations. I hope to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit to the Convention Center.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: I was SO very impressed with the Courtyard by Marriott. I highly recommend it for couples and families! Spotlessly clean. Modern. Huge room with full fridge/freezer, microwave, stove, kitchen utensils, plates, etc. The beds are comfortable. The noise level is low. There are rooms available with a view of California Adventure.  Free breakfast included with MANY choices: cereals, hot oatmeal, breads, bagels, breakfast taco bar, eggs, sausages, HUGE waffles, fruits, juices, coffee, milk, tea.  The staff were always polite and smiling.  Free Wi-Fi and free computer use available in the lobby. A CVS, Walgreens and 7-11 are within close walking distance.  There is a pool and fitness room available.  The walking distance to the parks is aways away but great if you have a car.
Manager Response: Dear LindaSeattle,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us during your visit to Anaheim. I would like make some clarifying notes for any future guests who may read your review:   -Only our suites come with the refrigerator and microwave. -Breakfast is included when you book our breakfast package. Otherwise made to order breakfast is available for purchase at our Bistro. -Although our hotel does not have a view of California Adventure we are located within walking distance to the parks.  Thank you again and I look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Our family stayed here in a kids suite for several nights while visiting the Disneyland Parks. The kids loved the bunk beds and we loved that there was extra room for them. Beds were comfortable and room was quiet.   The hotel is about 1 mile away from Disneyland, but we opted for the ART shuttle each day to save energy for the parks. Tickets are available at the front desk and inexpensive for the day pass.  Everyone at the hotel was friendly. We had breakfast each morning in the hotel restaurant. Breakfast options were standard - kids meals were available and a good deal.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear nkgrl,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us. I'm so happy to read that your kids loved our suite. As a parent I believe a vacation is only a success when the kids leave happy! I'm also glad to see that you found the ART shuttle to be a good option for you. With our hotel being 1 mile from Disneyland our guests like to have the option to do the 15 minute walk or the 5 minute shuttle ride ($5.25 for adults and $2 for kids per day). I am excited to welcome you back to Anaheim the next time you visit Disneyland!  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: The staff was genuinely friendly and eager to help. We were able to check in immediately (at 9am) and head straight to Disneyland (a quick 5-7 min walk).  They have a great option to have your room cleaned early so it will be clean for naptime.  My kids loved the bunk beds - and l loved the dual showers in the room.  Offered great (and inexpensive) breakfast options. Starbucks coffee too!  Great experience and would strongly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kristyn G,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay with us during your visit to Anaheim. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations. Our Bistro (which offers Starbucks coffee and pastries), family suites and proximity to Disneyland are only a few features that help make us a great choice. I hope we have the chance to welcome you and your family back on your next visit to Disney.  All the best,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Welcoming. The nicest people work here
Summary: Renata our housekeeper made our room extra lovely each day. She should be promoted.  Every employee here was so kind and professional.  They helped us ship a box, kept our room beautiful, and gave us extras we needed. Thank you ☺
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne R,  You are now the fourth reviewer in a row to mention at least one of our associates by name! Reviews like yours mean the world to us and we always celebrate our team members for making an impact with our guests. Thank you for your kind words, and please know I will personally share your review with Renata and the rest of our team.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: What awesome people at the bistro
Summary: Chay, vianca, sydnea and consuelo, are such great host. I wish i lived closer,  so i could visit more often . Kudos for having such a wonderful staff. I will make this a usual stop on my way to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear grtgrk,  Thank you so much for this sweet review. I will make sure to personally thank our Bistro team for making you feel so welcomed.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: When visiting Disneyland this hotel works perfectly. Maybe a half a mile walk, lobby is comfortable and the bar is fun.
Summary: This was my third visit to this hotel, we could have spent $200 or more to be in a Disneyland hotel but it wasn’t worth it. With a savings and a comfy room, pool and jacuzzi we were happy. Our morning front desk employee, Cesar, was an absolute professional. He assisted us with every need we had.
Manager Response: Dear karenroek,  Thank you for your kind review! Cesar is a gem and we are proud to have him on our team. I'm glad to read that you really felt the value of the product and service we offer and I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: Great stay at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention center.  My husband and I like to travel to Disneyland a lot and usually stay on property but we needed to spend less on this trip so we looked off property.  The reviews for Courtyard were very good so we choose this property.  The room was clean and very comfortable and the staff were welcoming and helpful.  A big thank you to Josh at the checkin desk who was calm and helpful when we had an issue with our checkin which was not even a Courtyard problem but our credit card rewards program.  Also, the gentleman at the bar was helpful and it was a quite place to relax after the craziness of the park. The walk to Disneyland took us about 10-15 minutes depending on the wait at stop lights.  We are 60 and in good shape so we
Manager Response: Dear Rnc25,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay. Straying from the norm can be scary (especially when travelling), but in this case it paid off! Josh and the rest of our team work very hard to offer a warm welcome and surpass the expectations of all our guests. I'm also glad to read that you found the walk to Disney enjoyable. I think it's a great way to warm up and to wind down from the parks, but for guests who prefer to avoid the walk we sell shuttle passes for the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) shuttle, which runs every 20 minutes. Thank you again for your review and I look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim on your next visit to Disneyland!  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Stay was pleasant part of our Disneyland trip
Summary: We were 3 adults and two young children staying for several days on a trip to Disneyland.  The hotel was perfect for our needs.  And we could walk across the parking lot to a nearby hotel to pick up the bus that shuttles one to Disneyland.  We could buy the bus pass from a kiosk on the lobby level.  Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Karen N,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay. I'm glad the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART shuttle) worked out so well for you and your family. I hope we get the chance to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit to Disneyland.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, efficient stay with friendly staff
Summary: We would definitely return! The room was well appointed for a Courtyard. Modern and clean throughout building. The team at the front desk were especially helpful and nice. Tiffany, a front desk agent, even emailed us the week before we arrived to ask if there was anything we needed to make our stay more comfortable. She actually helped us with a reservation question. We asked the front desk one day if there was anywhere we could get a cup of coffee and he offered to make us one himself! Great customer service! Walking distance to Disney if you don’t want to wait for the shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer J,  Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel. Our Front Desk team taking the time to reach out to our guests prior to their arrival is a big part of our effort to go above and beyond expectation. It is especially a big help when it comes to ensuring we do a good job taking care of the details. Thank you again for your review.  All the best,

Summary: The customer service at this hotel is second to none!  All of the employees I encountered, including front desk, maintenance, food service, and housekeeping staff, were professional and courteous.  Like all of their colleagues, Beltran and Edna in food service took every opportunity to ensure customer satisfaction.  I only with I had taken the time to learn the names of the other fine staff members who assisted me during my stay!
Manager Response: Dear Scott95667,  I am always happy to read that our team members, across the board, were professional and courteous. Being around the corner from Disneyland sets us up for high expectations, but we are always happy to deliver! I look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim on your next visit.  All the best,

Summary: Very nice place I would recommend for family vacation  Nice comfortable double room , my breakfast was included and it was nice  All the stuff are helpful at the reception disk they helped a lot with ideas to have a good vacation and bistro restaurant and cafe  Specially chay and Adriana
Manager Response: Dear Shireen S,  Thank you for taking the time to tell about your experience at our hotel and with our team. Chay and Adriana work very hard to offer a personalized guest service experience to every guest they encounter at the Bistro, so I am very happy to see it made such a positive impression on you during your visit.  All the best,

Summary: 10 min walk to Disneyland  Huge rooms - we stayed in a 1-bed apartment. We had our own space. Kids had double bunk in living room. 2 TVs. 2 showers. 2 sinks. Separate toilet. Super cool waterpark Friendly and efficient staff Great food nearby
Manager Response: Dear Spayskdet,  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are proud to be able to offer suites that are perfect for family vacations to Disneyland. I look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Anaheim in the future.  All the best,

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff and Great Location make for a stay!
Summary: We decided on a last minute trip to Disneyland for Halloween and we booked a night at the Courtyard.  We were greeted at the Front Desk by Josh who was friendly, efficient and well trained.  He was able to get us the two different room types we needed with in a few doors of each other.  He introduced us to the hotels and all the amenities it had to offer us. He told us the Bistro serves a great breakfast and we should fuel up there before our long day in the Park.  The next day were welcomed into the Bistro by Mary who took and served our order.  She made us feel at home and got us to the park on time.   As we were leaving, Josh wished us Happy Halloween and gave us great Disney posters to celebrate.  He thanked us for our stay and asked that we stay at the Courtyard again for
Manager Response: Aaron94109,  Thank you so much for your kind words. I am always happy to see that our team delivered an experience that surpasses expectations. I have shared your review with our entire team, and we have extended some well deserved appreciation to Josh and Mary. I hope to welcome you back to Anaheim during your next visit.  All the best!

Summary: The rooms stank. The cleaning solvent for covering the smokers rooms gave me a headache and made me nauseous. Gave up after switching twice.   Staff was nice but couldn't help. Will never stay there again
Manager Response: Dear _fb_1559559000,  I am so sorry to read that you had such an unpleasant experience at our hotel. I want to note that we are a 100% non-smoking hotel. Unfortunately, in your case we had another guest who failed to respect our rules on smoking. We do our best to resolve these matters in a way that does not take away from the experience of our other guests, but it seems we fell short in this situation- for that I am sincerely sorry. I hope we will have the opportunity to demonstrate the full quality of our offerings to you during a future visit to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Roger Rodriguez

Summary Heading: Great Spot for a Family with Kids
Summary: My wife and I took our twin daughters to Disneyland to celebrate their birthday.  This hotel was perfect for our family.  We stayed in the King Kid's Suite and it was the perfect size to fit our family.  The 'kids suite' was a room connected to our main hotel room that included a bunk bed, pull out hide-a-bed in the couch, TV, small refrigerator and microwave.    The proximity to Disneyland is about a 15-20 minute walk, but if you take an Uber you can be there in as little as 5 minutes.  Another positive to the location is that there is a Doubletree next door.  This means that you can walk next door and buy a tin of their cookies to take back to your room.  :)
Manager Response: Dear Cameron C,  Thank you for taking the time to share about your stay. We sincerely love celebrating special events with our guest. In fact, our Front Desk team keeps a daily list of the special occasions we can celebrate with our guests such as birthday, anniversaries, graduations, etc. I also want to note that besides the 15- 20 minute walk or Uber, guests can also utilize the Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle that leaves our neighboring property, the Anaheim Marriott, every 20 minutes. The daily shuttle pass includes unlimited rides for the day and costs $5.50 for adults and $2 for children. Lastly, as much as I love being at a Marriott property I have to admit we love ourselves some Doubletree cookies!  Thank you again,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary Heading: Might be my new Anaheim Hotel. Just Great
Summary: This hotel is in a good location, within walking distance to Disneyland & convention center.  Right from the start I was treated Great. I am a platinum Marriott member and they treat you like one.  Service was great starting with the front desk to the bar.  I haven't slept that well in a hotel in ages. And I travel and living in a hotel at least 10 days out of the month.  I can't say anything else. Just a great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear rizzo3232,  I have to start by thanking your for your ongoing loyalty to Marriott. As a Platinum Member your opinion is especially important to us, so anytime we get such a stellar review from an Elite Member it means a lot! I am glad to read that you so enjoyed both our service and property offerings, and I look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay here! We were met with very friendly and helpful staff! A big shout out goes to Josh F. for his exceptional service to us! You rock! The premises was very clean and I loved the cucumber mint water available in the foyer.  Rooms were clean and spacious for our family of 4. Within walking distance to Disneyland (about 15 min walk). The bistro restaurant was very good and the staff there were friendly and made sure everything was good for us. It was!
Manager Response: Dear Mary A,  There is nothing better than seeing a happy guest recognize one of our associates by name. Thank you for your very kind review! I will make sure to give Josh and our Bistro team a big thank you for their hard work and friendly service.  Thank you,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary Heading: Perfect for easy Convention Center access!
Summary: Great room at a decent price! The room was clean with comfortable beds. Large bathroom, easy to use climate control. Wi-fi was fast and stable. Lovely lounge with friendly staff. There is a nice walk-through to get to the convention center quickly and easily. I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jessie G,  Thank you for your kind words! I am always happy to read that we will have the opportunity to welcome a guest back on their next trip to Anaheim. We work hard to offer competitive rates while still offering the highest quality service and amenities.  Thanks again,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary: Stayed four nights.  Very friendly staff from front desk to maintenance to housekeeping.  Clean room and bath.  Now the downside: building is in disrepair.  Stained carpets, worn wall coverings, musty smell in room that couldn't be fixed by maintenance. Room was too small for the king bed with about 18" clearance on one side.
Manager Response: Dear Respitesearch,  Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I'm very happy to read that you felt our team was very friendly. We always work to deliver the best service in Anaheim! With that said, I apologize that you felt the condition of the hotel did not match the quality of our service. Rest assured, we are working to address the concerns you shared. Thank you again for your feedback. I hope we will have the opportunity to welcome you back to Anaheim in the future.  Sincrely, Roger Rodriguez

Summary: A good property within walking distance of Disney, the convention center, and local restaurants. A swimmable heated pool is a treat as well as the congenial service. Slight negative is the limited parking. All in all a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear jonathb5,  Thank you for your review! I'm glad that you took advantage of the conveniences offered by our proximity to the Disneyland Parks, Convention Center and dining options. I hope to welcome you back to Anaheim during your next visit to Disneyland.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary: A brilliant hotel for families!   Everything you need including fully appointed laundry and amazing waterpark (the kids will be entertained for hours).  Staff are attentive and always happy to help - love the lifeguards who are always on point!!  I'd absolutely recommend this hotel for families, so close to Disneyland with spacious, modern rooms and a fantastic cafe downstairs!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Family hotel close to theme parks
Summary: Awesome stay here with 5 of us including 3 kids. 10 min walk to Disney parks and downtown Disney. Great room set up. Single bunk beds plus 2 queen beds. Very spacious. Was so great being able to login to Netflix so the kids could be entertained by their normal cartoons and once they were asleep was great for the parents to be able to watch whatever we wanted. Pool was also so fun and exciting to play and somewhat safe and shallow for the little kids to be playing closely supervised. Thank you will be returning here again. Te only downfall was that the hotel was very noisey on the outside with room servicing carts starting early however I think that they may have been to start cleaning the rooms early as kids take naps during midday.
Manager Response: Deara RKV6,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. I am so glad to read that you and your family had an awesome stay! With our proximity to both the Disneyland Theme Parks and the Anaheim Convention Center we pride ourselves on delivering service and amenities that appeal to families travelling to Anaheim. The ability to access Netflix from our televisions is one feature my kids particularly love!  Thank you again,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary: We stayed at this facility for 3 days because of its proximity to Disneyland, and we were very pleased with our stay.  This includes everything about the hotel from the rooms to the food and service and shuttle to Disneyland. What I particularly liked were the pillows. In fact I purchased one because they were delights to sleep on.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we stayed here with our daughter for our Disneyland weekend trip. When we got to our room and bathe our daughter, we found ants crawling around in the bathroom, it was really gross. The whole night we have this itchy feeling - couldn't sleep.   We did mention this incident to the front desk and they said they'll have someone look at it the next morning. But we were leaving the next day, so by then, it was no point.   I'm not sure if i ever want to stay at this location again. When it comes to insect and bugs in hotel, i get paranoid because i don't want to bring any bugs back home! And the fact that i'm traveling with a toddler who just touches everything and is curious about everything, it's not very safe!   I'm on vacation i should be relaxing and sleeping in peace. Not the
Manager Response: Dear agbells,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We always want to take the time to listen to our guests. I am so sorry to read that you had ants in your shower. No one wants to deal with pests, especially when on a vacation. I assure you this is not a common issue at our property. In fact, I confirmed with our Engineering team that this issue was addressed. I also want to note that our room cleanliness guest scores are high above the Marriott Brand Standard. I hope we have the opportunity to extend a better experience to you and your family on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a conference next door because it was slightly less expensive.  Hot tub needs a redo.  Various minor engineering and housekeeping annoyances which were taken care of if possible.  Really wish my 2nd floor room was easily accessible via stairway.
Manager Response: Hello Dan S,  Thank you for taking the time to offer feedback about your stay. I am very happy to tell you we will be re-plastering our spa before the end of the year, so I hope we will have a chance to enhance your experience during your next conference in Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez General Manager

Summary Heading: Jennifer Diggs is a SUPERB Guest Service Representative
Summary: Jennifer Diggs greeted me upon my arrival and provided superb, efficient and effective customer services with a smile.  She has outstanding interpersonal skills, very thorough and polite.  Due to Jennifer, I will book my future weekly hotel stays with this Marriott.    Jennifer is a role model for others and definitely an asset to Marriott.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The breakfast cafe was really great cindy was great felt like i was home and the room it self was amazing the beds was beyond amazing would recommend everyone to come here.. and its right next to disneyland thats amazing
Manager Response: Dear Leroy M,   Thank you for the amazing review. I have shared your kind words with my whole team, including Cindy! We can't wait to welcome you back to Anaheim on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: I got a really good deal on my room. I loved the room!!! It was super clean and seemed like the rooms have just been upgraded. The beds were very comfortable. All the staff were helpful and nice. Cindy was extremely helpful at the breakfast cafe. She was super nice! I highly recommend this hotel. It's a nice place to go with the family.
Manager Response: Dear Reyna A,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I'm so glad to read that you loved the room! Vacations are often more work than fun, so we do our best to create an experience where our guests can truly relax and enjoy their time in Anaheim. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Great value for your buck as it's everything you expect, while staying at a Marriott brand.....the best in amenities (clean and comfortable room and bed) and service.....plus a lil' exercise afoot (a reasonable walk) thrown in to and fro Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear SHanson12,  Thank you so much for your kind review. A clean room and comfortable bed are the staples of a good vacation. I look forward to welcoming you back to Anaheim on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Clean, Quiet and close to Disneyland
Summary: We loved this hotel.  There were 4 adults and 4 children in our group.  We stayed in a suite that accommodated us perfectly.  The only draw back was one bathroom.  They don't serve a free breakfast, but we found very few in the Disney area do.  This is NOT walking distance to the park, just  a short drive (they never presented themselves as within walking distance, but looking at a map you might think so).  You do have to pay for parking, which I'd like to see changed.  The staff couldn't have been nicer.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Linda K,  Thank you so much for sharing your review. I am always happy to see a five star review, but what makes your review especially satisfying is the fact that you also used it to share helpful information with other future guests. To add to your point, we are located just under one mile from Disneyland so I highly recommend guests plan on riding the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) shuttle during their stay. The shuttle runs to the theme parks every 20 minutes and will also take you to other local attractions and restaurants. Passes for the shuttle, which include unlimited rides for the day, can be purchased at the Front Desk for $5.50 (adults) and $2 (kids).

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient and perfect for a visit when near Disneyland
Summary: Great property - super friendly staff at the reception desk and in the Bistro.  We had three kids in tow - all got their breakfasts quickly as did we, and didn't fret too much when they spilled some milk on the table.  Rooms are clean, the pool is lovely on a hot day.
Manager Response: Dear Olga S,  Thank you for your kind review. I'm glad you found our hotel to be a perfect location when visiting Disneyland. I look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Anaheim on your next visit.

Summary: My family and I just stayed at the courtyard by Marriott last week. We stayed here in 2014, and last year and this trip was our third. Location and price can't be beat. It's a very short bus ride to Disneyland and close to everything.  The exterior and interior are well kept and as always, beds were comfortable. We never have issues sleeping here after a full day of Disneyland.  Staff were very professional and helpful and are always there to assist and greet. Something I wanted to point out was our positive experience with check in. I can't remember her name but she checked us in at about 630pm on Saturday August 19. She was very friendly and helpful. She also arranged to have a plate of cookies and brownies delivered to our room that had a note from "Mickey mouse and Minnie
Manager Response: Dear Justin W,  Thank you so much for your very kind review and ongoing loyalty as a guest. I love reading reviews like this because it tells people about the wonderfully special moments our team works hard to create on a daily basis. I guarantee you, that note from Mickey and Minnie was written with the hope that it would make your family's stay a magical one.

Summary: Friendly and very helpful staff.  We had four rooms here for a youth convention so several teenagers with us.  The hotel staff was great to work with!!  Special shout out to Linda at the cafe during breakfast. She was so nice and helpful.  Loved the value we received with breakfast included in the cost of our room.  Usually we would have a breakfast bar but this was a prepared to order breakfast.  Food was great and the portions were very generous.  Very clean.  Only complaint is that used towels were not replaced.  We had to ask for them daily.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl F,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. I shared your kudos with Linda and our entire team. Offering service so memorable that our guests tell stories about it is always a goal for our team. I will also make sure our team focuses a little more on the details when it comes to replenishing towels and other amenities. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We live in Northern California and decided to book a last minute trip to Disneyland for a few days. Using my Marriott Rewards points, I booked the Courtyard Anaheim Anaheim Resort for three nights.   I requested an early check in (1pm), by chance we arrived at the hotel at 1pm and were told our room packet was just completed and we could check in. So after a long drive, it was nice to get out of the car and dump our belongings for a quick rest before grabbing a bite to eat.   We just needed a simple two queen bed room for the family so we could sleep at night. This hotel provided what we needed. It was nice, it was clean. I prefer staying at Courtyards when I travel. This wasn't the nicest, but there was absolutely nothing wrong with this hotel. The grounds and room were clean.
Manager Response: Dear Eric M,  Thank you so much for staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  I appreciate the positive comments and thrilled to hear that our desk clerk was able to give you some batteries so your daughter could continue to squirt you!  Sorry you were not aware of the parking charge.  It is posted on our website and the majority of hotels in the area charge a higher fee.  Regardless, our desk staff should have informed you also.  I will follow up with them and appreciate the feedback.  I do hope the next time you come down to Anaheim you will stay with us again.     Thanks again for staying with us.

Summary: Big ups to the transport driver at the hotel from Jamaica-George Dallas. Thanks for making the trip fun and it was great catching up with another "yardie". Irie mon!    George is the best! He was on time, very personable, and we didn't have to lift a finger for the bags. He took care of everything! You are in good hands. Very safe driver also.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We arrived late and the staff was so accommodating and helpful. They showed me options even when the whole area was super busy and sold out. They were 100% booked and still managed to find a way to take care of me. Front desk staff was insanely responsive. The engineering staff was fast and prompt. Everyone has been top notch. I am a platinum elite member with Marriott and I've stayed at a lot of places. Sometimes 5 star service is only found overseas. Lost is the art of making the customer feel important in the US. Tonight - the staff at this hotel reminded me that 5 star service isn't dead yet! Well done!
Manager Response: Dear Scott,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel, and thank you for your ongoing loyalty as a Platinum Elite Member. I am very proud to read that our team did such a wonderful job taking care of you. I will make sure to share the kind words.  Sincerely,  Roger Rodriguez

Summary: This hotel is beautiful, clean and the staff go out of their way to ensure your stay is an awesome one. The pool area is the perfect place to chill for the parents while the kids play and burn energy. We weren't planning to come back next year...we've changed our minds ☺️
Manager Response: Dear terai14,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am so glad to hear that we will have the opportunity to welcome you and the famjam back to Anaheim on your next visit!

Summary: Staying at the Courtyard Marriott in Anaheim has been wonderful and a lot of fun.  The front desk and staff make you feel at home.  What stands out here besides the very clean rooms are the staff in dining!  We are food people and from early am till they close, they are fantastic and the meals are fresh and extremely yummy.    I asked to speak with the General Manager Mr. Rodriguez who was on property late in the evening to let him know we are returning back to this hotel.  We live in Seattle and travel quite often to Disneyland since we have annual passes.  Mr. Rodriguez was extremely warm, kind and professional and our family of four felt at home.   Again, the Dining staff, Ivan who is the manager had lovey recommendations for our dinner and outside the hotel.  EZ, is so
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location to Disney and Angels stadium
Summary: Decent hotel, good location, you are near the convention centre, a quick drive down to Disney and about a 10-15 min drive to Angel stadium so can't beat the location and a really decent Courtyard property, worth a check out.
Manager Response: Dear travelstheworld8181,  Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Courtyard Resort/Convention Center.  Thanks for the positive comments.  As you mentioned, our location is ideal, very close to the Convention Center, walking distance to Disneyland, and a short ride to Angel Stadium.  I hope when you come back to Anaheim you will stay with us again.  Thanks again for staying with us

Summary Heading: Easy walk to Convention Center but long walk to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed here for my daughter's sports tournament at the convention center.  She was with her team at another hotel.  Everyone on staff was pleasant and professional. (I got to see how the staff interacted with guests at the other hotel where my daughter stayed and it wasn't nearly as professional.) My room was on the first floor which was fine except I couldn't draw the curtains open or people walking outside could look directly into my room.  The decor was relaxing but the lighting was too dim for me.  The bed was firm and the pillows soft.  I slept well! There was a small refrigerator as well as a Keurig coffee maker in the room.  Housekeeping was very quiet and left lots of towels in the bathroom.   There is a restaurant in the lobby which was nice for breakfast.  I woke up
Manager Response: Dear Tuffy,  Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Courtyard Convention Center.  I am happy to know you overall enjoyed your stay.  I appreciate the comments and especially the ones we know we can have a immediate impact.  Our hotel is in a ideal location, very close to the convention center and a walkable distance to Disneyland.    I hope the next time you are in the Anaheim area you will stay with us again.  Thanks again for taking the time to write a review.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel with an easy walk to the convention center
Summary: First of all I am reviewing the COURTYARD by Marriott Anaheim Convention Center.  I noticed some reviewers in this thread are reviewing the other Marriott in the same area with the water slide. Please put your reviews in the correct place.  We had a fantastic stay at the Courtyard.  One of the cleanest hotels I have been in.  Rooms are very clean and comfortable.  It's a quick 3 minute walk to the convention center (we were here because of Vid-Con). Hotel staff were great and were there to help you with anything you might need.   We ate dinner one night at the Bistro and the food was very delicious and the prices quite reasonable for a Marriott.  We ate breakfast both mornings at the Bistro as well.  The Bistro serves Starbucks coffee. They have breakfast items such as oatmeal,
Manager Response: Dear kimod74,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about the Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We appreciate your positive comments about your hotel that is very very close to the convention center and at the same time walkable to Disneyland.  I am happy to know you had positive experiences at the hotel and the Bistro.  We strive to give our guests a great experience and work hard to keep up the cleanliness of the hotel.  I am glad to know you experienced this.  I hope the next time your travels bring you to the Anaheim area you will stay with us again.  Thanks again for the positive comments.

Summary: Friendly staff and a small water park make this an ideal stay for people visiting Disneyland. Actually, it is only a three bloc walk to the Disney empire so this will save you the $20 per day Disney parking charge. Unfortunately thew hotel mandates using their valet parking so there goes your $20. Still, it is worth it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed her June 2017 and the staff was wonderful. Everyone was accommodating from the front desk personnel to the housekeepers. The hotel is brand new, very clean, well lit and kid friendly. The pool area has a splash pad, water slides, baby pool, and small swimming pool. My 6 year loved it! The rooms are spacious and we had a great stay! It is also within walking distance of Disneyland...highly recommended!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 6 days in June and it was GREAT! The staff was wonderful at the front desk, especially Josh!! If we needed something the staff was on it fast and they made sure we were happy. We stayed in a bunk bed suite which was wonderful for our three kids, great they could all have their own beds after long days at Disney. The beds were very soft and comfortable and the rooms were spotless each day when we returned to our room! Great pool and we enjoyed the firewall. It's within walking distance of Disney as well as some local restaurants so you don't have to drive! The only negative I'd give is the dryers in the guest laundry dry for 99 min and clothes still weren't dry, took two tries to get them dry, other then that keep up the great service!
Manager Response: Dear ff1emtswife,  Thank you so much for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim Convention Center and your kind remarks about the hotel and Josh.  Our suites are perfect for children as you mentioned and in some of the suites we can fit 8 people.  Our location is great too as you eluded too also.  As far as the guest laundry, we are in the process of purchasing all new washers and dryers and should have them here within 2 weeks.  Sorry they were not here yet during your stay.  Thanks again for staying with us for almost a week and your nice comments.  The next time you are in the Anaheim area I hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: This is our favorite hotel to stay at when we vacation at Disney! It's a little hidden gem tucked behind other hotels.  The rooms are spacious, with minimal theme park decor.  The beds are very comfortable (very, very soft-which is the best part i think) The pool is a great size compared to a lot of the other hotels, it's very clean and they have a round infant pool, spa and bigger pool which goes up to 5 ft.  It's within 1 mile of Disneyland Resort theme park- which is walking distance but they also offer a tram to the park (5 minute walk to the tram).  The staff is always very nice and courteous.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly C,  Thank you so much for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us.  As you mentioned, we are just a walk away from Disneyland but there is also a shuttle down the street that gets you to the Park also.  I will pass on your positive comments to our staff also.  Thanks again for staying with us and if your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area I hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: Our family of 5 stayed for 5 nights during our trip to Disneyland and L.A. The hotel is modern and was very clean. The pool area was nice, the kids enjoyed it. The hotel is about 1 mile from the Disney entrance. We walked it in about 30 minutes. Some travelers complained about the noise, but we did not notice anymore noise than at any other hotel. All of the staff that we met were awesome, helpful also. When we returned after a long exhausting day, our room was cleaned just like it was our first day. We had the suite with 2 rooms and bunk beds for the kids, it was nice having separate areas. If you dont mind walking to Disney, this hotel was great!
Manager Response: Dear Tim M,  Thank you so much for staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim and the great review.  I am thrilled you enjoyed your stay and found the hotel to meet or exceed your expectations.  As you mentioned, our suites have bunk beds as well as a pull out couch in one room and the main room has either two queens or one king size bed.  I will definitely pass on your comments to our staff.    Thanks again for staying with us and should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area I hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: I am a Marriot member, and I have stayed in many Marriot Courtyards.  I believe this is one of the nicest I've ever stayed in.  The hotel rooms are a nice shad of gray, and very tastefully decorated.  The beds must be new (or newer) because they were very comfortable.  We did visit the pool area which had a very comfortable spa, a normal size pool, and what appeared to be a mini pool for the little ones.  There was also a nice fire pit with chairs for a small gathering.  We did visit the bar area and the waiter prepared us a very tasty margarita!  This hotel can be recommended for a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Retziger1,  Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Conference Center.  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our fire pit is perfect for the evenings, to sit around and have a cocktail or dinner.  Glad you were able to relax in our pool, spa, and our nicely appointed rooms.    I hope the next time your travels bring you back to Anaheim you will stay with us again.  Thanks again for the nice comments.

Summary: This hotel was in a convenient location with pickup available from the ART buses.  The rooms were clean and housekeeping services were very good.  There was no complimentary breakfast and the carpeting in public hallways and lobby areas was grossly dirty and disgusting. There was very little "outside/street noise".  The stay was acceptable if you could ignore the filthy carpeting.
Manager Response: Dear Betty A,  Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim.  I appreciate your comments both positive and not so positive.  The carpets have all been cleaned this last week and we have a program to ensure they stay this way.  Courtyard hotels do not serve complimentary breakfast as we have the Bistro which features Starbucks and a full menu.  We do have some packages that include breakfast as well as Disney tickets too.  I do hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: The Marriott Anaheim is closer than this Marriott Courtyard, but still close enough to walk back and forth. Free parking makes it nice. Room was comfortable and clean. Will ask if breakfast is complimentary, but don't think so. The pool was sparkly clean. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy D,  Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim.  We are about 1 block from the Convention Center in front of the Marriott as you mentioned.  We are also less than a mile from Disneyland.  I am happy to know that you found the hotel including the pool to be clean.  Our breakfast is served in The Bistro which also serves Starbucks drinks.  While it is not complimentary, there is a large variety of items to choose from.    I hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim whether it is for fun or business you will stay with us.  Thanks again for your comments and staying with us.

Summary Heading: Fine Accommodations But Service Was Lacking
Summary: My wife, two kids (5 yo and 3 yo) arrived Saturday morning and checked in to our room. We were very happy with the accommodations. The bunk beds and room separation were perfect for our situation and allowed us to maximize the utility of the room during our Disneyland nap breaks. I did feel that the room walls were extremely thin. We could hear everything going on above, below, and around. Maybe we just had a particularly raucous crowd.   We were able to purchase our ART tickets at the front desk which was convenient, and the stops are only a two minute walk from the front. The transit wasn't really even necessary given the proximity of the hotel to the parks.   The pool was nice (unheated) and there was a hot tub as well as a kiddie pool. Lots of comfy seating so this was very
Manager Response: Dear CPT_Laurion,  Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim.  I am happy to know that you enjoyed your accommodations but not thrilled to hear about the situation with your room not getting cleaned.  Please be assured we are checking in to this as this is definitely not the norm and something we take very seriously . I do so apologize for the inconveniences and frustrations you encountered.   Thanks again for staying with and I know we will not have this housekeeping issue anymore, so I am hoping you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: This is a great Marriott hotel right by the convention center.  The best and most comfortable beds and pillows I've experienced in a long time.  Spacious rooms, very clean. Great on site restaurants and walking distance to several great restaurants and Disneyland! Wonderful 4 day stay!
Manager Response: Dear Virginia G,  Thank you so much for staying with us during your DECA meeting.  We enjoyed having your group with us too.  As you mentioned, we are very close to the Convention Center and a short walk to Disney.  The next time you come to Anaheim I hope you will stay with us again.  Again, thanks for the great comments.

Summary: Minutes away from the gates of Disney Land Anaheim is located this wonderful hotel.  A large reception area welcomes the guests with a speedy check in at one of the many check in desks.  The rooms are nice and spacious and have a cozy small balcony for those who fancy it.  There are many choices to grab a meal at the premise including a Pizza Hut express outlet close to the lobby. There is also a Starbucks and FedEx office on site.  The hotel is frequented by Disney shuttle buses throughout the day, and is also short drive away from Downtown disney shopping arcade.  Many restaurants like The Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs are within walking distance from this hotel.  There is also a Target nearby.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an excellent stay at this hotel. I would really give it 4.5 stars. The kids suite was good with the bunk beds, it just needed more floor space in the main room. There was really limited space to spread out your suitcases. The hotel was a lot longer of a walk to Disneyland than advertised. The walk was about 25 minutes. There was a bus that was nearby. Our biggest complaint was that the hotel did not have the Disney channel. Very ironic considering it is a Disney good neighbor hotel. Such a bummer for our kids. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear CRLsrating,  Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim.  I am happy to know that overall you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your feedback regarding the distance and Disney Channel.  I will definitely look into it.  We have not received comments about the channels but will definitely follow up.      I hope the next time your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area you will stay with us again.  Thanks again for staying with us.

Summary: Stayed here to attend the Scrapbook Expo at the convention center.  Room was nice and overall a good stay.  Housekeeping was very good!   In my opinion it isn't close enough to the convention center or Disney to walk.
Manager Response: Dear CathySanDiego,  Thanks for staying with us at the Anaheim Courtyard.  I know we had a large group for the Scrapbook Expo and we enjoyed having your group here.  As you mentioned, our hotel is very close to the convention center and a nice walk to Disney.  We think it is a great location for everyone.  I hope that if your group is coming back here you will stay with us again or if you come to Anaheim to get away we would love to have you here.   Thanks again for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed here prior to leaving on a cruise. They picked us up from the airport at no additional cost. The customer service there was excellent. Rooms were nice and beds were comfortable. They have a few places to eat just across the parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear gabreezymonster,  Thank you so much for staying with us at the Courtyard Marriott Anaheim.  We  appreciate the great comments.  Hope you had a fun time on your cruise too.    The next time your travels bring you to Anaheim, please stay with us again.  We will look forward to accommodating you.

Summary: Room is super clean and spacious.  They have a nice lobby with a mini market for snacks, etc.  I chose this hotel because I'm attending a conference but didn't want to stay at the Hilton.  There is a walkway from the parking lot to the conference center so you don't have to walk on the busy street, which is nice.  There are several eating places around the facility.  We took a 10 minute cab ride to the Orange County Outlet Mall.  Tons of eating places and shopping galore :)  Overall, a great facility if you are staying for business or family time (which for me is both).
Manager Response: Dear Rachel709_12,  Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Marriott Anaheim while you were attending a conference.  As you mentioned, the conference center is very close to the hotel.  Disney is nearby too as well as shops and restaurants, all within walking distance.  I hope the next time your travels bring you to this great area you will stay with us again.  Thanks for the great comments and we look forward to accommodating you again in the future.

Summary: Our daughter was on Spring Break and she wanted to start her vacation at Disneyland. This hotel is only minutes away from the park. You have the option of walking to the park, or taking the city shuttle. Like many of the hotels on Harbor Blvd, you are in walking distance or a short drive to many restaurants. Parking at the hotel is free and plentiful. The folks at the front desk were helpful and competent. We had a very nice room. It was large and clean. The second room could be closed off from the main room. The room and bathroom were clean and well stocked. You can't go to bed too early, because the fireworks show at Disney is heard by all. While pricey, the restaurant does have good breakfast options, and the service is great. This is a great place for families to stay. Be
Manager Response: none

Summary: I did not enjoy our stay here and that being said I did get a good deal to stay so I wasn't expecting the most amazing visit but I would have paid a little bit more to stay another place now knowing. Sunday the front desk staff was not friendly helpful.   We typically stay at Marriott types of properties and always have very good experiences. As some other people have said the noises at this hotel are awful. I usually think some people complain about noises and it's fine but this was awful. Someone banged on their door for hours due to family issues. Followed by the upstairs guests walking back and forth all night long. I get that the hotel can not control guests but we did complain and it didn't go away. My husband and I didn't sleep one bit and I am not a person to typically
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good hotel close to Anaheim. Free parking and close to Disneyland. It is about 6 miles from there. Rooms are clean and nice and many places to eat in this area. You are close to the beach areas. They are several miles away .
Manager Response: none

Summary: I rated this room a 3 "star" because it is a clean hotel with comfortable beds.  The walls were paper thin (I could hear the conversation in the room next to me) and you could hear people walking/running in the room or hallway above us. I did not hear traffic noise as the hotel is off of Harbor, behind Ruth's Chris Steakhouse.  It is quite a distance to the Disneyland entrance and parking is $15 a night. We regularly fly out to Disneyland and this was the first time we have stayed at this hotel.  My extended family members in California stay here regularly because of the price.  Since  we wanted to spend more time with them, we decided a couple of days before our visit to stay in the same hotel.  I am mentioning this because it made a big difference in the price of the room - we
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Parking is horrible and restaurant was out of 50% of items they sell
Summary: In 2016 I had over 100 nights in Marriott Hotels.  Parking was a mess and not worth the $15 extra a night they charge.  I didn't want to go back out and fight the parking lot again, so I thought I would "dine" in, but they didn't have ingredients for flatbread, salad or chicken wings and I didn't want a burger or yogurt.  Arrrgh.  Marriott in an uncharacteristic failure.  I would think a weeks notice on FEATHER FREEE would be enough, but the pillows were still feather.  Stop asking and offering your premier guests their preference if you have no intention of executing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very disappointed about this hotel. The front staff is not very friendly, and no shuttle to Disneyland unless you want to walk next door and pay. PLUS… you have to pay to park. We reserved this hotel through the Disney Good Neighbor program. You'd think they'd be more accommodating. We are also disappointed in the Disney website for not pointing out that this is not the one across from the entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice Hotel. Nice big room. Bathroom great. Nice large towels. I would recommend this hotel if your going to Disney. It's very close and priced affordable. Lots to do in walking distance. If this review helps please let me know. Thanks
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location For Convention Center And Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is close enough to the Convention Center, Garden Center, and Disneyland to walk. This hotel does not offer free shuttle to anywhere. There is plenty of parking, but it is all outdoors. The happy hour was no great deal so I would not make it a point to attend unless you are already there. The cafe in the lobby area had good food, but closes by 10. You can purchase alcoholic beverages past that time though. The room was clean and the beds comfy. The A/C worked fabulous. The bathtub had problems draining properly, but it eventually did. Overall I would recommend this hotel for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent place close to the Convention centre and Disneyland
Summary: This is a small hotel tucked in a lane, very close to the Convention centre. The room was large and clean.  The pool side rooms have a better view. The reception staff was courteous and helpful and the room was cleaned every day. They do not have a locker in the room and I felt that a bit more light was required as the room felt gloomy in the evenings.  Ample car parking is available and there is a shortcut through the car park to walk towards the convention centre.  Overall I had a satisfactory stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here Thanksgiving week/weekend. We loved it last time and this time was no different. The beds and pillows are so comfy. Friendly front desk. We are going back to Disneyland this April and I was very disappointed to see there are no rooms available, so we will need to try something else :(
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the property because it is relatively near Disneyland. The other Courtyard property (Theme Park) will be a better choice if you plan to conveniently walk to Disneyland. However, the Theme park hotel is more expensive.  We had our doubts when reading this hotel's reviews, but since most of the reviewers agree that the hotel is clean, we decided to stay here.  Pros 1. Clean property 2. Carpets seem updated 3. Comfortable beds (typical Courtyards)  Cons 1. No warm welcome from front desk personnel 2. Booked rooms were not correctly assigned 3. No recognition on elite members 4. $15 parking. This could be pros if you think that walking around 1 mile to Disneyland is not far. You may walk around the same distance even if you park in Disneyland.  5. No complimentary
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I arrived very late a week ago due to an airline delay.  The staff were very accommodating and friendly from the minute we stepped out of the taxi.  Offering late dinners, meeting all requests and answering all questions,  just saying hello to every guest they encountered...exceptional customer focus!  Thank you to all Staff and Management who made our stay truly relaxing and enjoyable!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Loved staying at this hotel. It was extremely clean and the maids cleaned up every day and accommodated our requests promptly. Front desk was extremely helpful as well. There is no continental breakfast. However there is a coffee station and bar that also serves some food.  These were extremely pricey, especially the drinks.  I know it's tourist area, but it was ridiculous.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Off the Beaten Path but Quiet at Night !
Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard Marriott while attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  It's address is 2045 South Harbor Blvd, but it is not on the main street.  To get to the hotel, you walk down a driveway beside Ruth Chris' Steak House, and the hotel is basically behind it.  The good news is that being off the main street you don't get the noise and traffic as you do with the other hotels.  The bad news is that the driveway leading to the hotel, and Harbor Blvd in general is not very well lit.    The room was clean, the lobby well appointed, and the bistro/bar convenient.  Food everywhere was expensive, so we were pleasantly surprised by the breakfast we ate there.  We had the daybreak -- eggs, bacon, potatoes and toast for $ 11.20.  This was actually cheaper
Manager Response: none

Summary: Positives: The staff was generally friendly. The common areas of the hotel are clean. The hotel is walking distance from the Disneyland and there are lots of restaurants also within walking distance. I only had breakfast on site but it was delicious. I traveled during a fairly busy season and my room was right off of the elevator but my room was quite. This is a family friendly hotel and the rooms are insulated well enough that the noise from people getting on and off of the elevator did not disturb me. Guests are allowed to control the temperature in the room.   Negatives: Linens are of very poor quality. The sheets and towels were abrasive and not very comfortable to use. The rooms are not thoroughly cleaned between guests. There was a gross sticky substance on the headboard
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for a convention
Summary: Stayed here for three nights for a convention and found the hotel to be clean, accommodating, and friendly.  They have a little bistro for breakfast and dinner plus a bar and a number of eating places within walking distance.  Safe, quick 6-7 minute walk to the convention center.....  All in all an enjoyable place to stay!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location for conference at main marriott
Summary: Location was good for walking back and forth to a conference at the main Marriott.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Front desk was very accommodating of my request for a 4th floor room.  No complaints of noise issues.  View of the Disneyland fireworks was nice.  Able to walk to Disneyland in about 20-30 minutes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Marriott never disappoints.  Rooms are always clean, comfortable and quiet.  We stayed in a Budget motel for the first part of our trip and then moved over the Marriott.  It was like coming home when we walked into our clean room.  Beds and bedding are always super comfortable.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here with my husband and my 2 young children.  We booked this hotel as a Disneyland vacation pkg.  We thought we were booking the Courtyard/theme park entrance, but mistakingly booked this hotel which is one mile from the park.
