We walked to and from Disneyland 6 days with a double stroller, over one mile, which was exhausting.  I do not recommend this hotel if you are taking your family to Disneyland.  The staff is rude and unhelpful.  For example: we couldn't get an early checkin. So they held our luggage when we went to Disneyland the 1st day.  When we got back to the hotel that night, Josh was at the front desk watching a football game.  He repeatedly said, "I'll bring up your bags right away".  He said this 3 times in a row.  We waited 45 mins for him to bring the
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love staying here!! Im a marriott rewards member, but I would recommend this to anyone staying for a convention as they have a great breakfast set up, they have comfy seats to have a business chat in down the lobby, the rooms are super clean and comfy beds as always. I love it as my escape after a long conference day every year. Front desk staff are always accommodating with travel requests and they are always extra courteous with regards to holding my packages if i forget something and need to ship it to myself. Thumbs up!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful room, exceptional customer service! Greg is amazing!
Summary: I had one of the best hotel experiences with the Courtyard Marriott in Anaheim. Our family suite was amazing, and it was cleaned on a daily basis to an exceptional standard. The room offered a gorgeous view, very comfy beds, as well as a tv with internet connectivity (allowing access to Netflix/ Youtube)- which all members of my family were able to enjoy. I wanted to specifically commend the level of customer service shown by all staff- including front desk/ reception, housekeeping, valet services etc. All staff were fantastic to deal with, always very happy to help, and very polite. Special mention must be given to one of the front desk/ reception-based staff by the name of Greg. Greg was incredibly helpful, very understanding, and went the extra mile to ensure our family was
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great Hotel for Disney. About a 10 minute walk to the park entrance. Huge room and great cafe to buy breakfast which had a really good selection. Room was very clean, comfy beds and really helpful staff. Much cheaper than the Marriott by the Park Gates and not difference in walk to the entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not a far walk (about 15 min) to the park entrance.  Hotel is nice and clean. Guest service and staff are friendly and accomoding.   Our room is a standard 2 queen and our family of 4 stayed here comfortably for a week.   The restaurant downstairs has great food and the kids enjoyed the pool. Laundry room is nice and almost a necessity when staying this long. Overall great experience!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this particular hotel through a package from Costco/Disney.  The family suite was spacious for our family of 4.  The kids utilized the side with the bunk beds which featured a sliding door.  This was convenient when getting ready for the Disneyland races which start at 5:30 a.m.  The room features include a refrigerator and microwave.  There are drug/convenience stores in walking distance.  We weren't in the hotel too much but we found the housekeeping to be adequate and they always left the room refreshed and replenished with towels and shampoo, soap, etc.  The elevator was extremely slow so we attempted to use the stairs; however, there was a horrible stench in the stairwell so we opted to take the elevator from then on.  The hotel is a manageable walk to the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Accommodations, Close to ART Bus pickup, and Disneyland/California Adventure!
Summary: It was a delightful stay! The front desk staff was very helpful. I was able to get an early check in, which allowed me to get all of my "stuff" to my room before heading off to California Adventure to meet family. The early check in allowed me to NOT worry about my "stuff" being in my car in the parking lot, as I knew I would be returning after the Park closed that night.   My room card didn't work (I only asked for one), so I went back to the front desk and I was given 2 new cards and was told that if those didn't work that they would send someone up to check the door. Very helpful. One of the two cards did work.   The room was very nice. Housekeeping had done an excellent job. Beds, bathroom, and all the rest - nicely done, no complaints, and the A/C-fan was on.   The Front
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was an excellent choice for our family vacation. From the great size pool to the tasty food. My husband and I enjoyed sitting by the fire pit at the end of a long day. The best part of our experience was the helpful staff especially Alex at the front desk. From the moment we checked in he made sure that we were well taken care of. He helped us upgrade our room, he made sure we knew what shuttle to take to Disney, and he answered all of our questions about the surrounding area. His customer skills were exceptional and we will definitely be staying here again. Thank you for a great experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Typical courtyard experience except with more families because of Disneyland. Older property but does have the newer lobby and a comfortable Market restaurant where the menu was limited, but good food.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good quality for the dollars; convenient to convention center
Summary: The Courtyard Convention Center provides good quality rooms, good wireless access, and pleasant front desk staff.  I was attending a conference at the Marriott Convention Center and saved $50+ per night staying at the Courtyard, which was a mere 5 minute walk.  It would also be convenient to anyone attending events at the Convention Center itself. Fifteen or twenty minute walk to a good selection of restaurants on Katella.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here because we had a major conference at the Convention Center. It was about 5-7 minutes walking distance away. The hotel was comfortable and safe when we walked across parking lots of other hotels late at night to get to the Courtyard. I liked my  upgraded suite. The service was excellent. My only complaint is that I could hear the guests in the room above me stomping across the floor at all times of the night and early morning and it really annoyed me.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your conference.  I agree the location is very convenient to the convention center and the pathway a great shortcut to get back to your hotel quickly.  I'm pleased you were comfortable and you enjoyed the service from our staff.  Thank you again, we look forward to your return visit.

Summary Heading: Clean and a nice place to stay near Disneyland. Price was a bit high.
Summary: I would recommend this hotel!  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The room and hotel were very clean. The room was nicely decorated and the bed was comfortable.  I liked their artwork and flow of the room.  It was close enough to Disneyland that it wasn't to far to walk.  It would have been nice if there was a breakfast included like many of the hotels in the area offer.  I think the parking charge of $15 a day was too much for the area.  The price was not as good as other hotels in the area, which a similar level of quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I'm happy to hear you enjoyed the decor, comfort and cleanliness of your room.  I understand your feelings about the parking charge, however, we try to keep the cost competitive as we are one of the few hotels in Anaheim that don't require you to park with a valet.  Also, our rates fluctuate during the year, you may wish to consider a return visit during off peak times, it can much more affordable, if your schedule allows.  I appreciate your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a meeting in July 2016.  It is about a 5 minute walk to the Marriott Hotel Convention Center (across parking lot) and 10 minutes to the convention center.  It is very convenient for that.  It is a much smaller hotel than Marriott.  It has a small convenience area by front desk (market) and a restaurant / bar that is open limited hours.  We had breakfast there each day and it was quick, tasty, and reasonably priced for Anaheim.  Averaged about $15/pp for breakfast which included coffee.  Has other options for less money as well.  Pool and hot tub are nice (not huge but adequate to cool down and relax).  It has a fire pit outside that was very nice as well.  No concierge at this hotel so you have to use the front desk.  You could hear some noise from other
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I agree our location is great when attending a convention.  The pathway between our hotel and the Anaheim Marriott/Convention Center is a hidden gem.  I'm pleased to hear you found time to relax and enjoy the hotel amenities after what I'm sure was a packed agenda.  I hope we get the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This hotel does not have good sound proofing system. You can hear every single step taken by the person above you. Worse if there's a kid in the room cos it's thump thump THUMP non stop, back and forth. Between the several occupants in the room, I feel like I have a herd of elephants above me. Location wise, it's convenient. Staff are courteous and that's about it. Unless you have a room on their highest floor (4th floor) or you are tolerant of the thumping sound, stay somewhere else.  Now, if you're a family going to Disney, this place is perfect for you. If you're a business traveler attending a conference at the convention center, avoid this place if you want some quiet time to work and have a restful sleep. I'm stuck here for 3 nights as I booked the room based on the
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I'm sorry your rest was disturbed by neighbors.  I'd like the opportunity to discuss your experience.  Please contact me at (714) 740-2645.  I'm pleased you found our location convenient and staff courteous.  I look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: Everything here was perfect for our short stay in Anaheim in July. Location was excellent in terms of theme park proximity. Hotel felt new and incredibly clean and polished. Room was large and comfortable. Staff were super friendly and helpful. Best part was the waterpark, which our whole family loved.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here with our 2 children (6&4) for 2 weeks and couldn't fault it. It's in walking distance of Disneyland and has most items you would expect. In room wifi works well and there is a useful laundry room. Plenty of parking and a number of restaurants in walking distance. You can get a Starbucks coffee in the lobby. Pool is nice and open until 10pm. There is a little gym which I used once without any problem. Huntington  and Newport beaches are about 30 minute drive. The drive to Hollywood is hellish tho. Sat nav would tell you 30 mins, but it's a good 1 Hour 30 mins! Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us and taking time to review our hotel.  I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit and took advantage of the amenities we offer.  I'm sorry you experienced our infamous Southern California traffic.  It can be challenging at times.   We are conveniently located in the center of all the most desired attractions and destinations which helps reduce those long commutes.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Consider this hotel on your next visit to Disneyland!
Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland and located behind Ruth's Chris.  The lobby area is modern with lots of comfortable seating and a restaurant.  They also provide complimentary ice-cold water in the lobby - perfect for a hot day - although the AC in the lobby wasn't as cooling!  Check-in agents were friendly and wore smiles on their faces.  Check-in was quick too.  The rooms were nicely appointed with modern decor, and also spacious.  Room to walk around comfortably with a nice chair in a corner.  Bathrooms were also more spacious than usual and stocked with Paul Mitchell products.  TV has 40 channels (4 HBO channels).  Beds were comfortable.  I believe the mattress is a foam top.  Hotel also has its own parking (for a fee) and there are several entrances
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing comments.  I am very happy you took advantage of the many amenities we offer.  I'm also glad you were pleased with the service you received from our staff.  They strive to make your stay enjoyable and your comments suggest we succeeded in most ever instance.  I appreciate the time you took to give such a detailed review.  We hope you'll be back soon.

Summary: Recently stayed in a family suite that can sleep 8.  It amazes me that for a room that supposedly sleeps 8 people that there is only 1 bathroom and that the vanity is in the same room as the shower and toilet.  How in the world are 8 people supposed to get ready in the morning in a reasonable amount of time? If is difficult to put on make up outside the room because there are only 2 small spot lights in the vestibule. There are signs in the bathroom asking guests to reuse towels but there is only 1 hook on which to put towels.  Also, as mentioned in several reviews, one day only half our room was cleaned.  Only one of the queen beds was made.  On the positive side, we did have plenty of towels, the staff at the front desk was very helpful and friendly and the lobby area was a
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding the hotel.  I'm glad you found the amenities of our hotel plentiful and appropriate for your needs.  I can understand the challenge of herding 8 folks in the morning.  It reminded me of my childhood and our family getting ready for school.  I have talked with our staff regarding the cleaning of your room and engineering about enhancing our water conservation efforts.  I appreciate the time you took to share your experience and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Several broken keycard systems make entry/exit a pain
Summary: I am a loyal Marriott Rewards member but I will never stay here again. The rooms are smallish, with a tiny fridge, but cheap amenities, and no views except of the back of other hotels or apartment complexes.  I guess it's convenient to Disneyland, but that means rude families who let their kids run up and down the halls making noise at all hours. But the worst was that not 1, not 2, but 3 of the exits had broken key card systems which meant that from the parking lot you had to drag your suitcases in through the pool gate, around the pool area, and in through the back of the restaurant every single time you needed to get in or out of the hotel. I was there 3 days and at no time did the hotel attempt to fix the problem. In addition, no warning or apology was made about the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I would love the opportunity to discuss the details of your stay and learn more about your experience. Please contact me at (714) 740-2645. I look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: A great option when going to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is exactly one mile from the entrance of Disneyland. Our family of four (two teens, two parents) walked there and back with no problem (there are hotels all along Harbor Blvd with throngs of Disney-goers walking to in the a.m. and from in the p.m.). The hotel has on-site parking for $15/day (which is no more than paying for the Disney lot and was very convenient. Beyond the features related to Disney access...  It is a typical Courtyard Marriott...clean, comfortable, and great service. The outdoor pool was fantastic (not eensy but not huge) with comfortable deck furniture. While there is not a free breakfast, they do offer breakfast downstairs and also sell Starbuck's coffee. I would absolutely stay  here again if I return to Disney and/or the Anaheim Convention
Manager Response: I'm so glad you found our amenities and location a great fit for your family.  I'm also pleased you found our hotel was clean, comfortable and great service from our staff members.  They all work hard to make your stay enjoyable.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great Location, Not So Great Service
Summary: This is a newer hotel and it is conveniently located close to the Disneyland Resort and Convention Center.  Unfortunately they need some work/improvement in their housekeeping department.   Our stay consisted of 3 nights...The second day our room was cleaned, however we never received any fresh towels (our used towels were placed on the floor and removed from our room).  The next day, housekeeping did not show up at all.  Beds were not made up and we had no towels...again!  Luckily security was able to help with the towel situation.  I expect better customer service, especially from the Marriott chain.
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apologies for our failure in providing you ample towels during your stay.  Unfortunately, we did recently experience laundry difficulties which delayed delivery of fresh towels, this has been addressed.  I'm so sorry it disrupted your stay.  I do hope you'll give us the opportunity to earn back the trust you have placed in our hotel and Marriott.

Summary Heading: Great hotel tucked away from the street, yet close to everything
Summary: Room is beautiful and spacious. Very clean with great staff overall. There are some noisy guests who don't seem to teach their kids manners, but that will occur at any hotel. This hotel is perfect for business or pleasure due to the room layouts.   I'm looking forward to coming back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for review.  I have to agree the hotel being tucked away from Harbor boulevard makes for a great location!  I'm glad you found our rooms and staff enjoyable.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We recently completed a stay here and was very pleased on all fronts! Staff, Cleanliness, Accommodations, and Safety are extremely important to us when we travel, and this location scored well in these areas. Brittany is the one staff member we interacted with the most, but all the staff was courteous and helpful.  We have outgrown the double bed occupancy space and this location gave us the most bang for our buck for a one week stay in Anaheim. While it's true that most of our time was spent outside of the room, we came for Mickey and the surrounding attractions, who wants to come back to a cramped room. The King suite gave our 3 kids their own space complete with bunk beds, while me and my DH enjoyed the comfy King bed with a sliding door to give us some quiet and privacy.  We
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and the spacious suite!  I appreciate your kind words about our staff, and in particular, Brittany.  We think she's amazing too.  Thank you for taking time to review your experience.  I hope we get to welcome you back soon.

Summary: We checked in early – that went well and the staff was very friendly.  They offered to take out bags and allowed us to change if needed, and they would call us when our room is ready.    Our room was a king room on the 2nd floor overlooking the pool.  The room size was unexpected, in a good way.  The bed was comfortable.  Although we were fairly close to the elevator, it didn’t bother us at all.  We ate breakfast and had Starbucks coffee downstairs before heading to Disneyland.  That was very convenient.  It was not a free breakfast, but it was better than paying top dollar inside the park.  The park itself is about a mile away.  They have a shuttle for a fee but it departs from the Marriott just down the street.  We decided to take an Uber for $5 as I have a foot injury and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I'm happy you found the staff accommodating and the unexpected touches to enhance your visit.  I'm also glad you found The Bistro to be convenient and a value.  We appreciate you staying with us and I hope you were able to rest your foot.  I hope you feel well soon.

Summary Heading: Clean and conveniently located to convetion center
Summary: Hotel is clean and staff are friendly. Only thing I can say why I give it a 4 star is the noise on my floor (2nd floor). My room is the extension of a suite so I can hear the kids next door. For a light sleeper it can be distracting,
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  I appreciate your comment about our staff, and the cleanliness of the hotel.  I'm sorry about the noise from your neighbors.  Our kids' suites have been known to excite our smaller guests.  On your next visit, please call us before your stay, and we'll do our best to place you in a room to have a pleasant sleep.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We arrived 2 hours before check in but got a room immediately. Decent sized room clean and comfy. The staff are great! The Starbucks not so much. About a 20 min walk to Disneyland (to the gate). We cabbed home most days $7. The pool is ok but the hot tub is nice after a long day. Best part is the flavoured water in the lobby. Decent location for a great price!
Manager Response: I'm so happy you we were able to check you in early!  I appreciate your comments regarding the staff, room, and other amenities that enhanced your stay.  I'm sorry Starbucks did not meet your expectations.  Please feel free to contact me so I may better understand how we can improve.  I appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice property at a nice location
Summary: We stayed at this property because of its proximity to the Angeles Stadium.  But didn't realize its proximity to Disneyland as well.  This made for a strange mix of baseball fans and family vacationers.  The property is nicely located in a central location to many amenities.  It was a nice place to stay.  Definitely above average.  The Starbucks in the lobby was a nice draw, but the lack of a full breakfast option aside from Starbucks was different.  Great if you are going to see a baseball game with adults.  With refrigerators in the room I'd say it would be great for families as well, but the lack of a microwave (could be available upon request, we didn't ask), made it a little less family friendly.
Manager Response: I agree, our hotel is centrally located near Disneyland, Angels Stadium, and the Honda Center.  While we don't serve a buffet, The Bistro has a full menu from light snacks to a full breakfast which is great with a latte or cappuccino!  We do offer microwaves in our suites and all guests are welcome to use the microwave located in The Market.  I appreciate your review and am happy you found us!  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Good location and got a great deal!
Summary: We got a great deal through Expedia - buy 4 nights get 2 free. Ended up being much cheaper than most hotels in the area. Had everything we needed. Was about a 20-25 minute walk to Disneyland which was fine for us and our 2 year old in her stroller. LOVED the beds and pillows. I normally hate hotel beds and especially pillows but these were great! Everyone we encountered was nice. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Disneyland.  I'm glad you found our beds and pillows so comfortable.  It is so nice to have a restful sleep after a long day at the park.  When you return to the area, we'll be happy to welcome you back!

Summary: Arrived early, not able to check in.   Able to leave luggage at front desk.   Hotel is average, but clean. Conciege service nothing to speak of.   Asked for recommendations for dining, they handed me a brochure from Anaheim Visitors bureau filled with paid advertisement.  They did not have any phone numbers for Marriott properties in the area (to dine in), nor willing to look them up.   In other words, your on your own.   Also they knew, but failed to let me know that the computers automatically shut off at a certain time every night, and are slow and work on a hit and miss basis. (Only one of two worked). There are mini refrigerators in the room that get cool but not cold.   In other words you may risk spoiled food.   I filled up ice bags to keep it cool but of course they all
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review.  I would love the opportunity to discuss the details of your experience and learn more about your concerns.  Please contact me at (714) 740-2645.  I look forward to speaking with you.

Summary Heading: Great cost benefit, just 5 minutes form the disneyland parking, great breakfast
Summary: We usually stay at the Marriot Courtyard, cause they are very well located, have a nice cost benefit ratio, and offer nice ammenities such as a nice restaurant/cafe with a very good and reasonable priced breakfast and pool. The rooms are clean, complete, and the hotel has a nice pool. It wasn't a fancy hotel, but worth the stay.There were others courtyard marriots in the neighborhood that seemed better and fancier, but they were a bit more expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  I'm happy you found our hotel to be a value.  I agree with your comments regarding our restaurant, pool & location.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: Went to Anaheim to take kids to Disneyland. This hotel was clean and comfortable. The pool was warm and clean. It is a short walk to the convention center and the ART and Disneyland Express airport shuttle stops. Keep in mind that you have to haul all your luggage with you for that "short walk" if you utilize the Disneyland Express airport shuttle. The city blocks in this area are very long, so bring good walking shoes if staying there. The folks at the front desk were extremely helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: I'm so glad to hear the amenities and location of our hotel worked well for you.  I think you're right, good walking shoes are so important, especially at the park!  Thank you for your kind words regarding the front desk staff.  We look forward to your next visit and thank you for staying with us!

Summary Heading: WHY didn't I think of the Courtyard Marriott before!!!
Summary: One mistake I've made by staying at the Courtyard Marriott is not staying here all these passed years!!! Originally from the South Bay, my husband and I always attend an annual conference held at the Anaheim Convention Center in the spring. In the past, we've done the cheap route by just driving for the 3 day event, staying at a friends home in the area, but last year, we finally decided to just stay at the Convention. We stayed at a hotel closer to the convention grounds - but the crowd of the 40,000 people attendance conference and foot traffic made it inevitably rackety and disorderly.  We then tried the Courtyard. I am certainly not the one to like to stay at a commercial-branch hotel and neither am I would be compelled to answer their after stay surveys or even rave an
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for your glowing review.  I'm so happy you found us and you enjoyed your stay.  I'm obviously a fan of our location too.  We're centrally located to the convention center and Disneyland, but tucked away from Harbor Boulevard which can provide a much needed respite after a long day on the convention floor or Disneyland!  Thanks for trying us, I'm glad we made you a believer!  Have fun in San Diego!

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel.  Short Walk to the Convention Center
Summary: Stayed here while attending a conference in the Anaheim Convention center.  Clean and comfortable with good service.  About a 5 minute walk over to the convention center.  Lots of good restaurants nearby, including a Morton's Steak House right next door. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  Just one of the wonderful things about our location is the proximity to so many restaurants and our shortcut to the convention center.  I am pleased you found your stay comfortable.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay while in Aneheim
Summary: Here in Anaheim for a convention at Disney, we stayed at the Courtyard Hotel, right near Disney and the convention center. Lots of restaurants and tsores nearby. The pool area and sitting area are outside is nice, The service is good as well. Could do a lil better in amenities, but was a comfortable stay for us. ( Could not fix a proper cocktail!).   Overall, I would put this Courtyard as better than average in location, comfortable place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I'm glad you enjoyed our service and pool/sitting area outside.  I hope you were able to enjoy the fire pit at night.  We will definitely discuss the art of a proper cocktail and work to improve it.  Thanks for the feedback!

Summary: We booked this hotel months ago for three nights at a great rate.  A few days before we realized that we could go down to Disneyland a day early, so we called and to add a night was an insane amount.  We decided to just use Hotel Tonight and left in the middle of the night Wednesday morning.  Around 3am we called the hotel directly and they amazingly added a room for us at the rate we booked!  So incredibly happy to not have to hotel hop.  We get there at about 530am and we didn't expect any room available, but they gave us the parking pass to park so we could go enjoy Disneyland for a few hours.  Got the kids dressed in the bathroom there and walked over to Disneyland.  It's about a mile walk.  In the morning it totally feels like an ok walk, the way back though we were
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the wonderful compliments.  I'm so happy to hear you were able to enjoy Disneyland a day early.  Your appreciate of our housekeeping staff is greatly appreciated, they work so hard and it's kind of you to praise their efforts.  I agree we're a walkable distance from the park, but can relate to the walk seeming longer after a full day's worth of fun.  For your next visit, you may wish to consider our "Stay for Breakfast" package which includes breakfast for 2 adults and 2 children under 12.  Please extend our best wishes to your daughter for her birthday.  Unfortunately, we missed the chance to celebrate this time, but please know we're currently developing some fun surprises for special occasions.  Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Good hotel and good hotel service, not so good troubleshooting staff
Summary: The location was great. I was in Anaheim for a convenition and it is very convieniently located next to the Anaheim Convention Center and walking distance to restaurants and pharmacies. Overall the experience was good until I checkout, they over billed me on some items, didnt get me the correct amount of Marriott rewards points and it took them several phone calls and days to get it fixed. However while I was there, the service was great and the facilities were good too (not very new).
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Anaheim Convention Center.  I appreciate the positive comments about the staff, hotel and location.  I do apologize for the issues you encountered in getting your Marriott Reward Points.  I realize it did get done, but it got completed the hard way.  I have addressed this with the staff so they understand the urgency and have the knowledge for our guests to receive their points.  I do hope the next time you are in the Anaheim area you will stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Walking Distance to the Convention Center
Summary: I was attending a show in the convention center but didn't want to be in the convention center hotel, the Marriott and Hilton next door. The larger hotels had to many people and to much going on for me, but I really needed to be close, this is the place.   Let me tell you about their customer service...they had a gas leak on the day we were there on our floor. They put me on the first floor in a room just for 2 hours so I could work and gave me points the next day....even in bad times, they still took care of me! Thank you, when I am in Anaheim, I will be in your hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review on the Courtyard Anaheim Resort at the Convention Center.  As you mentioned, we are in a prime location, close to the convention center and Disney.  I so appreciate your positive comments about our customer service.  We were doing our best under unfortunate circumstances, and so happy we were able to meet your needs.  The next time you are in the Anaheim area, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed for three days on a recent family vacation during the Christmas holiday season. The rates were very competitive, given the proximity to Disney, and the hotel cleanliness and upkeep. You can expect the usual amenities found in a Courtyard property. The hotel staff are also friendly and polite. The only complaint was the in-hotel dining- they didn't move with much urgency no matter how long the line was. All in all, this stay was easy and enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Anaheim Courtyard Convention Center Resort.  As you mentioned, we are in a perfect location for Disney and restaurants.  I appreciate the positive comments about the staff, upkeep and cleanliness.  As well, I appreciate the feedback about The Bistro.  I will definitely follow-up on this as our goal is to give great service, swiftly, and a great meal.  I hope the next time you visit Anaheim you will stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Don't judge a hotel by its name....
Summary: My family and I are Disneyland passport holders, and we usually book a hotel for a night or two, to make sure we get rest and really enjoy the park. My 7 year old grandson wanted to do Disney for his birthday...but El Nino finally hit southern Cali. When we heard there would be a lull in the storm, we made a last minute booking. Normally, we stay at the Marriott Convention Hotel. But, I decided to research if there were a suite we could all stay, instead of booking two rooms. My daughter suggested the courtyard as she and her husband had a great experience. Lo and behold...they had a family suite. The first room was a nice size two queen room, with a sliding door. The second room was awesome for the kids. A Pullout sofa bed and two twin bed. They had their own TV, as well as a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim.  I am so happy you were able to make it to our area during the lull in the rainstorm.  Our family suites are loved by as you mentioned.  The bunk beds and pull out sofa in the second bedroom is conducive for work or play.  Add the microwave and refrigerator in the mix and you get it all.  We do have great amenities and we look forward to you coming back and spending more time here and getting to enjoy them.  Again, thanks for staying with us.

Summary: Stayed two nights during the New year's eve holiday. Hotel staff is very accommodating and friendly! They let us check in about 9:00 am on New Year's eve with no problem or extra charges to the account. The lobby is clean and welcoming, they have an app available for hotel check in and check out in case guests don't want to wait in line. The rooms were clean and spacious and included a Keurig (my favorite part). ART picks guests up at the next hotel which is a Marriott. The courtyard is about 3 city blocks away from the maingate to Disney which is doable in the morning, but after a long day of walking and being in the park, I would definitely recommend getting an ART pass.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind reviews about the Courtyard Anaheim Resort.  I am glad we were able to check you in early.  If we have rooms available we do our best to accommodate our guests.   Our proximity is perfect for the Convention Center and for Disney and as you mentioned, ART Transportation is right around the corner and we sell tickets at the hotel.  Thank you so much for staying with us and look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this property for our Spring holidays and enjoyed our room plus the surrounding neighborhood. Just a short drive to Disney and even Universal studios not far. Quite street and safe place. The rooms are smaller in size and bathrooms very tight space but clean and modern. Breakfast was good and friendly staff. Our AC did not work on our first night and made noice. Upon compliant to the morning manager, it was fixed and they granted us free complimentary breakfast that morning! Room service and house keeping was upto the Marriott standards. Overall a good place, family friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim Convention Center.  I am so happy you enjoyed your stay.  I do apologize for your AC issue and glad it was fixed and you enjoyed your breakfast.  As you mentioned, our location is perfect.  I do hope you come back to Anaheim and enjoy our area again and if you do we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary: The Courtyard Anaheim Hotel was generally acceptable/routine overall, and the proximity to the convention center was great, but the sheets and washcloths were stained.  Sorry, but that's disgusting.  The breakfast also wasn't worth the price paid for it.  The breakfast potatoes were like bad fries.  Write this one off for a while.
Manager Response: Thank you staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort.  I am so sorry your experience was not as it should have been.  I have shared your comments with our housekeeping and laundry department so they can see how this can effect our guests stay.  As well, I have followed up with our kitchen staff to make sure we are cooking everything to the Courtyard standards.  If you do come back to Anaheim, I would love for you to give us another try.  If so, please contact me directly.  Again, I apologize for your inconveniences and hope you will give us another opportunity to experience our Courtyard the way it should be.

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights just before Christmas.  Rooms were well presented and very clean.  Spa Pool was super nice at night, and pool was warm.  It was really good having a place to do laundry too.  The coffee from restaurant was really good and reasonably priced.  We got home one night and no ones keys worked for entry/either room. Front desk soon sorted this though!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us at the Anaheim Courtyard Resort/Convention Center.  We truly appreciate your nice comments.  Our Starbucks coffee area is a great amenity and I am so happy you enjoyed it.  I will pass your comments on to our staff too.  I hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you will stay with us.  Happy Holidays.

Summary: Our room with two queen beds was very comfortable and spacious.  The linking doors between rooms means if kids are going crazy next door you can definitely hear it in your room -- but I've experienced louder rooms.  They seemed to have a problem with issuing washcloths -- perhaps a water saving measure -- because we had to ask for them constantly as they disappeared every day.  But we had plenty of towels.  The ART does not pick up directly from this hotel -- you have to walk to the Marriott next door.  We were high enough and on the Disney side that we could see the fireworks from our room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort.  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  I have followed up with our housekeeping department regarding not getting enough washcloths so it does not happen again with other guests.  I do apologize for the inconvenience.   I hope that when your travels bring you back to Anaheim you will stay with us again.  Again, thanks for staying with us.

Summary: Comfy rooms, welcoming staff and a great location! My mom and I stayed here for 3 nights and found everything and everyone exceptional. The gentleman at the front desk when we checked in was extremely nice (the people in front of us had A LOT of questions, which he answered without seeming bothered) and offered to answer any of our questions or give directions. Our room was nice and spacious for the 2 of us and, most importantly, it was CLEAN. Of course the location was ideal- just down the street from Disneyland and almost across the street from the Toy Story Lot. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us at the Anaheim Courtyard.  We appreciate your kind comments about our staff and the hotel.  I will definitely pass it on to them.  Our location is fantastic, you can walk or take a bus to Disney as you know.  We are so glad you enjoyed yourself and we  look forward to accommodating you the next time your travels find you in our area.

Summary: We stayed here for one night last Sunday, to get an early start to Disneyland Monday. Parking was plentiful, with good sized stalls. Our room was very comfortable and clean. They have two tables/desks that are really convenient. There's a small table that fits over the couch, and another one under the TV counter that also came in very handy when we decided to grab some dinner and eat in our room.   Darryl (sp.?) at the front desk was absolutely awesome. Because we're both allergic to down, we had to request feather-free pillows. The husband made the request in person, and after about an hour and a half and still no pillows, I called downstairs and Darryl answered the phone. His telephone manners are excellent. He said he saw the request and was surprised no one delivered said
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us the evening before you big day at Disney.  I have shared with Darrell your kind remarks and appreciate you mentioning that.  At the same time, I apologize for the time it took you to get your foam pillows but happy it turned out positive in the end.  I hope the next time your travels take you to the Anaheim area you will stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed here to be able to access the best of what Anaheim has to offer - ie a conference at the convention center (oh the life we lead at Moresby Information Services). I liked the room and the bed was comfortable. It could have had some more power points near the bed (a benefit of having jetlag is the amount of time you're able to spend working on your laptop) and in the end I had to hijack the alarm clock's power. Bathroom worked and shower was good.  I have to say that the staff were excellent - always really helpful and friendly (as if they meant it too, not just because it was part of the rule book). Against a broad benchmark of hotels I've stayed in, I'd rate it four stars but if you factor in what you get for the money, it deserves five stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing and staying at the Courtyard Anaheim.  Our location is grand to experience all that Anaheim and the surrounding area has to offer.  I am happy you found the staff to be of excellent service to you.  We pride ourselves on this and glad you were able to experience it this way.  I appreciate all your comments about the room too.  I hope you come back to our area, and if you do, we would love to have you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Pleasant Stay at a Pleasant Hotel w/ a Pleasant Price
Summary: Whether you're going to Disneyland or a function at the Convention Center or just generally staying in the area, this is a great option. With so many other hotels currently in the vicinity and new ones being built, it could be a hard decision to pick one out of many. We took a chance on this one and it was a great decision. It also helps this is a Courtyard Marriott name, which in my experience is a reliable enough name in hotels.   The price for 5 nights was beyond reasonable in an area we expected to be a lot more. We were coming to Southern California for several things, including one day at Disneyland, so this was in a good general area for us.  For those coming for Disneyland, it's about a 3 long block walk to the entrance, which is not bad at all. There's plenty of
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.   As a valued guest, we appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a great stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations.    Your feedback is integral to our ability to continue to improve our service. Thank you again for your time and come visit us again soon!

Summary: Not the best, not the worst ever. Just ok. There are lots of choices in Anaheim. So far I have tried two and would not choose this Courtyard again. I would look for closer to the park entrance and/or free breakfast and/or a Marriott that recognized my status and provided something like an upgrade or concierge lounge. Room upgrade denied here. The customer service was lacking both at check in and at the food service counter.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a room with bunk beds and a sliding door to allow some privacy. Nice room layout, bathrooms a bit dated, but clean. Excellent service. Alex at the front desk was very helpful, as it was our first time to Disneyland, he answered our multiple questions and took the extra time to give us tips and details. Pool was large, heated and generally very quiet. 10 minute walk to the park entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was fantastic! We got a great AAA rate online, but it was for 2 queens, which wasn't our first choice. Brittney at the front desk was wonderful, upgrading us to a king at the same rate! When we returned from dinner, there was a card slid under the door wishing us a happy anniversary, and 2 complimentary drinks. I have only ever received a note twice in my travels, and both were from wonderful folks at Courtyard properties. I recommend this hotel for anyone who wants excellent service, and a short 10 minute walk to Disney! We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great to have a room with room for the family.
Summary: This hotel has a family suites that include a set of bunk beds along with the regular beds and sofa bed. For larger families like mine, this is awesome. The service at the hotel was awesome as well. The front desk was friendly and helpful, no matter what time of day it was. The only problem was at the Bistro. On our first and second day we had prompt courteous service. On the next day, we had to wait 20 minutes for a simple breakfast sandwich. This location is near the convention center and close to Disneyland. Overall a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Kids had a blast staying in the one bedroom suite that had bunk beds. We needed space for the kids and had a second TV.  Would have been nice to have a second bath but we managed.  Front desk was so helpful from calling cabs, buying tickets, answering questions and making sure we had what we needed all week.  So close to convention center and only a 8 dollar cab ride to Disney or  2 dollar per person bus ride.  Will stay there again for sure
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This hotel is a great gem!
Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel for a trip to Disneyland.  The customer service at this hotel is better than we have experienced in a LONG time.  We have stayed in a lot of hotels as we like to vacation regularly.  They went above and beyond to provide the most comfortable experience.  It is within walking distance of Disneyland (if you don't mind a good walk.)  It is about a mile away.  We did a lot of going back and forth so we definitely got our exercise in!  The pool was nice and the hotel itself was very clean.  I would say the only cons we experienced were:  the bed was pretty hard and the coffee maker made coffee that had a HORRIBLE plastic taste to it.  Other than that, we were so pleased with this hotel and would highly recommend it to anyone looking to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback.  I cannot wait to share it with the entire team.    Our staff is committed to providing the best guest experience.  We know you have many choices to choose from and that is what set's us apart.  We are here to make your life more comfortable and a bit easier!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: The hotel was very clean and comfortable. We loved the feel of the whole place. The only part that wasn't clean was the elevator. Wifi worked great in the lobby but we were never able to connect in our room (huge bummer). The hotel is a short walk to the Toy Story lot for a ride to/from Disney. I was traveling with a 9 year old and we were able to walk to various restaurants without any complaining. The food offered for breakfast in the lobby was quite limited but the staff informed us of the full Starbucks in a next door hotel.  Overall, we'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear EsKezzy,  Thank for taking the time to share your experience while staying with us.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay.  We are located within many restaurants , shopping and also the toy story parking lot! It is so convenient and I am glad you and your family found what is around our hotel.  We appreciate your loyalty and business.  I look forward to sharing your feedback with the entire team.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Hotel was within walking distance of the convention center and some excellent restaurants (Ruth Chris, Morton's), and a quick drive to Disneyland.   The hotel was clean and well maintained. Bed was comfortable. I appreciate the consistency of the Courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear heatherv632,  Thank you for being a loyal customer to Courtyard.  We are here to make your life and time away from home, just a tad easier.  You named the best restaurants in the area. I hope you enjoyed them both and Disneyland too.  We know your time is valuable.  I will make sure to share your feedback to the entire team.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Was a very clean place, staff was very friendly, close to the Parks, Dennys and a CVS which was nice, having free WiFi was great since I have homework to work on. The happy hour at the bar was still overpriced. I would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan S,  Thank you for your positive feedback on our hotel.  There are many stores, restaurants and shops in our area and I am happy to hear that you found them all nearby.  I hope your homework assignments went well!  We look forward to your next visit.  We all appreciate your trust and loyalty.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here and found that it was close enough to disney. The food was good in the hotel and the hotel staff was excellent. The rooms and hotel seemed very clean and well taken care of as well as the grounds. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear cmickelsen,  We are happy that you decided to stay with us as we know you have many options in the Anaheim area.  Our hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland.  You can walk, take the ART or also use other options.  Please allow me to share your warm and positive feedback with the entire team.  We appreciate your business and loyalty.  Sincerely, Assistant General Manager

Summary: I'm an easy mark, as I'm a Marriott devotee from way back. They always take good care of me, and this hotel is no exception. Clean room, everything worked, good service, especially the front desk personnel the evening I checked in, and when I left the next morning. The only downer at the Courtyards these days (in my view) is the breakfast bar lounge area. If it's a busy morning, it takes too long to get the food. Still, I guess it beats a packed buffet. Hard to please everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Lepha,  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback on Tripadvisor.  We know your time is very valuable.  The team and I are delighted that you enjoyed your stay.  We strive in providing the best service and the most comfortable rooms as traveling can be stressful sometimes.    We look forward to your next visit.  If there is anything we can do, please let us know.  Sincerely,  Assistant General Manager

Summary: The cost of the stay was very reasonable and as a rewards member they covered my fee for parking which I was very appreciative. Overall the stay was very comfortable and clean.  I would stay here again.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear robertrO9371SB,  We are delighted you chose our hotel as we know there are other options in the area.  Our team takes great pride in providing clean and comfortable rooms.  You are very important to us!  I will make sure to share your positive feedback.  Thank you for your time and we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Assistant General Manager

Summary: excellent service equally well suited for families as for business - pretty close to convention center. food options are limited at place in afternoon, but decent options available in the neighborhood.
Manager Response: Dear DEMONstrate,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Whether your trip is for business or pleasure, we are conveniently located to all that Anaheim has to offer.  I am happy you chose our hotel.  Thank you for your business and loyalty.  If there is anything we can do for you, please feel free to contact us.  We all look forward to your next trip.  Sincerely, Assistant General Manager

Summary: I was recently "upgraded" to a suite. The bathroom was fitted for handicapped people so it only had a shower.  After I took a shower I walked into a pool of water. I slipped and hit the back of my head. I am having migraines ever since.
Manager Response: Dear Akyra P,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  You are very important to us and I would like the opportunity to speak with you.  Please call me directly at 714-591-2431 when you have a moment.  Best,  Assistant General Manager

Summary: Really good hotel with good sized room for family of 4 with 2 teenagers. Breakfast good too with plenty of selection and really helpful staff. Big plus was ability to walk to Toy Story parking lot (5 mins walk) to get free shuttle to Disney Parks and avoid parking fee (given already paying at hotel). Would definitely use again.
Manager Response: Dear Bernard T,  I am so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay.  I appreciate you including our hotel while making wonderful summer memories.  The Toy Story parking lot is so convenient and I also have used that area to get to Disney :)  We all look forward to your next visit.  Please stay in touch and see you soon!  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Anaheim is so busy and cluttered, it was nice to stay at a hotel that is peaceful, classy and takes you away from it all. It was restful and had great lobby and public spaces. The gym is good, restaurant was well. Every employee was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Roydelagarza,  Thank you for your wonderful and positive feedback while visiting our hotel. I know your time is very valuable.  I love our lobby area too and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the peace, class and elegance.  The gym is important and so is the restaurant after a workout!  I appreciate you acknowledging our employees as they are very friendly and helpful.  Thank you for making our day!  We look forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you to the Anaheim area.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Nice well kept hotel. Good stop if you are going to disneyland. I was there for business and it was fine for that as well. There are many nearby restaurant amenities. Dinner at Ruth's Chris diretly in front of the hotel was great.
Manager Response: Jim P,  Thank you for taking time to share your experience on Tridadvisor.  Your feedback is very important to our team.  We are the perfect option for families visiting Disneyland and for business travelers like yourself.  Our hotel is designed to make your life just a little bit easier.  Ruth Chris is one of my favorites too!  So many restaurants nearby, it is hard to choose.  Jim, we look forward to your next visit.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Clean, remodeled, great location . I have stayed here at least a dozen times and I'm always satisfied. I go to Disney once a month and thus is always my first choice. Value and location can't be beat.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie O,  You just made our day!  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us every month. Your feedback is so important as we are here to make your just a tad easier.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your stay even better.  Till next month Debbie!  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed our stay here as the staff was great, the room was nice, and the bed was cumfy.  The hotel is close to anything you might want to do in the area. Took a taxi ride to Anahiem Stadium to catch the game. Hotel conviently located to all things in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear GaryWilkerson,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience while staying with us.  Gary, I know your time is very valuable.  I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you made time to visit Angel Stadium.  We are located in a perfect location to enjoy what Anaheim has to offer.  We look forward to your next visit.  If there is anything we can do for you, please let us know.  We appreciate your business and loyalty.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Awesome Staff, Super clean hotel & family friendly. You can walk to Disneyland but its so easy to take the Shuttle. The Pool & restaurant was clean and a nice happy hour. Marriott is right next door and we went to hear a local band.
Manager Response: Dear djg3,  I am delighted to hear that you were Happy with our hotel!  Thank you for taking the time to share.  We are conveniently located to Disneyland and families will enjoy the park, pool and restaurant.  We appreciate you choosing our hotel for making wonderful summer memories!    I hope that band was magical!  Have a great weekend and we look forward to your next visit.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: In the sea of hotels in Anaheim, the Courtyard stands out as a solid pick at a reasonable rate. True, you have to pay for parking, but where don't you have to pay for parking? We felt that this was a safe area and the hotel was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Idaho208,  I appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful feedback.  We know there are so many options to choose from - thank you!  I will make sure to share this with the entire team.  Thank you for understanding the parking fee.  If there is anything we can do for you, please let us know.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: A good find in a vibrant busy area near Dianeyland.
Summary: Business often takes me to the area and I actually enjoy the vibe of Anaheim and all the people coming and going from Disneyland . Usually staying at a different hotel, I stumbled on this because it had a very low price and I was somewhat familiar with the area. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the hotel, cleanliness, modern decor, friendliness of staff in a walkable location.   Just there for a night, the room had a fridge and free wifi. Parking was $15. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear CSquaredC2,  We are delighted to hear that you chose to stay with us.  We know you have many options - thank you!  I will make sure to share your wonderful and positive feedback to the entire team.  We also enjoy the vibe in our area!  We look forward to your next visit.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make it even better.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: This resort was easy to find and very comfortable. The room was a great size, clean, and quiet. We were concerned about our room location with the amount of children but their were no ambient noises.  We were happy to find an abundance of plugs for our many devices, which were all easily located and useable.  I wish there were some more firm pillows as they were very airy which were difficult to find a ogled comfort level. Lastly, I wish the parking situation was explained better when we checked in - there are plenty of spaces, but we didn't realize that we had to go beyond the gates.
Manager Response: Dear seoc,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  Your feedback is very important to our team.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. I will share your review with our staff.  It is imperative that everything you need to know (parking) is shared with you at check in.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: My son and I were checking in after a very long day visiting a local college. It turns out I had made my reservation for the wrong date through a third-party website. The website had booked a special nonrefundable rate and no changes were allowed. Terry Arnce at the front desk figured out what I had done wrong. Not only did he give me the same rate for that (the correct) evening, he made the extra effort to call the website himself to make sure I did not get charged twice.  I was very grateful to him for solving my mistake.
Manager Response: Dear ACJ903,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  We know your time is very valuable.  What great news that we were able to accommodate the rate for you and your family.  I am glad to hear that our service exceeded your expectations.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to make your life just a little bit easier.  Our best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Room was way smaller than advertised. Sheets were disgustingly dirty, felt like nothing had been washed in weeks. There were stains on the couch and comforters. staff was beyond rude. Was supposed to stay for 5 days, checked out after first night. Do not reccommend at all .
Manager Response: Dear Easelle V,  I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback as your experience is very important to me.  Please accept my apology for what you have experienced.  I want to be able to make things better and would like the opportunity to speak with you when you have a moment.  Hope to hear from you.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: I am a Marriott Platinum member, and this is one of the best Courtyards I have ever stayed in! Check-in took less than one minute, staff incredibly warm and accommodating, property spotless and modern. Room located next to elevator, but didn't hear a peep all night long. 5 HBO channels! Super-convenient to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear David W,  Thank you for your wonderful review on our hotel.  I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed our service, amenities and our resort overall.  I have shared your feedback with the entire team.  David, we look forward to your next visit.  Please keep us updated on your next trip so that we have the chance to meet you!  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: While the lobby is nice the hallways smelled like wet carpet as they must have recently had them cleaned but they are old and probably should just be replaced (lots of stains). The room was dirty with hair all over the floor in the bathroom, finger nails on the carpet in the main room and stains on the blankets. When I talked to the front desk about it, they just gave me points and not enough to do anything useful. I probably won't stay at another one of these places going forward,
Manager Response: Dear jpmcca01,  I would like to thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  You and your family are very important to us and I am truly sorry for what you experienced.  It is not normal of our hotel and staff and I will make sure to share with the team.  It is your feedback that allow us to make things better for you and all of our guests.  If there is anything we can do for you, please let us know.  Sincerely, Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Fabulous From Check In to Check Out
Summary: We checked in at 11:30 am on August 18th.  A cheery greeting welcomed us as we walked in. Upon entry the lobby is sparkling clean. A good sign.  We thought we would wait for a room since we were early but we were surprised with a room upgrade to a Family Suite.  What a way to start off a short, last minute vacation to Disneyland.  At the desk we could purchase our Disney tickets and purchase our ART tickets.  The Anaheim Resort Transportation does not stop at this hotel but it stops at the Marriott next door.  Not a long walk at all.   After check in we walked in to room 428.  What a fabulous room. 2 Queen beds in one room and twin bunk beds and full size pull out sofa sleeper in the kids room.  This room also had a tv as well as a microwave and fridge. And a door to separate
Manager Response: Dear Sandi G,  We are so delighted that you enjoyed your stay!  Thank you for sharing your positive experience.  The family suite is ideal for busy families like yours.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed having the microwave and refrigerator.  When we travel, I also always stock up by going to the nearest CVS.  Thank you for choosing our hotel while visiting Disneyland.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: We arrived at the hotel after confusing it with a hotel also named Courtyard Marriott with a very similar address, that was one number off, but under construction. We finally found this Courtyard Marriott. The staff was very helpful and friendly and took the time to answer my numerous questions. Our room was nice, my son loved the bunk beds. The only downside was our room was dirty. There was urine on the toilet seat that had been their for some time as it was dry. We called down stairs and they were to send someone to clean it while we were out to dinner and no one had ever come. We had to clean it ourselves. Later that night I had stepped on old food with my bare feet. It was soo gross. The microwave in our rooms was also very dirty. If the room had been clean and the
Manager Response: Dear Veronica J,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience while visiting our hotel.  It is your feedback that allows us to better serve our guests.    I am delighted to hear that you found our staff friendly and we were able to assist you with information about the area.  My deepest apology for the condition of the room.  I will share this information with our team.  You are very important to us and if there is anything I can personally do for you, please let me know.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity the next time you travel to the Anaheim area.  Best wishes, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel, great location, but a complementary breakfast and free parking would be nice. Front desk personnel was very friendly, attentive and helpful. Shuttle to Disneyland resort was very convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary: great location. Amazing Staff! and the value was perfect for our family of 4       thanks again especially to the housekeeping staff. we had a kids suite which was large...and we had alot of stuff. Each day we returned to an immaculate room...and the kids bunk beds we made special with their stuffed animals placed creatively
Manager Response: Dear kevin651,  Thank you taking the time to share your wonderful experience while staying with us.  Our goal is to make sure you and your little ones are happy and comfortable.  The team loves to hear that our guests enjoy our little towel animals.  I will make sure to share your feedback.  Have a great rest of the summer and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Brittany helped make this trip with her kind and professional service. It's agents like her that make Marriott the company they are. The Anaheim location is a great one for the Disneyland trip. Thank you Courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear ShantDaniel,  Thank you for making my day and also Brittany's day.  She is very professional and taking care of you our guest, is her number 1 priority.  We appreciate your time, business and loyalty.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: We booked a couple nights here for a 'babymoon' to Disneyland. Wow, what a disappointment. Breakfast at the 'Bistro' is a joke with very limited options that are overpriced. Pillows were terrible and they had no option for memory foam which I thought was kind of standard for a mid hotel. Front desk messed up our shuttle passes and I'm still waiting for a pending charge to get removed from my CC statement. Do not recommender for the price :/.
Manager Response: Dear DarrellA42,  Please accept our apologies that your stay was not the best you experienced.  I know how exciting it is to have some time off to relax before your baby arrives.  We would love the opportunity to speak with you.  Please contact Violet at 714-740-2645 and she will be happy to assist you.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: We loved this place. Centered by everything. Great rooms. Very spacious. Great service. The pool was clean and we enjoyed our stay!       The bed was super comfy and wonderful. We asked for late checkout and was granted. We used their gym and it was very clean! We checked out at 1230 and was perfect! Thank you
Manager Response: Dear blancam113,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience while staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, amenities and service!  I will make sure to share your positive feedback to our entire team.  We appreciate you! Thank you again and have a great rest of the summer.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention Center met my expectations.  The room was very clean.  The beds were fresh and very comfortable.  The entire staff was friendly and ready to make our stay an enjoyable one.  I will plan to stay at this hotel if I am ever in the area. Thank you Courtyard Anaheim Resort/Convention Center for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Enjoy Marriot when I travel.  Like I'm in a familiar place despite my physical location.  The staff were what I've come to expect with any Marriot, courteous and proffesional they certainly excel at finding motivated staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A lot of questions and answers still are in question. First I not sure why I was placed in a roll in shower bathroom when I have  two children of ages 6 & 5. Of which uses the bathroom on their own. My kids almost slipped and fell being that the shower was wet all over the floor. I go that same evening about 11:30 at night to see if I can a another room for the simpl fact that it's not safe for my kids to use that shower and be in the bathroom.  Only thing the customer service offered me was more towels to place on the floor and have a room ready the next day! I was shocked that they did not accomadate my family! To top it off the smell / odor of the bathroom was just unbearable!!!!! I just can't even believe the service and stay was ridiculous! Not sure if the people that were
Manager Response: Dear michelleannefumar,  I want to take this opportunity to apologize for your stay.  I understand how it is to travel with young children and I can see how the shower bathroom would be an issue.  I also apologize that the customer service was not up to par as you and your family are very important to us.  If you would like to discuss, please contact me directly at 714-591-2431.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Very clean hotel, 15 min walk to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for 5 days, mostly to visit Disneyland and the Southern California area. Walked to Disneyland 2 out of our 3 days there. It is a 15 minute easy straight walk down Harbour blvd and it is fine if you are not tired from a long day at the park ;) Used the shuttle which is 5$ for the day and services the whole area, which was easy to get to and comes by often enough. The staff was great, but the nicest thing about this hotel was that the room was huge. With a family of 4, it was nice to have a little more breathing room, since the room since was nice and airy. I would definitely come back here and recommend it for the price and location.
Manager Response: cruisebaby,  What a wonderful trip you and your family experienced.  Thank you for choosing our hotel to be a part of your vacation.  The family suite is perfect!  It is spacious and comfortable for the entire family.  5 days away from home, comfort is what's needed before you head out for some fun!  Thank you for acknowledging our service.  You and all of our guests are very important to us.  I will make sure to share your feedback with the entire team.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Total failure to maintain Marriott standards of guest treatment and service.  Housekeeping ignores do not disturb signs, front desk staff ignore or do not follow through on requests.  And complaints to the General manager are ignored.  Even for Platinum Elite members with Marriott.  I've spent over 500 nights in Marriott properties in the past few years and the staff here is the worst anywhere.  Do not stay here...
Manager Response: Dear ericgl30BS,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  With your feedback we are able to continually improve our processes.    I understand that it can be very upsetting to feel like you were not treated like you should have as a Platinum Rewards member and/or a guest in our hotel.  Our goal is to make all guests feel at home when they arrive at the Courtyard Marriott Anaheim Resort/ Convention Center.  We did not follow through on the commitment of service we promised you when you booked at our hotel.  Please know that we are committed to creating a memorable experience for you and all our guests.  I am following up with housekeeping and the front desk to find out where your requests have fallen through the cracks.  We will make sure this type of experience does not happen with another guest or yourself when you return to our hotel.  I would love to speak with you about your stay but I do not have your information.  I also have not received any communication from your or your guests.  Please call my direct line @ 714-591-2440.    We thank you for you loyalty to Marriott and we are committed to rectifying the unique unpleasant stay you had at our hotel.  Kindest Regards,  Michael

Summary: The room was clean and reasonably priced. People at the front desk were friendly and helpful. Shuttle to Disneyland was not free and neither was parking. Parking at Disneyland was about the same as taking the hotel shuttle. Pillows were a tad hard and we didn't think to see if we could get softer ones.
Manager Response: Dear 312bobh,  Thank you for sharing your feedback.  We are happy to hear that you visited Disneyland.  It is the perfect time and place to make wonderful memories.  There are several options to get to the park.  Next time you visit us, please let me know.  We will have other options and softer pillows for you and your family.  Have a fun filled summer.  We appreciate your time, business and loyalty.  Sincerely, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Stayed here after speaking to a friend who had visited hotel in the past.  Location is good but rooms are small and and hotel very poorly constructed leading to you being able to hear everything going on in other rooms.  Fridge and air conditioner were terrible and kept the family up all night, for the amount of money spent I would look elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear alexkA3961GU,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. With your feedback we are able to continually improve our processes.   I apologize that you encountered issues, you are very important to us and we are working with the appropriate team.  Please know that we are committed to creating a memorable experience for you and all our guests.   Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: all 4 of our keys did not work the next day.although we had 2 more days at the hotel.MY kids who were attending a vidcon confernce at the convention center were locked out of the room as ME AND MY WIFE WERE 60 MILES AWAY touring parts of L.A.SO i had to return to the hotel to request new keys.
Manager Response: Philip P,  First I would like to apologize for the entire situation, although it is for your safety I understand the incontinence that it caused you and your family.  Please contact me to further discuss this situation.   Again, I truly apologize.  Sincerely,   Violet Ayala  Guest Services Manager  violet.ayala@courtyardanaheim.com (714)740-2645

Summary: Although the manager was great, we had cockroaches in our room, then dirty linens and ice bucket in the next room. We finally received a suite as compensation and that was nice. The front desk clerks and not that friendly. They talk to each other more than patrons
Manager Response: Dear Alexandre A,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  I appreciate you acknowledging our manager's service and that you were taken care of due to the inconveniences.    If there is anything we can do for you, please let us know.  We wish you a great summer and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: We were comfortable staying at the Marriott Courtyard Anaheim. Though we had a family of four, including my disabled husband staying in the ADA room. With 4 people, 1 in a wheelchair to get around the room was a bit tight on space but we could still maneuver.   My only disappointment was the floor levels in the bathroom, after showers the water pooled away from drains, right by the door of the shower.
Manager Response: Dear 145joles,  We are happy that you chose the Courtyard Marriott Anaheim Resort/Convention Center.  Your family is very important to us and we utilize your feedback to improve our hotel.    If there is anything we can do for you, please let us know.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best, Assistant General Manager

Summary: The courtyard was clean, comfortable and convenient to Disneyland. The only negative was the morning breakfast service at the Bistro. They reserved over half the seating for a group, but the reserved area was hardly used.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were really happy with this Courtyard - had a kids suite with a bunk bed which was super convenient with the little ones.  Hotel is not super-walkable to the parks but it is right across the street from the Toy Story parking lot so you could easily walk over and then take one of the shuttle busses in for no charge.  Room was decent sized, bathroom was updated and clean, refrigerator and microwave made things really easy.  Overall very happy with our stay here.  One touch that was nice was that we had pre-requested a crib in the room - and it was already set-up and waiting when we got there.  So many other places we have pre-requested cribs and still not had them ready, or had to call down multiple times which is a pain when you've got little ones who just need to go to bed.
