We tossed up between a couple of similar hotels in the area and to be honest we are disappointed we didn't pick one of the others. We understand we weren't paying for a 5 star hotel and didn't expect too much but one of the 3 mornings we had no hot water (apparently a problem throughout the hotel), were never asked if we would like help with our bags (on check in or out, even though we had many Disney bags) and when we tried to book a hire car we received no more help from front desk other than listing the companies in the area (surely it wouldn't have killed them to make a couple of phone calls on the behalf of a couple of international guests obviously out of their comfort zone).  In all we just want
Manager Response: Dear blandab,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review on our property.  We are very sorry that you were inconvenienced one of the mornings you were with us.  There was a situation with the hot water one morning and we apologize for this unfortunate mishap.  Please know that we are, indeed, here to help you in any way we can during your stay.  During the busy summer months our front desk and general staff do their very best to accommodate all of our guests' immediate needs.  Keep this in mind and let us know how you need us to assist you, and we will be happy to help.  We are pleased that you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities.  Again, thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  Best,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I had booked through the Priceline website but not as a bid -- it was a regular full price reservation.  The page I booked on listed that it included free parking and free internet.  When I got to the hotel with my guests from Australia in tow, they had no record of my reservation much less the bundled amenities.    After a long, drawn out process on the phone with Priceline for nearly an hour, they finally agreed to find me a room and honor the bundled amenities that were listed on the website.  The bundled amenities were a major factor in my decision in selecting this hotel (as parking for the area hotels is upwards of $15 a night).  The rooms were nice and clean and the beds were comfortable.  We had forgotten toothbrushes and the hotel was accomodating us with travel ones.
Manager Response: Dear MizMarcie,  Thank you for your review on our Anaheim hotel.  Let me first start out by telling you how sorry we are that you were inconvenienced in any way during your stay with us.  Please accept our apologies for the unfortunate hot water situation.  It was fixed immediately upon notification to our maintenance staff; however, we understand how inconvenient this was for you and your guests.  We are glad that you were comfortable in our nice and clean accommodations and hope that you will decide to to stay with us again.  We certainly do appreciate your business, no matter how you choose to book your room with us!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I usually do not do this but i feel it is appropriate in this certain situation and would remiss if i did not.  My name is Cameron Stith and me and my wife Kaitlyn Miller are staying here at the Courtyard this week for my wife's work performances at the park.  We cannot get over how our hotel situation has been and so i am emailing you directly.  YOU GUYS ROCK!!  The whole staff especially Chris and Denise they have been outstanding with their performance in servicing us, not only was the services they professionally impeccable but their general kindness and sincere interest in caring for our experience here with Marriott is unreal!  Denise and Chris are always smiling when they are there and have a great sense of creating a friendly comfortable atmosphere when at the front desk
Manager Response: Dear Cameron and Kaitlyn,  Our entire team would like to thank you for taking the time to give us such excellent feedback.  We are all so thrilled to receive your wonderful compliments on our superior customer service level.  As you mentioned, we do, indeed, genuinely care about our guests and their experience with us.  It is important to each member of our staff to ensure that your expectations are not just met, but exceeded.  Rest assured, your 2011 Best Staff Award will most definitely be acknowledged.  Again, thank you so very much.  We are extremely honored.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: The staff really makes this place! They are very helpful, informative and take great care of you. I do believe that for the money there should be a  breakfast included but for some cash they do have some available.
Manager Response: Dear OTBS32,  Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the review and giving us your feedback on your experience with us.  We are very excited that your stay was so enjoyable and appreciate all of your great compliments on our exceptional customer service level.  We believe in taking care of our guests and assisting them in any way we can to ensure that they enjoy a memorable stay.  We are so pleased that you feel we delivered exactly that.  Again, thank you.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: A little piece of paradise in Anaheim
Summary: After much reserach, we decided to book the Courtyard and we were not disappointed!  On check -in we had a wonderful experience with Rheggie, super guy and extremely professional and helpful.  The entire staff is great, including the restaurant staff.  That was just the start, our room was extremely clean, including the bathroom, which I am very picky about! The room had all the amenities we needed including a littel bigger than most.  We requested extra towels daily, with no problems!  The beds were very comfortable and the daily housekeeping was always to our expectations.  We were out most days so it would have been nice if the pool was open at least an hour later, it was very inviting!  We enjoyed the breakfast every morning, and overall found it cheaper than IHOP.  The
Manager Response: none

Summary: As a Platinum Marriott guest we were delighted have been upgraded to a larger room after some convincing at check-in.  The room was perfect for a family, with a king bed, and a separate room containing bunk beds. Disappointing to not find modern televisions in the rooms, however, since its a Disneyland hotel the TV's were not used that much.   As a business traveller, whether it be a family vacation or a business trip, the fact that my cell phones basic functions would not work in the room unless I was up against the window is a major flaw of this hotel.  When asked about the cell phone issue front desk admitted that there was a problem with Verizon signals and they may be adding a booster in the future to solve this issue.  I found it appalling that in 2011 you have a hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: The walls are a little bit thin. We stayed there 3 nights for Disneyland. Breakfast is wonderful (hot buffet). Walking to Disneyland ~20 minutes (4 blocks).
Manager Response: Dear maxmax30,  We're glad you had an enjoyable stay!  Thank you for your great feedback.  You're definitely right; our breakfast buffet is quite wonderful.  Our guests continue to express how much they enjoy the great selection of breakfast items and our attention to refreshing and replenishing each item.  Thank you for staying with us.  Come back and see us again soon!  Regards, Beckley Van Cleave, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott in Anaheim from 5/14 through 5/21.  First off we got to the hotel 4 hours before check in time and were able to check into our room early.  Got up to the room, HUGE room with two very comfy beds.  Let's start off with the POSITIVES about the hotel: 1- early check in 2- very nice staff  3- warm pool 4- great hot tub 5- close to disney (15 minute walk) 6- free internet 7- free water througout the day which was nice after a long day  8- free maps of the city which was helpful 9- held our luggage when we checked out and went to DT Disney 10- VERY CLEAN!  Overall, this place was above and beyond what we expected.  The only negative things to say about this place was the slow elevator and that is a minor complaint.  We were also in a room located
Manager Response: Dear xbsx14,   Thank you for sharing the details of your week long stay at our hotel during your Cali Vacation!  We appreciate your comments on our spacious and comfy accommodations, along with your list of positives about our property.  It was our pleasure to exceed your expectations!  We are always happy to go above and beyond what our guests might expect in delivering an enjoyable and memorable experience.  Thank you for your high recommendation of our Anaheim hotel.  We look forward to your return visit on your next California vacation.  Best,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel but location could be better
Summary: WE stayed here for 4 nights with our 3yo in a family suite.  Initially we were disappointed by the size.  I guess we just thought it would be larger. We were a bit biased as we had just come from staying in large apartment style suites.   We ended up unpacking some of our clothes and stacking our cases against a wall as I don't think there would have been room for them to be left out.  The room was clean and tidy and had everything we needed. Small fridge and microwave which was handy but no cutlery and crockery.  The fridge can fit 20 x600ml bottles of water!  All the staff were lovely and went out of their way to help.  I really liked how the coin operated laundry was on level 1.  nice and handy. The pool areas seemed nice but we didn't use them as the water felt a bit cool to
Manager Response: Dear kalew,  We are pleased that you and your family enjoyed so many things that make our Anaheim hotel so special!  Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience of the interrupted complimentary high speed Internet service.  It was, indeed, beyond our control; however, we understand and are sorry for the frustration. Thank you for complimenting our staff and our level of customer service, as well as several of our amenities.  We are delighted that you found our property a nice place to stay!  Best,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: So my family decided this would be a great place to stay but we found out it was not so great!!! First off they had no Gift shop to buy cheaper disney gifts, No free breakfast and when you put the "Do Not Disturb" sign on the door they still come in and clean. This hotel was also a ways away from Disneyland and you have to pay for the Bus to take you to and from Disneyland. The bus stop is not even at this Hotel you have to walk to the other Marriott to get the shuttle. I have stayed at way better hotels then this that are just right across the street from the parks. No waiting for Buses that come every 20 mins. Also there is not very many food options around this hotel. I will be back to Disneyland in Dec. but will not be staying here! There is closer hotels that have
Manager Response: Dear disney70,  We are very sorry to hear that you did not find our hotel to be everything that your family expected and more.  Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.  We are very proud of being able to offer comfortable and clean accommodations, great amenities and exceptional customer service at affordable rates, and hope that you reconsider staying with us again in the future.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent family hotel offers great value
Summary: After extensively researching hotels in the Disneyland area on tripadvisor.ca, I found the Courtyard to be one of the only hotels with zero reports of roches or bed bugs.  We cancelled our reservation for a suite at another hotel closer to Disneyland and booked a room with 2 queens, breakfast, and parking included for our family of 4 at the Courtyard on Expedia.  The Expedia rate was great!  We spent 5 nights at the Courtyard a found the reviews were indeed accurate.  It is a relatively new and clean hotel.  The staff were extremely helpful and friendly.  Breakfast buffet was excellent and provided extremely good value for our family.  It is a very short walk accross the parking lot to the Marriott for the Aneheim shuttle to Disney.  As per a review I had read in advance, this
Manager Response: Dear Spudboss,  Thank you for choosing our Anaheim hotel for your family's 5 night stay in the Disneyland area.  We appreciate your time in completing the review and all of your great compliments and ratings on our property. Thank you for mentioning several of our amenities that you and your family enjoyed, including our hot tub and it's perfectly set jet pressure.  We are very excited to hear that you found it to be one of the best hotel hot tubs you have ever used!  We'll keep the settings and temperature just right and ready for your next visit.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: All of the positive reviews are spot on - we were very happy!  As far as I am concerned, the most important aspects for a hotel are safety, cleanliness and a quiet, convenient location.  In this regard, the Courtyard ticks all of the boxes - we had a great sleep every night.  This is an obvious choice for visitors to Disneyland because you simply turn left outside the hotel and walk for 15 minutes.  There are also some great eating places in the local area so ask for a map...which is where I must give special mention to Chris, the Front Office Manager, who was very happy to help us with the endless questions and requests we had in regards to the hotel and local area.  One final positive note: there is free internet in the lobby (two PC terminals) as well as in the room so thank
Manager Response: Dear WeekendHussler,  Thank you for your excellent review and high recommendation of our Anaheim hotel.  It is always great to receive positive feedback from our guests.  We're glad you agreed with all of our great reviews and that you were very pleased and comfortable staying at our safe, clean and conveniently located property.  Thank you for mentioning our complimentary wireless, high speed Internet access too!  We will look forward to your future visit.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel! I can't recommend it highly enough.
Summary: I stayed at this hotel during a Girls' Weekend in California. It was very close to our destination in Santa Ana, as well as to Disneyland. My room was clean and comfortable. The bathroom was huge and well-appointed. The hotel provided more than enough pillows and bedding. Parking was easily accessible for my friends who were picking me up and dropping me off at the hotel. The swimming pool was clean and well-maintained. The restaurant's menu was limited, but I was pleased with the selections. I was greeted immediately upon check-in by a wonderful hotel employee. Checking in and out was a breeze! There are two computer kiosks in the lobby, which made it easy for me to check my email and check in for my flight on the day of my departure.  The only reason I checked four out of five
Manager Response: Dear JMS1122,  Thank you for your great review on your recent experience with us.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed many of the reasons that make our Anaheim property so special; our spacious and comfortable accommodations, great amenities, superior customer service and, as you mentioned convenient location.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We hope that you and your girlfriends will decide to stay with us on your next California Girls Weekend!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My friends and I recently stayed at the Courtyard to celebrate an upcoming wedding! From the minute we checked in we were greeted by the friendliest staff who was very helpful giving us enough room keys...etc. All my girlfriends live in different parts of CA so we all arrived to the hotel separately. They were great about comping a few of our car overnight parking charges. We couldn't figure out how to turn the air-conditioning in the room down and the front desk sent someone up in less than 5 minutes to help us. It was a really fun stay, the room was clean and had plenty of space for all our bags. We were very happy it had a mini fridge and a large table we could set our food out on. I'd recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Jbissic,  Thank you for choosing to stay a the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim at Disneyland Resort for your recent Girlfriend's Weekend!  We truly appreciate all of your excellent ratings and compliments on our Anaheim hotel.  It's always exciting when a group of guests from different parts of the state all enjoy their experience with us so much that they recommend our hotel to everyone!  We are so very pleased that you had such a comfortable and memorable stay.  We hope you and your group of girlfriends decide to come and visit again soon!  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here 3 nights while we went to disneyland last week. We used the shuttle to get to Disneyland and it was a little annoying that we had to catch it at the regular marriot but doable. I thought the $10 extra a day for parking was annoying, especially considering the shuttle to Disneyland was $4 for adults and $1 for kids each day. The pool was great! It was a great size and the kiddie pool was awesome for the little kids. I thought it was a little annoying that the 4 rooms we booked could not be right next to each other...especially since I hardly saw anyone else. I would have thought this was an excellent value and not even minded paying for parking if there had been a complimentary breakfast. We ate some of the sandwiches they sold at the front desk and only one of
Manager Response: Dear ctrueckert,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent visit to the Disneyland area. We are glad you and your family enjoyed our heated pools.  Our younger guests always enjoy a little play time in the water with their family.  We apologize for the inconvenience of your four rooms not being located right next to each other.  Please know that we certainly did our best to accommodate your request.  Again, please accept our apologies.  We do understand the convenience of being located by one another. Thank you for your completing the review and giving us your valued feedback.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: It can't get any closer to being at home
Summary: We had a very positive stay at the Courtyard Marriott at Anaheim Resort!  We stayed for nine nights in mid-April 2011.  As our stay was considered long-stay, Marriott gave us a great rate at $89 night.  We have four tween-aged kids so having two double-bed adjoining rooms was a necessity.  The first night the staff could not accommodate us in adjoining suites.  Desk staff said that due to some sort of teen convention (do kids aged 16 need adjoining rooms more than 10 year-olds...think:  PARTY!).  I was disappointed that they did not consider my family dynamic,  and gave priority to the teenaged guests.  The first night was very inconvenient.  However, the following morning Richard very professionally re-located us to rooms we wanted.  The remainder of our stay was beyond our
Manager Response: Dear VictoriaTwinsx2Mom,  It was our extreme pleasure to be your home away from home during your recent nine night visit to the Anaheim area.  We can't thank you enough for your valued feedback.  We are elated to hear that you felt so at home with us and that you highly recommend our hotel to family and friends.  Thank you for completing the review.  We will look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back!  Best,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We were just here for 4 nights (room# 303) and sharing a vacation with another family and used some points for our stay here (our friends stayed at the Grand Californian). We are familiar with the Courtyard (my husband often stays for business), so had a certain expectation of cleanliness. We were not disappointed. The room was nicely appointed (and bigger than a regular room at the Grand Californian), with a good-sized bathroom. Large-size tiles up to the ceiling in the shower/tub combo, and a decent sized granite counter with sink. There was a small bar outside the bathroom with the coffee maker on it, which had the refrigerator below. That came in handy for keeping the milk for our toddler, as well as some extra treats. We got a 2 queen room and I was happy that they didn't
Manager Response: Dear daphnekat,  We certainly appreciate your time in detailing your recent experience with us at our Anaheim hotel and all of your wonderful compliments.  Thank you for making us your choice in accommodations for your 4 night family vacation.  We look forward to the pleasure of having you and your family stay with us again.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Customer service is well below what you would expect for a Marriott!!!
Summary: Marriott would be embarassed if they were aware of the lack of customer service!!!  There are hotels of equal quality in similar location, so avoid this one!
Manager Response: Dear ltsbell,  We are very disappointed to hear that we did not exceed your customer service level expectations.  Please accept our sincere apologies.  If you would be so kind as to contact me directly at the hotel by phone or by email; I would greatly appreciate a few minutes of your time to go over the details of your experience.  My email address is mitchellh@CourtyardAnaheim.com.  Thank you for completing the review and bringing this to our attention.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Very Nice experience, we have found our new Disneyland Hotel
Summary: Checked in with the wife and kids, as our Disneyland base camp. The standard room was large and very clean. Enough room for both kids to setup the toys they brought and play, alowing mam and dad time to put the legs up. Everyone at the hotel went out of their way to help, from check in to getting the crib into our room without having to ask, to breakfast time chefs and wait staff, to check out.....can't say enough...Very professional and genuine.  This hotel seems to be popular with teen groups, and they were noisy but once again the staff sent them off to their rooms once I called down to say they were all hanging out in the corridor at 10:30pm.  It may cost a little more than the budget spots close to Disneyland entrance, but you get what you pay for. Oh yes, we shall return.
Manager Response: Dear purcelleric,  Thank you for choosing us as your new Disneyland Hotel!  We appreciate your compliments on our professional and genuine customer service, and spacious and clean accommodations.  We truly enjoy going out of our way to ensure that your stay is a memorable one.  Thank you for completing the review and highly recommending our hotel to other travelers.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back!  Best, Mitch Healy

Summary: We have been 3 times and always enjoy the clean, modern, relaxing rooms.  They aren't 5 star but who goes to Disney area to hang out in their room.  A definite must try with kids
Manager Response: Dear Wish_You_Were_Here_3,  Thank you for the excellent review and ratings!  We appreciate you taking the time to share with other travelers just how much you love our Anaheim hotel.  We appreciate your compliments on our clean, modern and relaxing rooms, and your recommendation.  We're looking forward to seeing you and your family again soon!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim at Disneyland Resort when we went to Disneyland and CA Adventure to celebrate my son's birthday for the weekend. As you know, after a long day of walking around the parks, you want a nice, quiet and clean place to sleep. This is exactly what we got at this Marriott. Every staff person we came in contact with - from the front desk person, to our waiter in the hotel restaurant - was friendly and accomodating. Free breakfast buffet came with our rate and it was great and a very good value. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear SDTraveler55,  Thank you for choosing us to accommodate you during your son's Disneyland birthday weekend!  It was our pleasure to be the nice, quiet and clean home away from home after a long day of walking at the parks.  Thank you for all of your kind comments and excellent ratings on our Anaheim hotel.  We appreciate your recommendation of our property and look forward to your next visit!  Best, Mitch Healy

Summary Heading: Rooms were nice.  Worn, but clean.
Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard because it was reasonably priced, was handicap accessible and had family accommodations.  It appeared from the description and it had van service.  I even called to ask if the transportation was wheelchair accessible.  Turns out that the transportation is city operated, costs extra and is located way across the neighboring hotel's parking lot.  It is quite a hike pushing two wheelchairs in the rain.  We ended up taking our own vehicle and paying less for parking ar the park.    We never used the restaurant.  It was pricey and there are so many nice places to eat in the area that we chose to just stop in on the way to and from the park.
Manager Response: Dear oicrnow,  We're glad that you enjoyed our accommodations and convenient location. We apologize for any miscommunication that occurred when calling to inquire about wheelchair accessibility on the ART shuttle.  The shuttle service to all of the Disneyland® Resort  attractions is operated through the Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle service (ART)  and their daily charge is $4 per adult & $1 per child.  Thank you for taking the time to complete the review and share your experience with us.  Regards, Mitch Healy

Summary: This was an awesome stay! We always use the Marriott Chains.  It's 4 blocks to Disneyland! Nice walk!  The front desk staff is SUPER nice! Especially, Rheggie! I wish I could remember all the names so I can they could be recognized for their outstanding service and kindness!  You will not go wrong with this property! Thank you for everything!   I paid with gift cards for our stay and there were no problems unlike the problems we encountered at another Marriott in Marina del Rey.
Manager Response: Dear vanjones,  We are exhilarated after reading all of your incredible comments and ratings on our Anaheim hotel.  We never grow tired of hearing that we are doing our job at exceeding our guests' expectations.  Our entire staff appreciates your time in giving us your feedback.  Please know that our front desk team has been recognized for their outstanding efforts in ensuring that your stay was an enjoyable one.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We hope to accommodate you again on your return visit to the Anaheim area.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I personally loved this hotel. For those who frequent the Marriott chain, this Courtyard is new with updated furnishings and bathrooms ( the bathrooms are very large). The staff is very nice and helpful. They have a bistro that serves breakfast and snacks.   The bedrooms have an armour in them which makes hanging clothes and putting away shoes much easier.   The pool is large and looked very nice. I was there in January so I did not go in but this would be a huge plus for those going in the summer.   The location to Disneyland was a brisk ~20 min walk though they have shuttles that leave from the Marriott hotel ( 2-3 walk from Courtyard) that can get you there in 10 min and cost $4/day.   The only negative about this hotel is the noise factor. Fortunately, I was on the top floor
Manager Response: Dear Travelbuglove83,  We appreciate your time in sharing the details of your recent experience at our Anaheim hotel.  Thank you for all of your wonderful comments on our accommodations, amenities, customer service and convenient location.  We hope you'll return again and make time to enjoy our large outdoor heated pool and hot tub.  It's a very nice way to end the day after seeing all there is to see at Disneyland.  Again, thank you for staying with us and recommending our property to family and friends.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: OK modern hotel in an area with many choices
Summary: This hotel seems new and somewhat "hip" in either a good or bad way (your choice).  The standard room I had was large and clean.  But there several odd items: - There is no bright light available in the entrance that can be turned on when you are just coming in the door.  There are only 2 tiny mood lights nearby, with the bright lights over between the bed or over the desk. - Don't expect a good view.  Many rooms face a public sidewalk, a parking lot, or the Ruth Chris Steakhouse next door.   - There are only 2 elevators and they are at opposite ends of the hall, so waits can be long.  Also, only one staircase (a means of avoiding the elevators) has lobby access; the other set of stairs leads to an emergency exit only. - One of the elevators is shared with housekeeping; it
Manager Response: Dear ccm17,  We appreciate your time in detailing your experience with us, as your comments and suggestions are very important to us.  We are happy to hear you had a nice stay; however, we certainly hope you decide to give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Our accommodations, amenities, and location are only a few things that really make our Anaheim hotel stand out above the rest!  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Nothing extra special but very nice.
Summary: We stayed for a recent Disneyland Vacation, we go every 1 - 2 years.   It was a relaxing and clean hotel for our vacation.  The hotel isn't exceptional itself but the staff is very very nice.  We enjoyed our stay but honestly if it hadn't been for us using time share points I would rather have stayed somewhere with a bit more pizazz.   This seems more like a business hotel rather than a vacation hotel.  (We have another hotel we stay at down the road that is VERY vacation oriented.)  This hotel backs up on another Marriott.  It is important to know that the bus for Disneyland picks up at the other hotel so you will be crossing a parking lot late at night.  And the other Marriott has the Starbucks. (Important to those of us who are addicted.)  On our last day when a convention
Manager Response: Dear tkrbl,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the Anaheim area.  We are glad to hear the you had a relaxing and enjoyable stay with us, and hope you will decide to visit us again in the future.  Thank you for your great compliments on our customer service and for recommending our Anaheim hotel to other travelers.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: GREAT value, location and staff! HIGHLY recommended!
Summary: The staff were superior (Front Desk greeted us consistently with courtesy and kindness, Housekeeping were quick and responsive, Dining and Bar staff were incredible stand-outs for their graciousness).  This is a GREAT hotel for its value, and location to Disneyland.  LOTS of ample parking surrounding the hotel.  We walked to the larger Marriot hotel located 3-4 minutes away by foot, to catch the shuttle which ran every 20-25 minutes (highly recommend purchasing shuttle bus passes).  We booked the Family/Kid Suite that has the bunkbeds and it was incredibly spacious, clean and comfortable.  The only "negative" is that the floors are "thin" and we often heard the footsteps of the family above us.  We asked to move to another room, and this was accommodated promptly.  Given the
Manager Response: Dear WestcoastCdnMom,  It was our pleasure to provide you with the exceptionally high level of customer service that you deserve!  It is very important for our entire staff to ensure that your stay with us is memorable and enjoyable.  Thank you for all of your kind remarks on our service, accommodations, location and restaurant.  We would agree with you; a wonderful hotel at affordable rates!  Again, thank you for all of your high ratings and for your time in completing the review.  We are delighted that you will most definitely return!  Best, Beckley Van Cleave, General Manger

Summary: Friendly front desk.  Room was very quiet.  Easy in and out.  I hate having to walk a mile to my room after a day at Disney and I didn't have to at the Courtyard.  Nice pool area.  Parking is ample if you just drive past the gate and park in the back or other side of hotel.  Room made up fast and early on both mornings.  My only complaint is that the elevator is kind of slow.  Will definitely stay there again. $10 / day for parking.  We didn't try their breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear tcmorse6570,  Thank you for staying with us and giving us your feedback on your experience with us.  We are very happy to hear of your comfort  and enjoyment at our Anaheim hotel.  Our convenient location makes touring the attractions that much easier for our guests.  After a long day of walking at Disneyland, its great knowing you're only minutes away from your hotel room!  Also, thank you for the excellent ratings across the board!  We are delighted that you will definitely stay with us again.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: A lovely quiet hotel set back from the main road, a haven to return to after the mayhem of Disneyland.  The size of the hotel allows that 'personal' service feeling, unlike the big hotels.  Denise at the front desk is just fantastic, always a great help and a big smile, as are the other employees - they must enjoy working there.  We really enjoyed our stay and would not hesitate to recommend the hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: Dear donnainnz,  It was our pleasure to be your haven after a busy day at Disneyland!  Thank you for your wonderful compliments on our personal, friendly and helpful customer service.  We never tire of hearing that we are doing our job at delivering the high level of service that our guests deserve.  Our staff members enjoy being part of a great team, and we're thrilled that it made an impact on your experience with us.  Thank you for your review and recommendation of our Anaheim property.  We're looking forward to your next visit to the U.S.!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: It's always good at the Marriott!
Summary: Perfect for us to walk to the Disney attractions, good room service, clean.  I found it odd, though, that the rooms had old school televisions.......not what we were there to do...just kind of out of sync with other Marriott hotels.    Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear JeanneKs,  We are thrilled to receive such high ratings on our Anaheim hotel!  Thank you for taking the time to complete the review and give us your valued feedback.  We're glad you enjoyed our perfect location, good room service and clean accommodations.  Being just a short walk away from all of the Disney attractions is always a great bonus!  We will look forward to your next visit.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient & lived up to this hotel snob's standards
Summary: First, it is important to note that I am a hotel snob. That said, sometimes it's just not possible to stay in a five star hotel and b/c we were trying to be cost conscious and needed a convenient place to stay, the Courtyard (at $98/night) fit the bill. I remarked to my husband that even for someone who is extremely picky about hotels, there just wasn't much to complain about at this hotel. It was extremely clean, a nice size, had a small refrigerator which was nice, and we even spent a few hours at the pool which was clean and spacious. We were also the only ones at the pool as I assume all the families were at Disney so that was an extra plus! Families and Disney is an important point to make. We were not there to go to Disney but this hotel (like all the others in the area)
Manager Response: Dear DC/VATravelGirl,  Thank you for the wonderful review and high recommendation of our Anaheim hotel.  We are thrilled to hear of your comfort and enjoyment during your stay with us.  We appreciate all of your excellent remarks on our extremely clean and spacious accommodations, as well as our convenient location that's close to all of the Anaheim action!  Coming from an avid traveler such as yourself, we are truly flattered!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your time in completing the review.  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean upscale rooms for your Disney Stay
Summary: Our stay at the Courtyard Marriott was very pleasant. I arrived late at night and was checked in by a very nice clerk that made it quick and easy to get in and right to bed. I wish I could remember his name but he had glasses and was a great start to the trip.  Our room was very clean with 2 queens and a pull out chair (a single bed) that my kids fought over to sleep in. A fridge was a plus to keep drinks and food cold.  We had the shuttle service to Disneyland and it was a quick walk to the Marriott next door.  The only complaint I had was that the breakfast was pay to eat instead of free continental. With a family of 5 that would get pricey every morning. I used TripAdvisor to examine every hotel in the area and was 99% sure that I read they had free continental since that was
Manager Response: Dear zbigballer,  First and foremost, please accept our sincere apologies for any miscommunication or inconvenience you experienced at our restaurant.  We are disappointed to hear that we fell short of delivering our exceptional level of customer service when explaining that we have never offered a complimentary continental breakfast.  We are, however, very pleased to hear of your comfort and enjoyment throughout the rest of your stay with us.  Thank you for completing the review on our Anaheim hotel and for your recommendation of our property.  We are looking forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Everything was just as expected -- no surprises. Housekeeper did cute things with the towels each day. Friendly staff. There is a shuttle bus  to Disneyland every 20 minutes ... Unlimited rides for $4 day. Shuttle picks up/drops off at the main Marriott hotel. Just walk across big the parking lot in the back and you're there.  Breakfast buffet for $12.95 + tax.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I spent 7 nights. Very convenient location for conferences at the Convention Center - just a 2 minute walk to the Marriott - and just a couple more minutes to the Convention Center itself. Free high speed internet worked fine. Breakfast at hotel was reasonably priced.  Clean room and comfortable bed. Quiet location, set back from the main road.  Walking distance to Disneyland (15-20 minutes); 10min to Garden Walk mall. Direct access to Mariott across parking lot. All staff was very friendly, polite and efficient. Service was better then in main Mariott where we had ou congress. Pool and fitness are ok. Only (slight) drawback: as stated in other comments the two elevators ars slow (so don't hurry & relax) and you may encounter noisy neigbors. Be aware that there is a parking fee.
Manager Response: Dear Wolfgang_Paris,  We appreciate your detailed feedback and fabulous compliments on your seven night stay with us. It's extremely exciting for us when our guests take the time to comment on the comfort and enjoyment they experienced with us.  Even more, it's always wonderful to hear that our high level of customer service stands out above the others!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the U.S.  We are thrilled that you'll be back!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, comfortable, good value for area
Summary: Just spent 7 nights here.  It's a great location for those headed to conferences at the Convention Center - just a 2 minute walk to the Marriott - and just a couple more minutes to the Convention Center itself.  Free internet worked fine, breakfast at hotel was reasonably priced compared to other options in area.  Clean, good bed IMO, quiet, set back from the main road.  Had a slightly noisy neighbor one night, but they turned in by 11 pm.  Staff was friendly, polite.  Coin laundry and frig in room were well-maintained.  I didn't check out the pool - but it looked nice, simple.  It's a long, but doable, walk to Disneyland (15-20 minutes) or in the other direction - Target, Walgreen's, or a grocery store (15 min walk to Target, 20 min to the grocery store).  Couple liquor
Manager Response: Dear novicetravellgirl,  Thank you for your time in giving us your feedback on your recent 7 night experience with us.  As you mentioned, we are conveniently located just a short walk away from many of the Anaheim attractions.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed our friendly and polite customer service, clean and quite accommodations, and, of course, our comfy beds!  We are delighted to read that even though your work would pay for a higher rate, you prefer to stay at our property!  We are very proud to offer great value at affordable rates.  Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My partner and I stayed here in July and after a long flight from Australia we were happy to arrive and was checked in very quickly. The room was very spacious and the customer service was helpful, would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear AmyGrantW,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your summer visit to the U.S.  We appreciate your compliments on our spacious accommodations and efficient and helpful customer service.  It's great to hear that you will definitely be staying with us again.  We'll look forward to welcoming you back on your return trip!  Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: With a few vacation days to burn (along with some Marriott Rewards points) I contacted this Courtyard to book a long weekend stay. I wanted to surprise my family by taking my four-year old for his first visit to Disneyland and to celebrate both his birthday and my 9th wedding anniversary all at the same time. I contacted the hotel via email to ask a few questions and to request that they please have the front desk staff wish my wife a Happy Anniversary when we checked in. The general manager responded promptly via email.  I surprised the family with the trip and we arrived in Anaheim on Thursday night. The front desk staff was friendly and efficient when checking us in. They wished my wife a happy anniversary as I asked and I was more than happy with that. They also let us
Manager Response: Dear Jetpilot_Dad,  Thank you for choosing to make us a part of your special celebration.  It was our pleasure to fulfill your requests, as well as include a special surprise for you!  Although it is not always possible for us to do this for every special occasion, we certainly enjoy the opportunity when we can.  In this instance, we are happy that you were able to experience one of our Kids Suites due to a cancellation.  We are very excited to receive your wonderful feedback, and appreciate your time in sharing the details of your stay.  Again, thank you for allowing us to be a part of such a special, celebratory weekend for your family.  We look forward to being your host again on your family’s next visit to our area.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: big, clean rooms, wonderful restaurant, best Marriott in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights in January...right when SoCal had it's worst rainfall in 10 yrs.. The hotel is small and personal, the rooms are roomy, clean and very comfortable. The restaurant offers a very nice breakfast, and the little market place even does peanut butter and jelly sandwiches for a late night snack. The desk staff were attentive. There is no free internet, but there is a computer in the lobby. I did have to use it once and had to wait 50 mins for a woman to finish moving around her stupid trees and animals on farmville..I just about had smoke coming out of my ears by the time she had fed her addiction. I salved my soul by throwing her my bestest  'you need therapy' look. The only downside is that to catch the ART, you have to walk thru to the large Marriott on
Manager Response: Dear vicky66,  Thank you for your 6 night stay with us in January during your visit to the Anaheim area. It's great to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable and spacious accommodations, as well as the convenience of our 24-hour snack shop/market.  Thank you for your compliments on our personable customer service, restaurant and deluxe rooms.  We apologize for the delay you experienced in regard to using the computer in our lobby and for any miscommunication regarding internet access. We do offer free wired and wireless high speed Internet access in all of our Deluxe Rooms and Kids Suites.  We truly appreciate your time in completing the review and all of the excellent ratings on our Anaheim hotel!  Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for a week recently.  The room was clean and tidy and large enough for us.  The staff were always friendly and helpful.  Although the hotel is reasonably close to Disneyland the shuttle is more convenient, especially after walking all day long.  The only problem I had was walking across the carpark from the Marriott (shuttle pick-up and drop-off from Disneyland) late at night, felt a little unsafe.
Manager Response: Dear karenko111,  We are happy to hear of your comfortable and enjoyable week long stay with us at our Anaheim hotel!  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback by completing the review.  We appreciate all of your great compliments on our clean and tidy accommodations, and friendly and helpful customer service.  Thank you for all of the high ratings and for your recommendation of our hotel to friends, family and other travelers.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard Marriott Anaheim from the 14th of September  2010 for 5 nights. We were checked in by a tall blonde young woman with glasses - wish I had taken note of her name, the most friendly check in person I have ever come across. I soon discovered that all the check in/reception staff were just as friendly, always a genuine smile and hello when you returned to the hotel. How come some of the top end Marriotts cannot be the same! Whoever is in charge of staff training is doing an exceptional job. ALL the staff, cleaners, maintenance staff all smiled and said hello! On one occasion we locked ourselves out of our room - again we were treated with respect and a smile, and a very gracious lady took us to our room and let us in. My son unfortunately blocked the
Manager Response: Dear pacificwest6,  We are honored by your A+ and are ecstatic after reading your review!  Thank you so much for all of your excellent ratings and compliments on our customer service, accommodations and location. Our staff is committed to delivering an exceptionally high level of customer service at all times.  It is our goal to consistently impress you, and we're so pleased we did just that!  We can't thank you enough for ranking us one of Marriott's best and appreciate your time in sharing your experience with other travelers.  We value your feedback and look forward to the next opportunity to be at your service!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: The Happiest Hotel in the World!
Summary: My family and I just returned from spending 4 days and nights in Disneyland (the Happiest Place in the World!), and I can honestly say that this hotel made our stay even better!  The lobby is beautiful and the front desk agents were the friendliest I have ever come across.  The rooms did not dissappoint, either --  Very spacious and extremely clean!  The housekeeper that cleaned our room each day arranged my daughters stuffed animals on their beds, and folded the towels into wonderful little decorations!  They really took care of us and made us feel so special! They catered to our small daughters and made them feel important.  One morning, my daughter spilled her chocolate milk during breakfast at their lobby restaurant, and before I could jump up to clean it up, one of the
Manager Response: Dear Spokanicas,  We are truly flattered by the title of Happiest Hotel in the World! Thank you very much for taking the time to give us your feedback on your stay with us.  We are extremely happy to read that your entire experience was comfortable and enjoyable.  It's great to hear that we delivered the friendliest and most helpful customer service that you have ever come across.  That's quite a compliment and we appreciate it!  Also, thank you for mentioning that the extra touches left by our housekeeping staff as well as the care and attention given by our staff in general made your family feel special. That in itself, is truly rewarding for our entire staff.  We are all looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This hotel had the best and finest staff. They were very helpful, pleasant and professional in every way. The beds were extremely comfortable, especially after a full day of walking. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone coming to Disneyland. Another important thing was that it was so quiet at night. I have stayed at other hotels in the area and constantly would hear people running around all hours of the day, but the Courtyard was nice and quiet. The breakfast was not the best place to eat though.  The food is exactly like the free breakfast at other hotels, however, the buffet includes omelets made to order. Anyway, this was a great stay and we will come back.
Manager Response: Dear disminfan,  Thank you so very much for your excellent review on our Anaheim hotel!  Our entire staff appreciates your wonderful compliments on our high level of customer service.  We are truly dedicated to deliver superior customer service at all times to ensure that your stay with us is memorable and enjoyable.  We appreciate your recommendation and are thrilled that you'll be back!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights at this hotel.  It is situated on Harbor Blvd and is a 5 mintue walk to the Marriott Anaheim, Anaheim Convention Center and the Hilton.  Pros: 1. Very Clean Hotel 2. New Hotel 3. Very friendly and helpful staff. 4. Comfortable room with thick walls. 5. Free in-room wifi internet 6. Desktop and printer available in the lobby 7. Complimentary coffee and tea in the mornings 8. Ice cold infused water in the afternoons 9. Complimentary apples at the front desk in the afternoons 10. Short walk to the Anaheim Resort Transportation Bus Stops (Marriott Anaheim and Hilton).  You can purchase the bus passes from the front desk.  Heard that some other bus passengers did not receive correct change when they purchased their ART passes from the kiosk in front of the Hilton
Manager Response: Dear needvacationah,  Thank you very much for such a wonderful review!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your experienced with us and appreciate your time in completing your detailed review on our Anaheim hotel.  We were so happy to read through your long list of pros; however, we also appreciate your list of suggestions.  We are constantly focused on doing what we can to make the necessary adjustments or improvements to ensure our guests have an enjoyable stay with us.  We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I checked in pretty late on a wed., it did take a while, but the front desk employee was working alone. He was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very very clean, spacious, and welcoming. The bed was just right and had a ton of pillows, the gym was clean, a little small, but open till 11. The front desk employee helped us find food in there store (the size of a walk in closet) they had tons of snacks: snadwiches, chips, cookies, fruit, poptarts, sodas, salads, ect. The hotel is literally right across the street from disneyland and the shuttles are cheap, well worth it. the park was MAGICAL of course, but i HIGHLY suggest going during the week, its too busy otherwise. and the WORLD OF COLOR is worth it, make sure to fast track it and get in line at least 30min early. a
Manager Response: Dear v_naranjo,  So glad to hear you enjoyed your experience with us!  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback by completing the review on our Anaheim hotel.  We are delighted that you found our rooms very, very clean, spacious and welcoming.  It's always great to read about how comfortable our guests were during their stay.  Our comfy beds and pillows are always appreciated by our guests and we're glad you found them to be just right!  We are located right across the street from Disneyland and our central location makes it easy for our guests to get around by car or foot.  Thanks again for all of your wonderful compliments and for your recommendation of our Anaheim hotel.  Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, new property with helpful staff, clean rooms, convenient location & great pool!
Summary: I stayed here with my family on 7/24-7/26. We arrived an hour before check in time & were able to check into our room early. The gentleman at the front desk was very friendly & helpful. He recommended some nearby restaurants which he thought we might enjoy. More on that later. The property is fairly new & the rooms are clean with modern decor. The restroom is roomy with lots of shelf space. There is a small fridge which came in handy. Beds were very comfortable. The pool is very nice, and empty around the 2-4pm hour. The ART shuttle to Disneyland is convenient to use. $1 for kids, $4 for adults for an all day pass. The shuttle picks up & drops off @ Marriott next door.  We didn't eat breakfast here but it runs about $9 for kids & $9-12 for adults for the breakfast buffet. We had
Manager Response: Dear sfmomoftwo,  We are very happy to hear of your comfort and enjoyment during your recent stay at our Anaheim hotel.   Thank you for all of your great comments on our property: friendly and helpful service, convenient location, comfortable accommodations and the list goes on!  Its great to hear our guests feedback and we appreciate you taking the time to complete the review.  Come back and visit for another great experience!  We look forward to seeing you again!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights while we were visiting Disneyland. We arrived early on our first day, and were able to check in immediately at 11 am :) :) Our room was on the 2nd floor, and was very spacious and clean.  The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland- about 3/4 mile to the main gates, we walked, and it was not bad at all!  We asked the advice of one of the friendly housekeepers on where to eat, and she recommended  El Pollo Norteno, and La Casa Garcia restaurants, they were both DELICOUS!   I believe they both deliver to the hotel, but we actually went to the restaurants, as they were just down the street.  The only problem we had with this hotel was the elevator! It was the slowest elevator I have ever come across anywhere! We waited 10 whole minutes
Manager Response: Dear azmommyto3,  We are so excited to receive such excellent ratings on our Anaheim hotel!  Thank you very much for sharing and detailing your experience with specifics for other travelers to take advantage of.  It is always our pleasure to help out with suggestions and anything else you may need during your stay with us.  We would also like to apologize for your wait in regard to our elevator.  Please know that the third party vendor that services the elevator has been out to perform it's check up.  Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We're very happy that you'll definitely stay with us again!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Front desk staff very helpful. We stayed for 3 nights in a family suite on the 2nd floor. Didn't sleep the first night kids were noisy and runnning above our room and didn't stop till after midnight. We complained the next morning and they moved us on the 3rd flr next door to the kids:)  Very pleased with the room and happy with the service.
Manager Response: Dear Thegangs,  Thank you for staying with us and for completing the review on our property.  We do apologize for the kids you heard and are so glad that we were able to relocate you to a different room.  Thank you very much for the compliments on our happy and helpful service.   We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and customer service.  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This is a fairly new property next to the Marriott Hotel.  It is a great location with easy access to the Disneyland via a shuttle bus.  The rooms are nice and the staff is very accommodating.  I would stay at this Marriott Courtyard again next time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear BedBuggin,   Thank you so much for your recommendation of our Anaheim hotel!  We appreciate your business and your time in completing the review.  Our location truly is great!  Although we are only a 10 minute walk away, The Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle makes things easier after a long day of walking at Disneyland.  Thank you so much for your excellent ratings on our property!  We are so happy to hear that you'll be back to see us on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Solid hotel choice for solo traveler or two adults
Summary: Exactly what you would expect, Nice comfortable beds, walking distance to Disney Resort, good restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Dear GLG_074,  We are honored to be your solid hotel choice!  Thank you for staying with us and completing the review.  It's great to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable beds and convenient location.  The short walking distance to Disneyland and all of great Anaheim restaurants nearby is most definitely appreciated by all of our guests.  We look forward to your next visit!  Thanks again, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Planned a getaway for the 4th of July weekend.  This particular Courtyard had an on-line special that included breakfast each morning and $20 VISA card for each night (up to 2 nights).  We stayed 3 nights.  Every staff member was polite and helpful.  Rooms were clean and roomy and the beds were welcoming after walking around the Disney theme parks (the parks were about a 15-20 minute walk).  The breakfast buffet included omelets and waffles as well as fruit, oatmeal, yogurt, etc.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear kayleighsmom,  We are delighted to hear of your comfort and enjoyment!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent Anaheim visit.  We appreciate your wonderful compliments on our polite and helpful staff, clean and spacious accommodations and scrumptious breakfast buffet.  It's always nice to read how our guests feel welcomed at our Anaheim hotel, especially after a long day at the Disneyland parks.  Thank you for detailing your stay by completing the review on our property.  It's certainly great to hear that you will definitely stay with us again!  Best, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place, great location for Disneyland
Summary: My family and I stayed here three nights. Love the nice clean building, the pool, the restaurant and the amenities. It's close enough to Disneyland that you could walk there, but there is a very convenient shuttle that runs from the Marriott next door. The place really has the feel of a four star resort but the price was three star ... at least for California.
Manager Response: Dear GreyFamilyTX,  Thank you for making us your choice in accommodations during your recent 3 night visit to the Anaheim area!  We appreciate all of your wonderful compliments on property.  We really couldn't be happier to hear that you felt our property has the feel of a four star resort at the price of a three star!  Discounted, affordable rates is always a plus!  Again, thank you for all of your excellent ratings.  We hope to see you and your family on your return visit to Disneyland!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: just ok, i could have done better
Summary: things i didnt like... elevator was too slow despite just having 4 floors. one treadmill was broken the whole time i was there. and i was here for 5 days. location isnt very accesible from the main street. youll have to make a u-turn from convention way if coming frpm north bound harbor blvd. which the light takes forever to turn green. trees outside the parking lot leaves a ton of tree sap on your car. their breakfast was ok and quite pricey i thought. your better off at the dennys down the street. now the pros, their rooms are newer and are very clean. although i had my pillow cases changed cuz i could smell cologne from the last guest.. eeeew . and their walls are so thin that i can hear the next door guest and above me.
Manager Response: Dear batanes,  We are extremely disappointed that we did not exceed your expectations during your recent stay.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you commented on in your review.  We are, however, happy to hear that you did enjoy our clean accommodations.  Thank you for taking the time to complete the review and share your experience.  It truly is important to us and we appreciate your comments and suggestions.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Overall, I was impressed with this particular Courtyard.  It has the standard updated Courtyard feel to it.  What I was particularly impressed with was my room.  I had Rm. 244 which was a corner room and seemed a bit larger than the average room.  But I also popped in to other rooms (I had taken my staff to a conference) and their were nearly as large as well.  Everything was updated and in good working order.  I had a brief problem with the wired internet connection, but a gentleman came up immediately and helped me fix it.      There is a restaurant on site here, but I did not have time to eat there.  Menu looked decent enough though.  If I had to return to this area, I would certainly consider returning here.
Manager Response: Dear LQGuy,  Thank you so very much for completing the review on our hotel.  We certainly appreciate all of your great compliments on our spacious rooms and customer service, as well as all of your excellent ratings!  It was our pleasure to impress you, and we're sure glad we did!  Keep in mind for your next visit that our on-site restaurant, Panini Grill and Bar, serves Italian cuisine including made to order oven-baked pizza, warm grilled sandwiches and scrumptious salads. Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We're looking forward to accommodating you on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: If you can pay $160-180 per night for this hotel, I would like to suggest you pay 20 dollars more per night for some real three star hotel just half block away. It will be much worthy.     I had pretty good experience with Marriott before so I thought courtyard won't be that bad. It turns out I was totally wrong. I booked the room almost three months before the trip and mentioned specifically I need a high-floor room because I like a quiet environment. Guess what, they gave me a room on the third floor just next to elevator. I can hear all the traffic noise in hallway till midnight.  I beg them to change a room for me, so they moved me to the first floor room facing to the swimming pool. Aha, I can then hear the noise from swimming pool the whole day.  Addition remarks: The
Manager Response: Dear Dabu35805,  We are so very sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations during your recent stay with us.  It is very disappointing to read of the inconveniences you experienced and we truly hope that you will accept our sincere apologies.  Thank you for taking the time to give us your valued feedback, as it is extremely important to us in our continuous efforts to deliver the very best experience for each of our guests.  We do hope that you will reconsider and give us another opportunity to accommodate you on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, friendly staff, value for money
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights and it was an excellent stay. All the hotel staff were very friendly from the main desk staff to the waiters and waitress,especially the desk manager on Saturday the 8th who was very helpful with all my requests including when I couldn't get the laundry detergent from the machine she immediately advised to come to the front desk and she provided me with a free box.   The hotel is very clean and modern and the room was fantastic and had everything we needed - I was a bit concerned initially about noise as were closley located to one of the lifts but this didn't prove to be a problem and was pretty quiet. The food at the local restaurant was excellent and reasonably priced as I ended up eating all my meals there (breakfast & dinner) - the Amercian Burger
Manager Response: Dear Cyn_Aus,  What a fantastic review!  Thank you so very much for all of your excellent ratings across the board!  We are ecstatic!  It is always great to hear how our guests truly enjoyed their experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your stay by completing the review on our property.  It is our pleasure to accommodate you with everything you need including assistance with anything that will make your time with us an enjoyable and comfortable visit. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your recommendation to family and friends.  Glad to hear you will definitely be back!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Good hotel overall. Clean. Friendly staff. Housekeeping was more than generous in accommodating our needs. However, hotel does tend to exceed its beauty online. Not exactly what we saw online as far as the outside structure.......I was a little disappointed, however with that said, the most important things about the hotel inside, were great.  Kids enjoyed the pool. Fitness center could use a lot more machines, weights, etc. as well.
Manager Response: Dear willosc,  Thank you for your comments and suggestions and for completing the review on our property.  We are sorry that we did not exceed your expectations in regard to our building structure and the pictures that you viewed of it online.  Please know that all of our pictures we have posted are most certainly pictures taken of our beautiful property.  As you mentioned, more importantly, we are thrilled that you and your family enjoyed your overall stay with us.  Thank you for your very kind compliments on our clean accommodations, friendly customer service and more than generous housekeeping staff.  It's our pleasure to assist you in any way we can to ensure your stay is comfortable and enjoyable.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Disney Neighbor Hotel - a great quiet family value
Summary: Just back from a 3 night stay in a Family Suite, Room 430 at the Marriott Courtyard Anaheim and have to say that I am rather impressed with the facilities.  It is not the full version of a Marriott but it wasn’t what I needed.  I wanted something close and reasonable to Disney and based on previous TripAdvisor reviews we decided to give this one a shot.  The room rate was $143 + another $20 in local taxes and in my opinion was pretty good in that we had 3 adults and 2 kids staying in.  I do think $10 a day in parking should just be included in the room rate.  We stayed on the 4th floor (only have 4) in the middle of the hotel and it was perfect in that we never heard our neighbors but I am sure they heard our 2 kid’s steering up and down the bunk beds in the back room.  The
Manager Response: Dear mithai2011,  We really can't thank you enough for taking the time to share so many helpful details about your experience with other travelers.  Your suggestions are truly appreciated, as we are committed to improving in any way we can to make your stay the very best!  Thank you for your many wonderful compliments on our customer service within our hotel and restaurant.  Our entire staff is very pleased to hear all of your kind remarks in regard to our warm, friendly and helpful service.  We are certainly happy to hear that you would stay with us again and recommend us to family and friends.  Cheers to you, too!  Hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: great place to stay, friendly staff, close to disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for five nights, LA is pretty large so getting around was a bit of a problem. Hotel was great though, the room was good pretty good size and clean. The restaraunt and bar were great and not over priced. The young dark hair guy in the bar was really friendly. Overall would definitely stay here again. Internet was free which was awesome for us.
Manager Response: Dear october14_10,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent five night visit to the Anaheim area.  We appreciate all of your compliments on our great hotel!  We are delighted that you enjoyed our friendly staff, clean and spacious accommodations and excellent location.  We are happy to hear that you would definitely stay with us again, as well as recommend us to family and friends.  We're looking forward to your next visit out from Australia!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: I know I shouldn't base a review on one visit; however, the front desk staff woman (who shall remain nameless even though I know her name) was quite flippant and condescending when I checked in. Even when I checked out the same woman was tyoing away on her computer and I told her we were checking out -she didn't even look at me -she just took my room keys and nodded with a smirk. The rooms were average -nothing special. The king size bed with sofa pullout was ok to sleep on -felt like a king size piece of foam. The sofa pullout bedding was the crappy pullout mattress, fitted sheet, top sheet, and blue fleece-like blanket. You would think that a Courtyard so close to Disneyland would have better bedding for the pullout -maybe even offer a mattress pad/cover. The pool was nice as
Manager Response: Dear Stroller_Snob,  We are extremely disappointed to hear that we did not exceed your expectations during your stay with us.  Please know that your check in experience was most definitely the exception, as we are very proud of delivering the high level of friendly and professional customer service that our guests deserve and enjoy.  We are pleased to hear that you did enjoy our pool and convenient location.  We would certainly appreciate your consideration in giving us another opportunity to accommodate you again.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back!  Sincerely, Beckley Van Cleave General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, quiet; a good value.
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 5 nights with our two teenaged girls. DH attended an event at the convention center (a 5 minute) walk, while the girls and I did the theme parks and other sight-seeing. We got a very good rate ($87/night - an e-special on the Marriott website), for a room with two queen-sized beds. The room and bathroom were larger than I expected, and included an over-sized chair that folded out into a youth-sized bed. (My 13-year-old slept here.) The room also had a 'fridge. The beds were comfortable and the room was very quiet, even though we were just across the hall from the elevator. The charge for parking was $10/night -- not unusual, IMOHO, given the location. Internet access was free.   The staff was very friendly and helpful - we had no problem at
Manager Response: Dear MargaretAlabama,  We sincerely thank you for completing such a wonderful review on our hotel!  It's great to hear that you and your family enjoyed your experience so much that you would definitely stay here again.  We were also pleased to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location that allowed your husband only a 5 minute walk to the convention center while you and your girls were able to see all the attractions.  We are certainly glad to hear the family took advantage of watching the nightly Disneyland firework show while in bed!  It's always an added bonus to be so close to all of the excitement!  Hope to see you again soon!  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Grand hotel with a good surrounding
Summary: The hotel is opposite to Disney Land & hence has a lot of traffic. It appeared to be a popular hotel. The rooms in the hotel were good, & so was the service. The only difficulty I had, was for vegeterian food, that was not available nearby.
Manager Response: Dear manojkabre,  Thank you for your great compliments on our accommodations and customer service!  We appreciate your stay with us and your time in completing the review on our hotel. We most definitely agree that our location is most desirable; surrounded by the happiest place on earth is hard to beat!  Thank you for recommending our hotel to family and friends.  We hope you'll be back soon!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed our time at the Courtyard Anaheim. Clean, quiet, resort transit not too far away. Elevator a little slow. Very good quality for the excellent rate we got.
Manager Response: Dear trucker64,  Thank you for staying with us!  We are very pleased to hear that you  enjoyed a very good quality experience at affordable rates!  Thank you for taking the time to complete the survey and recommending us to family and friends.  We hope to see you and your family again soon!  Thanks again,   Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We were very happy to bring our family to disneyland and decided that paying a little extra for a hotel this time was worth it. The hotel is beautiful and the accomodations were very pleassing. However, when we had our car returned to us the next morning, we were surprised to find one of our belongings missing from the glove compartment. We were very disappointed at the fact that very little was done about this situation, and 5 days later we recieved a call from the hotel saying that they didnt have anything on this case, that we signed a paper agreeing to this and that it wasnt their responsibility to be held liable for lost or STOLEN items. It is very upsetting to have to sign a paper that indirectly tells you that if one of their staff steals something, its not their problem,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for families with kids
Summary: Stayed at the hotel on our 4 night trip to Disneyland. Did not spend much time in the room but it was clean and comfortable. The restaurant needs work - better food and hours of operation but the staff were always friendly and efficient. Mrs. Reyes the housekeeping manager is a star for sending us back our daughter's precious blanket - free of charge. We certainly recommend this hotel to families traveling to Disneyland. Shuttle is easy to catch nearby - we never had to wait too long for it; Disneyland is all about waiting anyways so it was never too big of a deal. Pool at the Hotel is great.
Manager Response: Dear eur0trash,  What a great review!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your 4 night visit to Anaheim.  We value all of our guests' feedback and appreciate any suggestions as well.  It was our pleasure to send your daughter's precious blanket back to her; we understand how priceless family treasures are.  Thank you so very much for all of your great compliments on our accommodations, pool and location.  We certainly appreciate your recommendation of our hotel and hope to see you again soon!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Standard Courtyard hotel - but breakfast sucked
Summary: Stayed for three nights over the Christmas holiday, with spouse and two kids, ages 8 & 10. Didn't spend much time in the room since the kids wanted to head off to Disneyland as early as possible and come back as late as possible.  Pretty standard Courtyard hotel. We couldn't get a suite, but our room didn't feel too cramped with the four of us in it. Good beds, clean shower. No complaints about the room.  Reception/Housekeeping took a while to attend to a request for extra sheets/blankets.  Parking fee of $10/night.  The breakfast was very uninspiring (although the restaurant staff were quite friendly and provided good service) - weak coffee, stale smelly sausages and bacon, unappetizing fruit. Stuck to the packaged yogurt, milk and cereal. Same fare on the two days we had the
Manager Response: Dear apl_in_delhi,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and for completing the review on our property.  We always enjoy hearing about all of the great things our guests love about our hotel; however, we also appreciate all of the suggestions we receive as well.  Thank you for your compliments on our clean and comfy accommodations and for mentioning that we are a better value for your money hotel in Anaheim.   Although, we do our very best to get all of our guests' requests fulfilled in a timely manner, we apologize for any delay you experienced while waiting for extra sheets/blankets.  Again, thanks for staying with us while visiting the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: This hotel is fantastic value - nice clean rooms and easily walkable to Disneyland. The staff on the front desk were wonderful and only too willing to provide assistance to us when we asked. Small things like a coin laundry, free wifi internet, and coffee in the reception area in the morning were nice touches. Would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear AusCouple,  We are so pleased to read all of the great things that made your experience with us a fantastic value and enjoyable stay; clean and nice accommodations, great location, wonderful customer service and all of the nice touches.  Thank you all of the great comments and for recommending our hotel to others.  We appreciate your time in giving us your valuable feedback.  We are looking forward to seeing you again in the New Year!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy

Summary: We chose this hotel after much debate about where to stay on our trip to Southern California. We were heading to Disneyland and wanted to stay someplace close so we could walk. It was just the two of us with no children, thus we weren't extremely concerned about distance, but still did not want to be too far away.  We found The Courtyard Marriott in Anaheim, and it was a gem.   The room was nice and clean, the hotel staff were simply a pleasure to deal with, always a smile when serving you.  The hotel was built in 2005 and was another reason for us to choose it. I will note I could notice some wear on the furniture. However with how great this hotel was, and the number of people I expect have visited the hotel, wear and tear are expected.  But everything was great. It was
