Manager Response: Dear CDOTR,  We are honored to receive such an excellent review and also to hear that we made such a positive impression that you now prefer to stay at Courtyards!  It was our pleasure to provide you with the impressive service and value that influenced your view on our brand.  That definitely says a lot about how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  We certainly appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback, as well as your recommendation of our hotel to family and friends.  Again, thank you for all of your wonderful compliments and for choosing to stay with us. Come visit us again soon!  Warm Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Did my research before booking my accomodations for my vacation and found this hotel to be the best in terms of value, cleanliness and service.  The fact that management responds to almost all the reviews here show how much they care about customer service.  Out of all the hotels that I have stayed at in this area, this was the best.  I was impressed with how clean it was.  Even though our room faced the elevator, I could not hear it through the walls.  Free wifi in the room was a plus.  Also it was great that we had a fridge that would get your drinks ice cold (unlike other hotel fridges we had).  Did not mind the walk to the park since we had to work off the cruise food we had earlier.  Service was helpful and friendly.  Would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear iluvtofish,  We would like to sincerely thank you for such an excellent review on our property.  It is so rewarding for all of us to hear that our hotel is the best out of all the others that your have stayed at in our area!  We would have to agree that our accommodations, amenities and customer service stand out above the rest, but it means so much to our entire staff when we hear it directly from our guests.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you would not hesitate to stay here again!  Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to complete the review.  We're looking forward to accommodating you again soon!  Warm Regards,  Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night, 10/30 before moving to the Residence Inn for a week. We were staying on an award night stay and treated just as good as if we had paid $. All the employees we encountered we very nice. Check-in was very fast (less than 2 min). Got a first floor room just steps away from the lobby (thanks for noticing my profile preferences). The room was lovely and very clean. The bathroom was huge. Liked the free use of the computer in the lobby (It was not free at the RI). We have now officially stayed at every Marriott property in Anaheim, Orange, and Garden Grove ( big Disneyland fans) and rate this one in the top 3. We were actually a little sad to be leaving.  I just wish Courtyards offered free breakfast to their gold & plat members. We will definitely be back in
Manager Response: Dear ValMar1,  Sorry to hear your stay was short, but we are so happy to hear that it was sweet!  To hear that you were actually a little sad to be leaving is quite a compliment; however, rating us in the top 3 Marriott properties of three cities is wonderful!  Thank you so very much for all of your kind words on our staff, attention to detail, amenities and, of course, our accommodations.  It really means so much to all of us here, especially coming from such an avid traveler to our area.  We truly appreciate your time in completing the review on our property and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Warm Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Disneyland was the start of our great big USA adventure.  We found the Marriott Courtyard and excellent hotel to stay for a family.  We booked a family room that had a seperate room with bunk beds for the kids along with their own TV and space.  The room also had a refrigerator, coffee perculator and a microwave.  The cleaness of the hotel was excellent.  The hotel also offers a small laundrymat. The hotel was about a fifteen minute walk from Disneyland, but we didn't mind as the exercise counteracted all the food we were eating.  The only downfall I would have to say was that the staff on the front desk weren't as knowledgable and helpful on the local area.  Even as how and were to catch shuttle buses to Disneyland or how to get to LA or Universal Studio.  Overall a fantasic
Manager Response: Dear WeLuv2Travel4,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us as you and your family began your big USA adventure!  We are so happy to hear that overall you had a fantastic stay!  Thank you for your great compliments on our accommodations, amenities and location.  We would also like to apologize for the front desk staff member not being able to provide you with all the information you requested; however, we would like to assure you that this was an exception, as our front desk staff members are indeed very helpful and knowledgeable in regard to the local area.  Thank you for completing the review on our property.  We were honored to be a part of your family's traveling adventure!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Loved it Would definatly stay there again!
Summary: After extensive research on hotels and motels i have to say that we were very fortunate to have our stay at this hotel on our first ever visit to Disneyland. The hotel staff were very friedly and accommodating, the rooms, lobby restraunt were very clean. Although the location was a good 10-15 min walk from the resort the bus were very frequent and with 2 little ones (under 5) we didn't have a problem at all. The breakfast although not part of the package was very reasonable and the hotel was a few minutes away from Denny. We were given a really good tip from a friend. As soon as we got to our hotel we got a cab to the Target about $8 but check when you book the cab to be sure, we stocked up on a case of water, snacks, a stroller $12, and fruit cups and saved so much money not
Manager Response: Dear pink1977_9,  After your extensive research on hotels and motels in our area, we are honored that you chose to stay with us for your first ever visit to Disneyland!  We are so happy that you will definitely stay with us again!  Thank you for all of your very kind remarks on our customer service, accommodations and on our restaurant, Panini Grill.  We're glad that you and your family enjoyed your breakfast.  It was also great to hear that the mini fridge in your room worked out great for your family to store water and snacks.  Thanks again for choosing to stay with us and for completing the review on our property.  We're looking forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Our family of 4 just returned from a quick trip to Disneyland.  We stayed 3 nights at this hotel and loved it.  I must be honest, we are annual pass holders and work for a major airline, so we do visit the Disneyland Resort area about 3 to5 times a year and we ALWAYS stay at Embassy Suites Anaheim South on Harbor.  Having said that, we decided to stay at the Courtyard Mariott, partly because we had a great discount, being that we are Mariott Rewards members and because it was a quick trip...simply, we had planned to just be at the parks all day, every day to take in the sights of Halloween Time at Disneyland..so we basically only needed a place to sleep and shower.  Our normal visits are usually for 6-8 days in Southern California and we use Embassy as our home base to visit
Manager Response: Dear mommy808,  We certainly appreciate your valued time and feedback in your review for our property.   Thank you so very much for all of your wonderful compliments on our customer service, accommodations, amenities and on our restaurant, Panini Grill.  It's always great to receive high ratings from such avid travelers to our area.  Thank you for all of your comments and suggestions.  It was our pleasure to exceed your expectations and we hope you and your family will decide to stay with us on your next visit.  Warm Regards, Mitch Healy

Summary: Close enough to Disneyland to walk (about 15 minutes) if you're in good health.  Clean rooms.  They were kind of small, the sofa and king bed could barely fit in the room.  And, the bed was set up so you couldn't lay down and watch TV.  Pretty weird.
Manager Response: Dear onesmallinstrument,  We apologize for the inconvenience in regard to your bed and the location of the television.  For your next visit, please know that we are here to assist you in any way we can.  Don't hesitate to call our front desk so that we may have the opportunity to help you the very best we can to ensure that your experience with us is comfortable and enjoyable.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and clean accommodations.  Thank you for noting that you would recommend us to family and friends.  We appreciate your completion of the review on our property and look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: We stayed for four nights while enjoying Disneyland.  I was impressed with the staff - very helpful and friendly,  The rooms were very clean and updated and it was quiet.  This hotel is not in walking distance to Disneyland, but we knew that.
Manager Response: Dear kimseattle,  We are thrilled to hear you loved our property!  We loved having you stay with us!  It was truly our pleasure to impress you with our customer service.  We certainly enjoy exceeding our guests' expectations!   Thank you for detailing your experience with us for other travelers. We are so pleased that you enjoyed our clean, updated and quiet accommodations and hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Great  location if you are attending  a convention as it is a 5 - 10 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center  Going to Disney?? You will be on a bus as it is a LONG walk Comfortable room  with improved bedding Room was quite even with kids all over the place You will save $$$ on the auto parking fee as compared to other hotels. Would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear traveler611,  We are happy to hear that you found us conveniently located a quick and easy walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. If you plan to go to Disneyland on your next visit and decide not to walk, the Disneyland® Resort Shuttle can pick you up and take you to their front gates for a minimal fee ($4.00/adult, $1/child).  We were also glad to hear that your room was comfortable and quiet and, most importantly, that you will stay with us again!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for completing the review on our property.  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: Another great Marriott experience in my book!  Somehow they managed to have rooms available about five days before a major trade show in Anaheim--really saved our company!  It is walking distance to the convention center which is awesome because then you don't have to pay the extraordinary fee to park on site.  The staff was incredibly wonderful to us and the rooms were clean, nice and spacious.  There did tend to be a lot of children and families staying in the hotel seeing as how it is also walking distance to Disneyland and Downtown Disney.  (This wasn't a problem for me since I was out at the convention all day.)  It is walking distance to a handful of restaurants as well.  One small thing to note however:  If booking for single occupancy or for couples with no children,
Manager Response: Dear newb85,  We can't thank you enough for all of the great compliments and for taking the time to complete the review on our hotel.  Feedback from our guests is extremely important to us and we appreciate you detailing your experience with us.  We are thrilled to hear that our service is wonderful and that our accommodations are nice, clean and spacious!  As you mentioned, being so close to all of the tourists attractions as well as the convention center definitely makes our property ideal for both the business and leisure traveler.  It's always nice to be within walking distance to everything!  We appreciate you and your colleagues choosing to stay with us and giving us the opportunity to provide you with another wonderful Marriott experience.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: A clean and comfortable home away from home
Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard Marriot for 6 nights at the end of September. The hotel itself was very clean, including carpets, linens, etc. The service was wonderful, all staff were very accomodating. We arrived several hours earlier than check-in time and they were able to get us into a room right away. We had a king-sized room with a sofa bed and we found it to be plenty of space (we are a family of 4 with two younger children). The bathroom was spacious and also very clean. Our room was very quiet and we ran the air conditioner the whole time. We used the pool almost every day. It is a beautiful space that is well maintained.  We had breakfast in the hotel restaurant a few times and our youngest ate for free (3 and under free). The food was good and the service in the
Manager Response: Dear abissEdmonton,  We are so honored to be your home away from home!  Thank you so very much for such an excellent review on our property and for choosing to stay with us during your 6 night visit to the Anaheim area.  We are thrilled to hear that you really enjoyed your experience with us and that you found our hotel and restaurant staff to be wonderful!  It is so very important to us to maintain and deliver a consistent superior level  of customer service to all of our guests.  We are glad that you found our accommodations clean, spacious and comfortable.  Thank you for also noting that you ran the air conditioner the whole time and that your room was very quiet.  Again, thank you for your valued feedback.  We hope that you and your family plan to visit us again soon!  Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Another Great Value in the Marriott Chain
Summary: I typically stay at Marriott when travelling as I have almost never had any disappointments there. When booking to attend a conference at the nearby coonvention center I was at first disappointed when the big Marriott adjacent to the convention center was booked up. I noted the Courtyard was close by and went ahead and booked it over other large hotels near the convention center. I couldn't have been more pleased with my choice. The room was large, clean and comfortable. Daily cleaning service was great. Desk Staff was friendly and helpful with any request. Ate at the restaurant adjacent to the lobby every morning and ate a good buffet every time. The location was near the convention center, just a short walk.  I was very happy with my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Flash1056,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  We're glad you found us and that you couldn't have been more pleased with your choice!  We are pleased to hear that you were so happy with everything about your stay.  Spacious, clean and comfortable accommodations, friendly and helpful service, great breakfast buffet and a very convenient location; all of your compliments are greatly appreciated! We are looking forward to serving you again on your next visit with us!  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great new resort, good location, just pack your tennies!
Summary: My husband and I stayed here a night before heading to Disneyland. We were very happy with the service at check in. We were given a room even though we were a few hours ahead of check in. We headed to our room and then were off to Disney. We were a few blocks from the park but it was a fairly easy walk. There were plenty of  restaurants and souveneir shops in the area as well. The hotel itself was clean and modern ( only about a year old or so ), nice computer area in the lobby as well as complimentary infused water and coffee services. The water alone was worth its weight when you are talking about 85 degree heat and sun. We did not use the pool but it looked nice and clean as well. I would definitely reccomend this resort for business and leisure travel.
Manager Response: Dear brandinecole,  We would like to thank you and your husband for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience by completing the review on our property. We are so happy to hear that you both enjoyed our hotel's accommodations and amenities.  As you mentioned, our property is most definitely an easy walk to Disney, as well as several restaurants and shops in the area.  Thank you for all of your compliments on our friendly customer service, clean and modern accommodations and our complimentary services in the lobby area.  It is our pleasure to provide you with the necessities needed to thoroughly enjoy your stay with us.  We also appreciate your recommendation of our hotel to both business and leisure travelers.  Come back and visit us again soon!  Best Regards, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed at this Courtyard by Disneyland recently, and it was a good choice. Their "kids suites" are a great size for a family of 5 and allow the parents to stay up later than the kids. It's not completely two separate bedrooms though because for some reason the door is a glass door with just a translucent curtain on it. The service was great. Everyone was helpful, from the desk people to the restaurant and bar. Food was excellent (although no room service even for breakfast) and the pool/hot tub was a wonderful place to go after walking around Disney all day. My only complaint was that the rooms and hallways were worn out. Chipped fixtures in the bath, broken drawer pulls, stained carpets, and the like. I understand they get a lot of families and that puts a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Frog Dressed as a Prince
Summary: From the exterior the hotel appears nicely appointed, but once inside everything changes...  1)  The hotel charges you to pay for parking, even though there are a ton of spots out in front of the hotel and between the hotel and the Ruth Chris restaurant (these spots are not reserved for the restaurant). 2)  It took the staff 30 minutes to get us to our room.  First they gave us the wrong room number/floor, then the wrong key, and only on the 3rd try did they finally get it right. 3)  As this is a newer hotel, think cheap construction.  The walls were paper thin and the corridors extremely narrow.  We could hear all of our neighbor’s conversations as well as any occurring in the hallway.  If you are traveling with children or want to get any sleep, I would not recommend staying
Manager Response: Dear SF-Builder,  We are sincerely sorry that we did not exceed your expectations.  We would also like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us.  It is certainly disappointing to hear that you did not enjoy your stay, as we are constantly striving to deliver a positive and memorable experience for each and every one of our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to complete the review on our property.  We value your feedback and appreciate your suggestions.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary Heading: Not bad....very clean, basic but not the best hotel you could stay in.
Summary: Rooms were spotless but small......the kids suite was tiny...one room with 2 queen beds and another with one bunk bed and a sleeper sofa (if this was made as a bed, it would be a squeeze to get round it). So they gave us 2 queen rooms at no extra charge which was good as at least we had 2 wardrobes and 2 bathrooms then between us. That said, it was still a squash for 4 in one room, for 2 weeks, storage wise. The staff were friendly but as a small hotel,they seemed to double up on their duties (eg: the chef brought us extra towels and the security guard a plunger when the toilet got blocked - this was late one night and we asked for the maintenance to sort out the toilet and were brought a plunger to do it ourselves and were told there was only one person on front desk and the
Manager Response: Dear tabby761,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the Anaheim area.  We would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations; however, we appreciate your compliments on our spotless accommodations and friendly customer service.   We are glad that we were able change your room location and are sorry for any inconvenience you experienced due to the cleaning products the housekeeping staff was using on the corridor carpets.    It is also nice to hear that you found some time to enjoy our bar area.  It is the perfect place to relax and enjoy a nightcap after a long day!  Thank you for your time in completing the review.  All of your feedback is most certainly appreciated.  Sincerely, Mitch Healy, General Manager

Summary: My family of three (hubby, myself and 8 yr old daughter) stayed at the Marriott July 11-18. The hotel was nicer than I thought it would be based on some reviews. We have stayed in the Disney strip before (2007 - Howard Johnson) and found the Marriott was closer to what we like in a hotel. The service in the restaurant was wonderful, as was their breakfast. The outdoor pool was  heaven after a long hot day and we particularly like the fact it was salt water filtered. The walk to the park was about 15 minutes at a nice leisurely pace.  We did discover some fabulous restaurants (California Pizza and Cheesecake Factory)  along Katella Avenue (spelling) that was next to a beautiful outdoor mall. Sure wish we knew about it the first trip. We spend 5 full to partial days at Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear TeacherPrinceGeorge,  We are delighted to hear that you had such a fabulous vacation and that we were a part of it! Thank you for all of your wonderful compliments on our restaurant (Panini Bar & Grill), outdoor heated pool, location and especially on our great service!  It is always so rewarding for our entire staff to receive such positive feedback on our property.  We are also pleased to hear that we offer what you and your family enjoy in a hotel!  Our amenities and location are certainly hard to beat.  We are, indeed, a short walking distance to all of the Anaheim attractions and a short drive to many hot spots outside of the area.  Glad to hear that you were able to find some time to visit the beach and the zoo during your stay.  Thank you so very much for completing the review and sharing your experience with other travelers.  We appreciate your note that you would stay with us again and recommend us to friends.  We look forward to being a part of your next visit to the Anaheim area!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: After a hotel handles the basics then everything else adds to that. I am guessing that the hotel was bought from another company and then refurbished. The AC fan speed is not adjustable and is loud, making it hard to sleep.  Also you have to pay for $9 parking and $12 for breakfast.  I have stayed at Residence Inn, another Marriott Hotel and Country Inn suites, that have free breakfast and parking and quiet AC units. The only advantage is that it is close to Disneyland, but still too far to walk.
Manager Response: Dear jgcec,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the Anaheim area.  We appreciate your time in completing the review and giving us your feedback.   We are extremely sorry for any inconvenience you experienced with the a/c unit in your room.  We appreciate the opportunity to resolve any issue that may arise while you are staying with us.  Our maintenance team is full of experts that make our lives much easier and enjoyable.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience with other travelers.  We hope that you do decide to stay with us again in the future.  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: We enjoyed using this hotel as home base during our stay.  We had a kids suite, which gave us plenty of room for the family.  The room was very clean, staff were helpful.  The pool area was very nice, especially for a hotel in this price range.  About a 20 minute walk into the gate at Disney, but not a problem. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear momongo618,  Thank you for such a great review and for allowing us to be your home base on your recent visit to the Anaheim area. Your feedback is very important to us and we appreciate your time in completing the review.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your experience with us!  Thank you for all of your kind compliments on our staff, accommodations and location.  The extra space and amenities in our Kids Suite is ideal for families traveling with children.  We're glad to hear that you would stay with us again and that you would recommend us to a friend!  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary Heading: the best hotel in the area
Summary: this was a grerat and very clean hotel. the staff was great . After having a bad time at the ramanda maingate.  we always stayf at marriott.    you could walk to the park or take a cab.
Manager Response: Dear kris123Maryland,  We are ecstatic to receive such an honor as the title of Best Hotel in the Area from one of our valued guests!  It truly means so much to each and every member of our staff.  We are constantly striving to deliver superior customer service to all of our guests.  It is always rewarding to hear such great feedback.  We appreciate your time in completing the review of our property.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Courtyard Anaheim!  Best Regards, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: We stayed for 1 night after visiting local theme park. Location is prime if you are visiting Disney area. The hotel is very clean, decor up to date. The staff was very pleasant. Breakfast is pretty good, although a bit pricey (typical of many hotels). There is a nice patio and pool area. Overall, I would stay again as long as the rate is good.
Manager Response: Dear csgPhoenix,  Thank you so very much for all of the wonderful compliments on our hotel, staff and location.  We are so pleased that you had an enjoyable stay with us!  You're right:  our location is prime and our restaurant, Panini Bar & Grill, has a great hot breakfast buffet!  For your convenience, our restaurant is also open for dinner, so please keep that in mind for your next visit.  We certainly appreciate your time in completing the review and sharing your experience with other travelers.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to your next visit.  Come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for two nights in January (we got engaged at Disneyland during this stay!).  We loved it here . . . the room was huge, comfortable and very clean, the hotel served a great hot breakfast every morning and the ART shuttle to the parks was a convenient way to get around.  The hotel isn’t walking distance from the parks, but the trade off is how comfortable and quiet it is.  This hotel is a great option for couples who want a little more space and peace out of a Disneyland vacation.
Manager Response: Dear HollyLyne,  Congratulations are in order!  What a very special trip this was for you!  Thank you for allowing us to be a part of such a memorable visit and for completing such a great review on our property.  We are so happy that you loved it here and that, as a couple, you were able to enjoy a little more space and peace out of your vacation.  The shuttle is, indeed, a convenient way to get around and we're glad that you found comfort and quiet when you returned to our hotel each day.   Now it's time to start planning for the big day!  Our very best wishes to both of you for a lifetime of happiness!   Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: Since most family trips with our 5 year-old are road trips to visit family, we wanted to create a memorable Disneyland trip that was about him without draining our sanity or wallets.  Some friends recommended this hotel specifically for the kids suite, and that paid off for us in so many ways.    The Courtyard's kids suites include a privacy door separating the king bedroom from a second kids room.  He had bunk beds in his room and a couch that faced his own TV.  We were also lucky to have a mini fridge in there  that didn't double as a mini bar (no need to hunt for space) and a microwave.  I never felt guilty about fixing him a snack in his room or reheating my leftovers as lunch to save a few dollars.  I thought I read about video games on the website, but I can't remember if
Manager Response: Dear AZyoulikeit,  It was our sincere pleasure to be a part of creating a memorable trip for your son on your recent visit to the Anaheim area!  We enjoyed being your fantastic headquarters for Disney fun!!  We are so happy to hear that your friend's recommendation of our Kids Suite paid off for you in so many ways!  The separate room, TV, game table, bunk beds and all the other amenities in our Kids Suites are designed with our younger guests in mind. We are so pleased that it helped make your son's stay more comfortable.  What a special surprise that must have been for him to watch Disneyland's Summer Magic fireworks framed in perfect view of his very own hotel window! Hopefully, he felt that it was all arranged just for him!  We really can't thank you enough for taking the time to write such an excellent review on our property.  Our entire staff is committed to always delivering a superior level of customer service.  We truly appreciate your compliments and comparisons of our service.  We are extremely flattered to be included in a list with such great company!  Again, thank you for all of your feedback and for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to being a part of your next family trip to the Anaheim area!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: This hotel was to be the first stop for my family's holiday in the US. We had booked it for 8 nights, then would go to Las Vegas and would return to finish our holiday with 3 nights at the Disneyland hotel. We enjoyed our stay at this hotel so much that we cancelled the Disneyland hotel booking and returned to the Courtyard by Marriott to finish our stay. We read all the reviews on here, some good/some bad, and decided to chance it by booking this hotel and have to say that it was a great decision.  The staff were all very friendly and fantastic, nothing was a problem for them. The room we had was a twin queen, it was very clean and big enough to fit the 4 of us (2 adults & 2 teens) quite comfortably. I didn't experience any noise as mentioned in other reviews but given the
Manager Response: Dear bludger1,  All of us here at the Courtyard Marriott Anaheim would like to thank you for such an outstanding review!  We are extremely honored that you decided to cancel your reservations elsewhere in order to return to our property for the remainder of your trip.   We were thrilled to read all of your wonderful compliments on our staff and accommodations.  It is truly our pleasure to do absolutely anything we can to ensure you enjoy your stay.  Also, thank you for  the high rating on our breakfast. That's quite a compliment to be ranked higher than the resort you mentioned in your review!  Again, thank you for taking the time to detail and share your experience with us for other travelers.  Your recommendation to other travelers means a lot to us and we hope you and your family come again soon!  Best Regards, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: Spent 5 nights while in town for a conference.   All staff, from front desk, housekeeping, and grill were very polite and helpful.  No room service, but could order food and grill staff called when it was ready.  Food was okay..but compared to the price of other hotel fare/room service, it was a deal.    I would skip ordering soda from the grill as you get a better deal from the vending machine if your planning on not eating at the grill.  Only complaint I would have is that the detailed cleaning in the room left a little to be desired.  Chair and bedskirt looked as though they had not been cleaned in awhile, but the rest of the bedding was clean and crisp.  Within a very short walking distance to Convention Center and walking distance to full range of dining in either
Manager Response: Dear TravelingIowaMama,  Thank you for such an outstanding review!  We are truly thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us.  Delivering a superior level of customer service to all of our guests is extremely important to our entire staff.  We are ecstatic after reading all of your great compliments!  In the future, please let us know of any detail we can attend to.  It really is our pleasure to ensure that you enjoy absolutely everything about your stay with us!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary Heading: Nice and clean and close to everything
Summary: We stayed here when my daughter had a dance competition at the Anaheim Convention Center.  The staff were amazing, the room was immaculate and the breakfast buffet was full of fresh fruit every morning.  I was travelling alone with a one year old and an eight year old so the convenience store in the hotel was a life-saver.  We were close enough to Disney to walk there whenever we had a few hours without dancing.  Lots of restaurants around too.
Manager Response: Dear scrapn4,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for all of your great compliments on our staff, rooms and breakfast buffet.  We understand how hectic it can be when you are involved in events being held at the Anaheim Convention Center and we're glad that our close proximity to Disneyland allowed you to enjoy yourselves outside of the dance competitions.  As you mentioned, the many restaurants located nearby are definitely convenient as well.  Thank you so very much for choosing to stay with us during your daughter's dance competition.  We're hoping that she did well and that you'll be back to visit us again soon!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights and could not be happier.  The front desk staff was superior in every way, the lobby area and hallways were clean, brightly lit, and colorfully appointed.  I was given a handicapped room when I checked in because it was the only one ready with a king bed, and I was amazed at how big the room was--almost like a suite.  Everything in the room was clean and new.  There was only one thing to criticize during my stay, which was that the printer for the computers in the lobby was not working during the entire time I was there, so I had to print boarding passes elsewhere.  I was very happy overall and I think it compares very well to other more expensive hotels in the area around Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear dgoody53,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review for our property!  We are absolutely thrilled that you had a wonderful experience!  We would like to thank you for all of your compliments on our deluxe rooms and, most importantly, on our superior service.    Our entire staff is dedicated to delivering a high level of customer service to each and every one of our guests.  We couldn't be happier that you felt you received superior service in every way.  We would also like to take a moment to apologize for the printer mishap and let you know that it has been serviced and is working properly.  Again, thank you for completing the review and for all of your positive feedback.  As you mentioned, we do compare very well to the other more expensive hotels in the area, but our affordable rates are simply unbeatable!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: We loved this hotel.  We stayed for 5 nights in late April/early May with our 7 and 9 year olds.  The front reception staff were all sensational and amongst the best we've found at any hotel we've ever stayed at.  Our room was clean and quiet and big enough for the four of us.  Yes it is a fair walk to Disneyland for the kids (about 15-20 mins) but we had great weather so it turned into a nice stroll.
Manager Response: Dear Travelinwkids14,  Thank you so very much for your wonderful review!  We are so happy that you enjoyed your experience with us.  Our front desk staff was very excited to hear that you thought they were sensational, and ecstatic to hear they are amongst the best you've encountered at any hotel you've stayed at.  Delivering superior customer service is extremely important to every member of our team.  It is so rewarding to hear such great compliments from our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and for choosing to stay with us during your visit to the Anaheim area.    We're looking forwarding to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary Heading: What a Gem !!!!  This is a great hotel
Summary: I travel frequently for business, and was attending a conference at the nearby convention center, so chose this hotel for myself and my colleagues because of its location.  Firstly, I have stayed at many Marriott properties in the past and have to admit that I find most of them satisfactory at best.  This hotel was a completely different experience !!  I sent ahead of my arrival, various boxes of business collateral, and at check-in the receptionist immediately identified me and informed me of the number of boxes I had in storage and where would I like them placed.  Wow - that never happens.  Usually I spend an hour or two trying to track down packages with the receivers.  My room was large, spotlessly clean, modern bathroom, quiet and opposite the elevator (they put me in that
Manager Response: Dear spangela,  We are absolutely thrilled to receive such a wonderful review!  Thank you so very much for all of your detailed compliments.   Our property's location is hard to beat, our rooms are most definitely impressive and the list of amenities are very attractive; but, as you mentioned, our superior level of customer service to all of our guests is what you'll remember most after staying with us.  It was truly our pleasure to ensure that attention to every detail was taken care of for you from the minute you arrived to when you checked out.  Our entire staff appreciates all of your feedback, especially the note regarding our service exceeding that of most 5 star hotels you've stayed in all over the world!    Again, we truly appreciate your time in sharing your experience with other travelers.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary Heading: Courtyard quality close to the parks!
Summary: We arrived late at night coming back from Hawaii.  Staff was friendly and got us our room.  Due to three hour time change and travelling all day we were tired.  I have to say this is the noisiest hotel I have ever stayed at.  Realize we slept a little later, but it was noisy starting at 7:00 - noisier than any of our trips to Disney World.  It was spring break, but I was surprised at how parents were letting the kids yell and run in the halls. The room itself was clean and updated, and the staff was outstanding. It is a long walk to the parks (about a half-mile), but my mobility-impaired wife was able to walk the entire way.  There is also a shuttle available for unlimited rides for $4 p/p. I recommend this hotel as long as you are not trying to sleep in.
Manager Response: Dear skibumVail,  We are so glad that you stopped in to stay with us after a trip to Hawaii!  Our staff surely appreciates your "outstanding" compliment!  Our hotel was built with our guests in mind and it is our pleasure to do anything we can to ensure you enjoy everything about it!  We do apologize about all of the noise and excitement that comes along with families and other travelers on Spring Break.  Sometimes our younger guests have a bit more energy than the others, especially when they are on break from school!  Please know that we will do everything we possibly can to keep all areas comfortable and peaceful.  Don't hesitate to let us know when we can be of assistance.  Thank you for your feedback and time in completing the review for our property.  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary Heading: Great hotel, but a little far from Disneyland
Summary: I purchased two rooms for my family - one for the kids and one for my husband and me.  I requested a connected room and got one.  I was even able to get an early check-in when I called early a.m. the day of the arrival.  The hotel is small (4 stories) and more than a half mile away from Disneyland.  The rooms were a good size with a mini fridge which was great to keep bottled water, milk, and light snacks that we picked up at the local grocery store.  The room was quiet and the beds comfortable.   I liked that the beds had four different types of pillows to appeal to almost any type sleeper.  The hotel has a small pool with hot tub attached.  The staff was very helpful and rooms kept very clean.  I have only two comments of caution for future guests:  The hotel is about a 20
Manager Response: Dear jl43770,  Thank you for your very nice review of our property.  It is always so rewarding to read that our guests enjoyed their experience with us from the minute they arrive at our front desk, to the time they check out.  It is always our pleasure to accommodate an early check in when we can and we're glad that it was convenient for you!  You mentioned so many wonderful things about our property and we certainly appreciate all of them!  Spacious, quiet and clean rooms with comfy beds and fluffy pillows....you described our rooms perfectly!  Oh yes, we can't forget about that mini fridge available in all of our Kids Suites.  It really is convenient for both families and business travelers to store drinks and snacks.  We are a short walk away from Disneyland, but we completely understand how any distance can really be exhausting after a long day of walking around at the park.   We do hope that you were able to take advantage of the Disneyland Resort Shuttle ($4.00/adult, $1/child).  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to your return visit!  Best, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: As many other reviewers have done, I stayed at this location for a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center, which is within walking distance.  The location on Harbor is close to the ACC, the mall and Disney, both on Katella, if you can walk a mile. Parking is $9 per day. Check-in was easy and I had requested early check-in and a change from 2 queens to a single king room, which was honored. The staff was accommodating the entire time. The elevator may be the slowest known to man. The room was a little tighter than I expected with a nice view of the pool, facing east.  Marble countertop in the bath.  The bath was very clean and looked new.  The shower was good and supported shower massage and normal shower. There was a drying line also. The fridge and coffee maker went
Manager Response: Dear Bookflyer,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with other travelers by completing the review.  We truly appreciate all of your feedback.  It's great to hear that all of our staff was accommodating throughout your entire stay.  We continuously strive to maintain a very high level of customer service and will do anything we can to ensure that our guests enjoy their stay.    We were also happy to hear "the bed was excellent"  and that you were able to enjoy our fitness center.  We do apologize for not replenishing the towels as soon as they needed to be.  Please don't hesitate to let us know next time so that we have the opportunity to resolve the issue while you are still staying with us.  We're also glad that you were able to use our convenient business center; however, once again, please don't ever hesitate to let us know when we can be of assistance with any of our computers or printers.  It is truly our pleasure to be of help whenever possible.  We would like to thank you for all of your detailed comments in your review and for choosing to stay with us while you attended a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center.  We look forward to accommodating you again on your next visit to the Anaheim Area.  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: First off, let me say, we really did enjoy our stay here, it was very convenient to NAMM, Disneyland and Fullerton, where I needed to be.  The room was spacious and very, very comfortable.  With all that was going on around the area at the time, our room was very quiet and relaxing.  We received a great rate and the staff at the front desk were delightful and very helpful.  My problem with this hotel stems from what I perceive to be a bit deceiving about their breakfast buffet.  I had asked when I booked the room if they had breakfast available in the mornings.  I was told, yes.  I was given the hours when breakfast was available, also.  That night, I called to request a late check out for the next morning, which they graciously granted, and once again I asked, is there
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very disappointed in treatment by staff
Summary: I stayed at this property with my three girls in November of 2008 and had an amazing time.  The staff was extremely pleasant and upgraded us to a wonderful two bedroom suite with two beds and a bunk bed.  We were so happy with the arrangement that when my husband decided to come along for another trip we called up Marriot reservations and asked for the same room.  First, the reservation person booked us into the wrong Marriott.  We were finally booked into the right Marriott.  I called and confirmed by reservation two nights before we left and again confirmed we had the same type room as before.  When we arrived it turned out that reservations had booked us for a room with a King bed and two twin beds, which left us one bed short (unless you count the sofa bed which we
Manager Response: Dear disneyloversLasVegas,  Please accept our sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us.  We would also like to apologize for the miscommunication that occurred between you and the Marriott Reservation Center while booking your stay.  The agent that booked your stay is not located at our property and may have somehow misunderstood your request which resulted in reserving a different room for you.  Again, we extend our apologies out to you for this error.  However, we are very happy that, ultimately, you were able to stay in the same room you had on a previous visit, as you requested.  We do hope you decide to stay with us again.  If we may suggest, before your arrival of your next visit, please feel free to contact us directly to confirm any special requests.  Our staff will make every effort to accommodate you.  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: Stayed there for Christmas Eve and Day.  Location behind the Ruth's Chris Steakhouse on Harbor.  Parking was initially confusing because the steakhouse shares the same lot and has valet parking.  We were afraid we would not find parking after a very long drive...Discovered the dedicated parking was behind the hotel and plentiful.  We liked our room...very comfortable beds, ample space for family of four.  Separation between bath and sleeping area.  Nice decor; very modern.  Refrigerator in room. Quiet interior corridors.  Enjoyed using the loobby.  Hung out there to use the computers and read while family slept.  Comfortable atmosphere.  Did not use the restaurant.  Originally booked Anaheim Marriott, but after reading positive Courtyard reviews and seeing the difference in
Manager Response: Dear DeltaCA,  It's so great to hear all of your wonderful compliments on our property!  We're always thrilled to read how our guests truly enjoy all of the great amenities that we're so very proud to offer.  Clean and spacious rooms, modern decor, quiet corridors, comfortable atmosphere, great location and the list goes on.  Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: Couldn't be happier!  The other reviews were correct, top notch staff.  Always there to be helpful.  Room was clean and a good value for the price.  Great location with a good walk to Disneyland!  Maid service was excellent as well.  Only change I'd love to see would be firmer mattresses.  But slept well otherwise and bedding was satisfactory.
Manager Response: Dear pianopg,  We love that you "couldn't be happier!"  It is always so wonderful to hear a guest describe our staff as "top notch"!  Delivering superior customer service is so extremely important to us.  Our deluxe rooms are definitely a great value at an affordable rate and our location can't get any better!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to complete the online review.  We appreciate all of your compliments and we hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: We stayed here last week for 1 night.  The hotel was very clean. Nice bathrooms with granite countertops.  We made our reservations with breakfast.  The restaraunt service was excellent.  The breakfast came with very good buffet.  The cook will make you an omlette with lots of ingredients to pick from.  There was a waffle maker, which we loved.  Eggs, bacon, french toast, breads, cereals, and fresh fruit were available.   The front desk staff was very accomodating and courteous.   In the hotel lobby, coffee and hot tea is available in to go cups.   The Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle doesn't pick up at this hotel, so you have to go next door to the Marriot.  You can buy your shuttle tickets at the front desk of the Courtyard which was really nice and convenient.
Manager Response: Dear asalah,  We truly loved hearing that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you so very much for all of your compliments on our customer service.  We are constantly striving to maintain a high level of customer service and we are so pleased that you recognized our efforts.  Our restaurant, Panini Grill and Bar, definitely has a lot of menu options, including the breakfast buffet, and our waffle maker has certainly become a guest pleaser!  Not only are they delicious, they're fun to make too!  Thank you for your time in giving us your feedback.  We really do appreciate it!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: We stayed here two nites.  We had 7 people in our party so we had adjoining rooms.  The rooms were HUGE....compared to the standard Courtyard room we've stayed at before.  Everything was perfect in the rooms.  The walk to Disneyland was not bad...easy stroll...would probably take about 20 minutes with kids/strollers, etc.  We would stay there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear Suzannebr7,  We are absolutely thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and found your rooms "perfect"!  Our rooms are indeed very spacious and comfortable.  As you mentioned, it is definitely an easy stroll over to Disneyland, but what is also great about our property is that within four miles you can visit Downtown Disney, Angel Stadium, the Honda Center (where the Mighty Ducks play) and the Anaheim Convention Center.  We're very proud of our perfect location too!  One last note regarding the pool.  It is heated, however, the weather has been quite cold this month so we can understand how you may not have wanted to take a swim.  We hope that next time you'll take some time out to enjoy our heated hot tub!  Thank you very much for taking the time to complete the online review.  We really appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary: Stayed here from Sunday through Tuesday and had a great experience. The room was among the cleanest and the bathroom was spotless with plenty of amenities. The small in room fridge held our leftovers and soda. The beds, and the pillows, were the most comfortable of our entire 7,000 mile trip. One of our sons drove up from Camp Pendleton to stay with us and he arrived first and they gave him no trouble about getting into the room first, so he was able to enjoy the pool while waiting for us. The breakfast was excellent and was included with the room, the service was friendly and quick. We walked to Disneyland as it is only about a half a mile and Downtown Disney was just an $8 cab ride back ($8 plus tip for all four of us). There was a mix up in the billing, (they billed my son's
Manager Response: Dear caravanfam,  We are extremely happy that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you so very much for all of your compliments on our friendly staff and comfortable accommodations.  It is our pleasure to provide you with superior service, affordable rates and an unbeatable location!  We are so pleased to hear that you found our deluxe room the cleanest and our luxurious bedding with cotton-rich linens and fluffy pillows the most comfortable of your entire 7,000 mile trip!  Thank you for taking the time to complete the review and give us your feedback.  It is always important for us to know that we are doing our job in providing a hotel experience that you enjoy and remember!  Sincerely, eCommerce Coordinator

Summary Heading: Great choice in lieu of Marriott proper
Summary: The Courtyard Marriott is a great place to stay if you don't want to spring for the proper Marriott next door. Spacious, clean and recently renovated rooms, nice enough pool with 2 jacuzzis and a 1 minute walk to the big Marriott next door. Stayed there while attending a conference at the Marriott and saved about $75 night (based on hotel web page prices). There is a restaurant that serves breakfast in the a.m., but no lunch or dinners (plenty of places to eat around though, including in the big Marriott). Also a small convenience store for snacks and drinks. If the plan is to get up and get out and not to lounge around the pool/premises all day, definitely choose the Courtyard Marriott over the big Marriot next door. Oh, also, $9 a night parking compared to $20.
Manager Response: Dear cuss,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and appreciate your time in noting some of our great amenities.  Our deluxe rooms are, indeed, spacious, comfortable and ideal for a small family, couples, or business travelers, such as yourself!  Thanks again for completing the online review!  Sincerely,

Summary: We loved this hotel! We stayed here for 2 nights, requested joining rooms which we got! Hotel staff were very friendly.   Disneyland is within walking distance or there is a trolley bus you can get for a small fee that picks you up at the hotel next door.  Free coffee downstairs in the morning. Restaurant onsite that looked very nice but we did not get to eat there. We were so tired we got take out from Dennys across the street. There was also a restaurant right out front called Ruth Chris steakhouse which looked really nice!  Only 2 small cons I have (which would not stop me going back to this hotel) were the walls were thin, could hear people next door and walking above us. And we couldn't find stairs! The elevator was small and often had a long line. We took the stairs once
Manager Response: Dear reuhl925,  We take pride in the fact that our guests love our property as much as we do!  Not only do we offer prime location, but our amenities and service are unbeatable!  In regard to our stairs, they are, indeed, intended as a fire escape route and less as access to the public.  Also, we apologize that you found a line at the elevator and are currently working with the manufacturer to have this resolved.  Thank you so very much for completing the online review.  We look forward to serving you on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights in Oct.  The staff were all very friendly and courteous.  Tickets for Disneyland were available at the the front desk and the staff were very helpful about times needed and best days to visit the parks. Getting around the area was easy, just ask the front desk to call Melvin He is quick and courteous and everything is flat rate(great deal at the end of a long day at disneyland.)  The restaurant doesn't have allot of choices but everything was good.  Richard at the bar makes excellent cocktails to wind up a long day at the parks.  The suites are an excellent fit for families but are a little tight.(they could have made better use of the space available.  All and all we were very happy with our experience at the Courtyard Marriott
Manager Response: Dear 4mcntris,  Thank you for taking the time to complete the review and for all your compliments in regard to our staff.  We are truly happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to accommodating you on your next visit!  Thanks Again!

Summary: After 3 nights recently at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim at Disneyland Resort I'm happy to say I would go back to what I learned was one of the newest hotels in close proximity to the Disney parks. My stay was pleasant and relaxing and the staff friendly and helpfull.  I was happy to be in Anaheim in mid-Sept. as I'd heard it was one of the best times to visit with warm weather and smaller crowds and both turned out to be true. The pre-booked airport shuttle from LAX (Los Angeles International) to Anaheim is a 45 - 60 minute journey but will vary depending upon time of day and traffic. Upon check in I found the large room had two large doubles that could've passed for queens and was very functional in fit & furnishings. A few things I noticed after a day or two that families
Manager Response: Dear tcook052,  We are so pleased to hear of your “pleasant and relaxing” stay at Courtyard Anaheim. Feedback from our guests is extremely important to us, as we continuously strive to deliver a high level of customer service.  We appreciate all of your time in detailing your experience for other travelers and thank you for all of your comments.  In reading through your review, we were happy to find that you were overall pleased with your accommodations.  You are correct: We do not offer in-room safes.  However, as you mentioned, there are safety deposit boxes available, complimentary to guests, at the front desk. You also mentioned the need for a room key in order to enter the pool area and the locks only working during specific posted hours.  This is mandatory to ensure the safety of our guests, especially children. Also, thank you for taking note of our recent change in our collateral in regard to the proximity of our hotel to Disneyland.  Although technically we are two blocks from Disneyland, Anaheim blocks are long, so in effort to provide more detailed and accurate information to our guests, we are in the process of updating our marketing pieces to read “a half mile.”  Again, thank you for your time. We look forward to having you with us again next time you visit Anaheim.  Best,  Stefanie McLaughlin eCommerce Coordinator Courtyard Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is located extremely close to the entrance to Disneyland, which is a big draw. Tickets to the park are available for purchase at the front desk, which was extremely convenient. The front desk staff was very helpful in this area. The rooms were standard Courtyard here, and the pool was nice. However, there are only two elevators in the whole hotel, and they are on opposite sides. These elevators are extremely slow and are used by both guests and employees. Often, you would wait 3 or 4 minutes for an elevator on the top floor (3), and when the elevator gets to you finally, there is an employee with a cart that takes up the whole car, so you would have to wait for the next one. This is not a huge problem, but got annoying after a little while. Other than that one
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the Courtyard for business at the Anaheim Convention Center July 2008.  Check-in was good, friendly front desk staff.  Room was pretty good.  Hallways are really narrow for some reason..strange.  Bed was comfortable and clean.   We had the hotel fire alarm go off at 6 a.m.  The guests evacuated, but didn't get any direction from the hotel staff when it was safe to return.  Finally, we all just went back in.  Twenty minutes later, it went off again.  Same evacuation story.  No direction.  This time it kept going off and on for about 30 minutes.  I did contact the hotel management after my stay and they explained the problem and assured me they are working on their procedures.  I appreciate that they actually responded to my inquiry. Manager Response: none

Offer breakfast, but didn't not go.  Staff was so friendly and helpful.  Rooms were COMPLETELY clean and very refreshing after leaving a hotel with black mold in the room. Hotel Bar closed at 10pm so we just just walked over to the big Marriott Hotel across parking lot - they stay open later. Summary: My family and I stayed in a suite. There was plenty of room, and the place was spotless. The building itself is lovely and very well decorated. The staff were very sweet and kind, and the breakfast was to die for.  It made the Disneyland that much more magical. Awww.

Summary: I frequent Marriott hotel chains & decided to try this one since it’s new and new hotels are always nicer.  This hotel is new, has 4 floors, non-smoking and is nice & cozy.  I stayed here for 4 days in May.    I made my reservation directly on the hotel’s website for $95.20/night for 2 queen beds.  I did see $89.50/night a couple of days earlier, but by the time I made my reservation the rate had changed.    The hotel is situated behind Ruth’s Steakhouse & it’s easy to miss it if you’re not paying attention the first time.  Check-in was quick & pleasant. Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights during a business trip and was very happy with everything. The property is very new so everything is extremely clean. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The pool area is very nice and I spent a lot of time there. The wireless internet access reaches the pool area, which allowed me to do some work outside. Although I only ate breakfast in the restaurant, it was very good and the service was excellent. The bar area is great and looks out to the pool. I reserved a king room with sofa and it was perfect for me. The property is in a wonderful location, along a divided boulevard with wide sidewalks on both sides. Summary Heading: Great Hotel, and not too far from Disneyland
Summary: This was our third trip to Disneyland in the last six years, and was by far the best hotel that we have stayed at in Anaheim.  This is Marriott's newest hotel in the area, and I was amazed how clean it was even after one year of being open.  The rooms are nicely decorated, and just right in size for a family of four.  Some people have complained about size, but let's face it are you really at Disneyland to stay in your room?  The staff was very friendly and helpful, even helping to arrange medical care for my wife who became ill during our trip.  The pool was nice sized, and heated just right.  The bar serves drinks outside to help unwind after navigating through the awful crowds at the Magic Kingdom.  One word of caution, the hotel's website states "2 blocks from Disneyland."

Summary Heading: Family suite is nice touch, not bad overall

Pros: -- family suite with two rooms, two TVs, and bunkbeds (and sofabed) was ideal for our family of five; also had two comfortable queens in the main room -- beds are very comfortable (as with most or all Courtyards) -- free wired and wireless internet (I appreciate the Ethernet connection) -- staff is friendly -- on-site laundry, pool, etc. nothing special but all there -- very clean and nice lobby area and restaurant  Cons: -- no cell phone service for Verizon except outside (my daughter's AT&T cell phone worked fine) -- not that close to Disneyland, 1 mile (to long to walk after a long day at Disneyland)
